h4.p: [03]^b^1-2^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catukkanipātassa ^a^M2.0221^ea^^a^V2.0201^ea^ paṭhame anubodho pubbabhāgiyaṃ ñāṇaṃ, paṭivedho anubodhena abhisamayo. Tattha yasmā anubodhapubbako paṭivedho anubodhena vinā na hoti. Anubodho hi ekacco paṭivedhasambaddho, tadubhayābhāvahetukañca vaṭṭe saṃsaraṇaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘ananubodhā…pe… tumhākañcā’’ti. Paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena bhavato bhavantarūpagamanaṃ ^b^sandhāvanaṃ,^eb^ aparāparaṃ cavanūpapajjanavasena sañcaraṇaṃ ^b^saṃsaraṇa^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘bhavato’’^eb^tiādi. Sandhāvitasaṃsaritapadānaṃ kammasādhanataṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘mayā ca tumhehi cā’’^eb^ti paṭhamavikappe. Dutiyavikappe pana bhāvasādhanataṃ hadaye katvā ^b^‘‘mamañceva tumhākañcā’’^eb^ti yathārutavaseneva vuttaṃ ^a^V2.0202^ea^. Dīgharajjunā baddhasakuṇaṃ viya rajjuhattho puriso desantaraṃ taṇhārajjunā baddhaṃ sattasantānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro bhavantaraṃ neti etāyāti ^b^bhavanetti^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhavarajjū’’^eb^tiādī.

[03]^b^Vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaro^eb^ti sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sakasantāne parasantāne ca vināsakaro abhāvakaro. Buddhacakkhudhammacakkhudibbacakkhumaṃsacakkhusamantacakkhusaṅkhātehi ^b^pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā^eb^. Savāsanānaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā sātisayaṃ kilesaparinibbānena ^b^parinibbuto^eb^. Dutiyaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Anubuddhasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^3-4^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^M2.0222^ea^^b^kali^eb^nti aparādhaṃ. ^b^Vicinātī^eb^ti ācinoti pasavati. ^b^Tena ca kalinā sukhaṃ na paṭilabhatī^eb^ti tena aparādhena sukhaṃ na vindati. Nindiyappasaṃsāya hi pasaṃsiyanindāya ca samakova vipāko. ^b^Pasaṃsiyanindā^eb^ti ca sampannaguṇaparidhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā mahāsāvajjatāya kaṭukataravipākā. Nindiyappasaṃsā pana kathaṃ tāya samavipākāti ce? Tasmiṃ avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresañca micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato pasaṃsiyena tassa sabbhāvakaraṇato ca. Lokepi hi asūraṃ sūrena samaṃ karonto gārayho hoti, pageva duppaṭipannaṃ suppaṭipannena samaṃ karontoti. ^b^Sakena dhanenā^eb^ti attano sāpateyyena. ^b^Appamattakova kalī^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikattā sappaṭikārattā ca appamattako aparādho. ^b^Ayaṃ…pe… mahantataro kali^eb^ katūpacitattā samparāyikattā appaṭikārattā ca.

[03]^b^Nirabbudo^eb^ti gaṇanāviseso esoti āha ^b^‘‘nirabbudagaṇanāyā’’^eb^ti, satasahassaṃ nirabbudāti attho. Nirabbudaparimāṇaṃ pana vassagaṇanāya evaṃ veditabbaṃ. Yatheva hi sataṃ satasahassānaṃ koṭi hoti, evaṃ sataṃ satasahassānaṃ koṭiyo pakoṭi nāma hoti, sataṃ satasahassānaṃ pakoṭiyo koṭipakoṭi, sataṃ satasahassakoṭipakoṭiyo nahutaṃ, sataṃ satasahassanahutāni ninnahutaṃ, sataṃ satasahassaninnahutāni ekaṃ abbudaṃ, tato vīsatiguṇitaṃ nirabbudaṃ. ^b^Yaṃ ariye garahanto nirayaṃ upapajjatī^eb^ti ariye garahanto yaṃ nirabbudasaṅkhātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati, nirabbudoti ca pāṭiyekko nirayo natthi, avīcimhiyeva pana nirabbudagaṇanāya paccitabbaṭṭhānassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Catutthaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Paṭhamakhatasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^5^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^V2.0203^ea^^b^anusotaṃ gacchatī^eb^ti saṃsārasotassa anukūlabhāvena gacchati. ^b^Paccanīkapaṭipattiyā^eb^ti saṃsārasotassa paṭikūlavasena pavattanibbidānupassanādipaṭipattiyā ^a^M2.0223^ea^. ^b^Ṭhitasabhāvo^eb^ti acalappasādādisamannāgamena ṭhitasabhāvo. Anāgāmī hi assaddhiyehi kāmarāgabyāpādehi akampaniyacittatāya tamhā lokā anāvattidhammatāya ca ṭhitasabhāvo nāma. ^b^Oghaṃ taritvā^eb^ti kāmoghādicatubbidhaṃ oghaṃ atikkamitvā. ^b^Paratīraṃ gato^eb^ti nibbānapāraṃ gato. ^b^Brāhmaṇo^eb^ti bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇoti saṅkhaṃ gato khīṇāsavo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘seṭṭho niddoso’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pañcaverakamma^eb^nti pāṇātipātādipañcaduccaritaṃ. ^b^Sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenā^eb^ti kilesapariyuṭṭhāne sati uppannena dukkhadomanassena saddhimpi. ^b^Paripuṇṇa^eb^nti tissannaṃ sikkhānaṃ ekāyapi anūnaṃ. ^b^Parisuddha^eb^nti nirupakkilesaṃ. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti seṭṭhacariyaṃ. Iminā vārena sotāpannasakadāgāmino kathitā. Kiṃ pana te rudantā brahmacariyaṃ carantīti? Āma, kilesarodanena rodantā caranti nāma, sīlasampanno puthujjanabhikkhu ettheva saṅgahito.

[03]^b^Cetovimutti^eb^nti phalasamādhiṃ. ^b^Paññāvimutti^eb^nti phalañāṇaṃ. ^b^Chahākārehi pāragato^eb^ti abhiññāpāragū, pariññāpāragū, bhāvanāpāragū, pahānapāragū, sacchikiriyāpāragū, samāpattipāragūti evaṃ chahi ākārehi sabbadhammānaṃ pāraṃ pariyosānaṃ gato. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Anusotasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^6^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^appakaṃ sutaṃ hotī^eb^ti navaṅgasatthusāsane kiñcideva sutaṃ hoti. Tadeva navaṅgasatthusāsanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘suttaṃ geyya’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha suttādīni vibhajitvā dassento ^b^‘‘ubhatovibhaṅganiddesakkhandhakaparivārā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Kathaṃ panāyaṃ vibhāgo yujjeyya. Sagāthakañhi suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ. Tadubhayavinimuttañca suttaṃ udānādivisesasaññārahitaṃ natthi, yaṃ suttaṅgaṃ siyā. ^b^Maṅgalasuttā^eb^dīnañca (khu. pā. 5.1 ādayo; su. ni. 261 ādayo) suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya ^a^M2.0224^ea^. Geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya. Tathā ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānanti? Vuccate –
[21]‘‘Suttanti ^a^V2.0204^ea^ sāmaññavidhi, visesavidhayo pare;
[22]Sanimittā niruḷhattā, sahatāññena nāññato’’. (netti. aṭṭha. saṅgahavāravaṇṇanā; dī. ni. ṭī. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā; sārattha. ṭī. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā)

[03]Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ ^b^sāmaññavidhi^eb^. Tenevāha āyasmā mahākaccāno ^b^nettiyaṃ^eb^ (netti. saṅgahavāro) ‘‘navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhī’’ti. Ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ (pāci. 655, 1242) sakavāde pañca suttasatānīti (dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā; kathā. aṭṭha. nidānakathā) evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ. ^b^Visesavidhayo pare sanimittā^eb^ tadekadesesu geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā. Tathā hi geyyassa sagāthakattaṃ tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ ‘‘geyya’’nti vadanti. Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ. Pucchāvissajjanañhi ‘‘byākaraṇa’’nti vuccati. Byākaraṇameva veyyākaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati geyyādisaññānaṃ anokāsabhāvato, ‘‘gāthāvirahe satī’’ti visesitattā ca. Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāyuttesu ‘‘vuttaṃ heta’’ntiādīvacanasambandhesu abbhutadhammappaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttakābbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā, satipi pañhavissajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo. Yaṃ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṃ, taṃ suttaṅgaṃ visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya pavattanato. Nanu ca sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ, niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ ^a^M2.0225^ea^ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthāvāti? Na tadavatthā sodhitattā. Sodhitañhi pubbe ‘‘gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimitta’’nti.

[03]Yañca vuttaṃ – ‘‘gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā’’ti, taṃ ^b^na, niruḷhattā^eb^. Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttabhāvo. Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni, atha kho suttabhāveneva, teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘‘suttanāmaka’’nti nāmaggahaṇaṃ ^a^V2.0205^ea^ kataṃ. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ‘‘sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā’’ti, tadapi natthi, yasmā ^b^sahatāññena^eb^. Saha gāthāhīti hi sagāthakaṃ. Sahabhāvo nāma atthato aññena hoti, na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi, yo ‘‘saha gāthāhī’’ti vucceyya, na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi. Yadapi vuttaṃ – ‘‘ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṃ geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā’’ti, tadapi na, aññato. Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā. Ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti. Evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññaṃ saṅkarābhāvo veditabbo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya ^b^sāratthadīpaniyā^eb^ (sārattha. ṭī. 1.paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikathāvaṇṇanā) amhehi pakāsito, icchantehi tatoyeva gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotī^eb^ti aṭṭhakathāñca pāḷiñca jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ paṭipanno na hotīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyāti aṭṭhakathañca pāḷiñca jānitvā…pe… na paṭipanno hotī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Appassutasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^paññāveyyattiyenā^eb^ti saccasampaṭivedhādipaññāveyyattiyena. ^b^Vinayaṃ upetā^eb^ti tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ vinayaṃ upetā. ^b^Vesārajjenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0226^ea^ sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamanato vesārajjena, sārajjarahitenāti attho. Tepiṭakavasena bahu sutaṃ etesanti ^b^bahussutā^eb^. Tameva pariyattidhammaṃ dhārenti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya vinassantaṃ akatvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena hadaye ṭhapentīti ^b^dhammadharā^eb^. Edisā ca attanā sutassa dhammassa ādhārabhūtā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘sutadhammānaṃ ādhārabhūtā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Sobhanasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^a^V2.0206^ea^ byāmohavasena saraṇapariyesanaṃ sārajjanaṃ sārado, byāmohabhayaṃ. Vigato sārado etassāti visārado, tassa bhāvo ^b^vesārajjaṃ^eb^. Taṃ pana ñāṇasampadaṃ, pahānasampadaṃ, desanāvisesasampadaṃ khemañca nissāya pavattaṃ catubbidhapaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catūsu ṭhānesū’’^eb^tiādi. Usabhassa idanti ^b^āsabhaṃ,^eb^ seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbaññutapaṭijānanavasena abhimukhaṃ gacchanti, aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti ^b^āsabhā,^eb^ pubbabuddhā. ^b^Idaṃ panā^eb^ti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ sabbaññutameva vadati. ^b^Tiṭṭhamānovā^eb^ti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho. ^b^Upagacchatī^eb^ti anujānāti.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhasu parisāsū^eb^ti ‘‘abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ upasaṅkamitā…pe… brāhmaṇaparisaṃ gahapatiparisaṃ, samaṇaparisaṃ, cātumahārājikaparisaṃ, tāvatiṃsaparisaṃ, māraparisaṃ, brahmaparisaṃ upasaṅkamitā, tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpajjitapubbā. Tatra vata maṃ ‘bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatī’ti nimittametaṃ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.151) evaṃ vuttaparisāsu. ^b^Abhītanādaṃ nadatī^eb^ti parato dassitañāṇayogena visārado ahanti abhītanādaṃ nadati. ^b^Sīhanādasuttenā^eb^ti khandhavagge āgatena sīhanādasuttena.

[03]‘‘Devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ vattatī’’ti (a. ni. 4.31) suttasesena sappurisūpanissayādiphalasampattipavatti vuttā, purimasappurisūpanissayādiupanissayā pacchimasappurisūpanissayādisampattipavatti ^a^M2.0227^ea^ vā vuttā. Ādi-saddena tattha ca cakkasaddassa gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vicakkasaṇṭhānā asani eva ^b^asanivicakkaṃ. Uracakkādīsū^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena āṇāsamūhādīsupi cakkasaddassa pavatti veditabbā. ‘‘Saṅghabhedaṃ karissāma cakkabheda’’ntiādīsu (pārā. 409; cūḷava. 343) hi āṇā ‘‘cakka’’nti vuttā. ‘‘Devacakkaṃ asuracakka’’ntiādīsu samūhoti.

[03]Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti ^b^‘‘phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti ^b^‘‘aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe… phalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Dassitadhammesū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0207^ea^ vuttadhammesu. Vacanamattameva hi tesaṃ, na pana dassanaṃ tādisasseva dhammassa abhāvato. Bhagavato eva vā ‘‘ime dhammā anabhisambuddho’’ti parassa vacanavasena ^b^dassitadhammesu^eb^. ‘‘Dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu (vibha. 718-721) viya ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo hetupariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘sahadhammenāti sahetunā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Hetū^eb^ti ca upapattisādhanahetu veditabbo, na kārako, sampāpako vā. ^b^Nimitta^eb^nti codanāya kāraṇaṃ. Tattha codako codanaṃ karotīti ^b^kāraṇaṃ,^eb^ dhammo codanaṃ karoti etenāti ^b^kāraṇaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘puggalopī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Khema^eb^nti kenaci appaṭibāhiyabhāvena anupaddutaṃ.

[03]Antarāyo etesaṃ atthi, antarāye vā niyuttāti ^b^antarāyikā^eb^. Evaṃbhūtā pana te yasmā antarāyakarā nāma honti, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘antarāyaṃ karontīti antarāyikā’’^eb^ti. Asañcicca vītikkame nātisāvajjāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sañcicca vītikkantā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Satta āpattikkhandhā^eb^tiādi nidassanamattaṃ itaresampi catunnaṃ ‘‘antarāyikā’’ti vuttadhammānaṃ tabbhāve byabhicārābhāvato. ^b^Idha pana methunadhammo adhippeto^eb^ti idaṃ aṭṭhuppattivasena vuttaṃ ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṃ (pāci. 417) viya. Yasmā taṃkhaṇampi kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā virato hoti ce, visesaṃ adhigacchati, na kāmesu āsatto, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘methuna…pe…antarāyo hotī’’^eb^ti. Tattha ^b^yassa kassacī^eb^ti na kevalaṃ pabbajitasseva, atha kho ^a^M2.0228^ea^ yassa kassaci. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘methunamanuyuttassa, mussatevāpi sāsana’’nti (su. ni. 820).
[03]^b^Tasmiṃ aniyyānikadhamme^eb^ti tasmiṃ parehi parikappitāniyyānikadhammanimittaṃ. Nimittatthe hi idaṃ kammasaṃyoge bhummaṃ.
[03]^b^Upanibaddhā^eb^ti viracitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhisaṅkhatā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Puthubhāva^eb^nti bahubhāvaṃ. ^b^Puthūhi vā sitā^eb^ti bahūhi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi sitā upanibaddhā.
[06]Vesārajjasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame bhavati etena ārogyanti ^b^bhavo,^eb^ gilānapaccayo. Parivuddho bhavo ^b^abhavo^eb^. Vuddhiattho hi ayamakāro yathā ‘‘saṃvarāsaṃvaro, phalāphala’’nti ca. ^b^Sappinavanītādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ^a^V2.0208^ea^ telamadhuphāṇitādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ. Sappinavanītādiggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ, sabbassapi gilānapaccayassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Bhavābhavo^eb^ti vā khuddako ceva mahanto ca upapattibhavo veditabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sampattibhavesū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Bhavo^eb^ti vā sampatti, ^b^abhavo^eb^ti vipatti. ^b^Bhavo^eb^ti vuddhi, ^b^abhavo^eb^ti hāni. Taṃnimittañca taṇhā uppajjatīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhavābhavahetu vā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Taṇhādutiyo^eb^ti taṇhāsahāyo. Taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā viya pipāsābhibhūtaṃ tasitaṃ sattaṃ assāsadassanavasena sahāyakiccaṃ karontī bhavādīsu anibbinnaṃ katvā paribbhamāpeti. Tathā hi taṃ papātakaṃ acintetvā madhuggaṇhanakaluddakā viya anekādīnavākulesu bhavesu ānisaṃsameva dassentī anatthajāle sā paribbhamāpeti, tasmā taṇhā ‘‘purisassa dutiyā’’ti vuttā. Nanu ca aññepi kilesādayo bhavanibbattipaccayāti? Saccametaṃ, na pana tathā visesapaccayo, yathā taṇhā. Tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā ^a^M2.0229^ea^ akusalehi, kāmāvacarādikusalehi ca vinā rūpāvacarādikusalehi bhavanibbattiyā visesapaccayo. Yato samudayasaccanti vuccatīti. ^b^Itthabhāvaññathābhāva^eb^nti itthabhāvo ca aññathābhāvo ca itthabhāvaññathābhāvo, so etassa atthīti itthabhāvaññathābhāvo, saṃsāro, taṃ itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṃ. Tattha ^b^itthabhāvo^eb^ manussattaṃ, ^b^aññathābhāvo^eb^ tato avasiṭṭhasattāvāsā. ^b^Itthabhāvo^eb^ vā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppanno attabhāvo, ^b^aññathābhāvo^eb^ anāgatattabhāvo. Evarūpo vā aññopi attabhāvo ^b^itthabhāvo,^eb^ na evarūpo ^b^aññathābhāvo^eb^. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti ettha itthabhāvo nāma ayaṃ attabhāvo’’^eb^tiādi. Saṃsaraṇaṃ ^b^saṃsāro^eb^.
[21]‘‘Khandhānañca paṭipāṭi, dhātuāyatanāna ca;

[22]Abbocchinnaṃ vattamānā, saṃsāroti pavuccati’’. (visuddhi. 2.619; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.95 apasādanāvaṇṇanā; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.2.60; a. ni. aṭṭha. 2.4.199; dha. sa. aṭṭha. nidānakathā; vibha. aṭṭha. 226 saṅkhārapadaniddeso; su. ni. aṭṭha. 2.523; udā. aṭṭha. 39; itivu. aṭṭha. 14);
[03]Tenāha ^b^‘‘khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ paṭipāṭi’’^eb^nti, khandhadhātuāyatanānaṃ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparappavattinti attho.

[03]^b^Evamādīnavaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0209^ea^^b^ñatvā^eb^ti ettha etamādīnavaṃ ñatvātipi paṭhanti, etaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sambhavaṃ samudayaṃ taṇhaṃ ādīnavaṃ ñatvāti attho. Atha vā ^b^evamādīnavaṃ ñatvā^eb^ti etaṃ yathāvuttaṃ saṃsārānativattanāadīnavaṃ dosaṃ ñatvā. ^b^Niggahaṇo^eb^ti caturūpādānasaṅkhātassa sabbassa gahaṇassa paṭinissajjanena niggahaṇo, khandhaparinibbānena saṅkhārappavattito apagaccheyyāti evaṃ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
[06]Taṇhuppādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^yojentī^eb^ti kammaṃ vipākena bhavādiṃ, bhavantarādīhi dukkhena sattaṃ yojenti ghaṭentīti ^b^yogā^eb^. Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena yogo cāti ^b^kāmayogo. Bhavayogo^eb^ nāma bhavarāgoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘rūpārūpabhavesū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha paṭhamo ^a^M2.0230^ea^ upapattibhavesu rāgo, dutiyo kammabhavesu, tatiyo bhavadiṭṭhisahagato yathā rajjanaṭṭhena rāgo, evaṃ yujjanaṭṭhena yogoti vutto. ^b^Catūsu saccesu aññāṇa^eb^nti idaṃ suttantanayaṃ nissāya vuttaṃ. Suttantasaṃvaṇṇanā hesāti, tadantogadhattā vā pubbantādīnaṃ.

[03]^b^Samudaya^eb^nti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo paccayasamudayo ca. Uppādakkhaṇo khaṇikasamudayo, paccayova paccayasamudayo. Samudayate samudayanaṃ samudayo, samudeti etasmāti samudayoti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ samudayānaṃ saddatthatopi bhedo veditabbo. Paccayasamudayaṃ pajānantopi bhikkhu khaṇikasamudayaṃ pajānāti, khaṇikasamudayaṃ pajānantopi paccayasamudayaṃ pajānāti. Paccayato hi saṅkhārānaṃ udayaṃ passato khaṇato ca nesaṃ udayadassanaṃ sukhaṃ hoti, khaṇato ca nesaṃ udayaṃ passato pageva paccayānaṃ suggahitattā paccayato dassanaṃ sukhena ijjhati. Idha pana khaṇikasamudayaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘samudayanti uppatti’’^eb^nti.

[03]Atthaṅgamopi duvidho accantatthaṅgamo, bhedatthaṅgamoti. Accantatthaṅgamo appavattinirodho, nibbānanti keci. Bhedatthaṅgamo khaṇikanirodho. Tadubhayaṃ pubbabhāge uggahaparipucchādivasena passato aññataradassanena itaradassanampi siddhameva hoti. Pubbabhāgeyeva ārammaṇavasena khayato vayato sammasanādikāle bhedatthaṅgamaṃ passanto byatirekavasena anussavādito accantatthaṅgamaṃ passati, maggakkhaṇe pana ārammaṇato accantatthaṅgamaṃ passanto asammohato itarampi passati. Idha pana bhedatthaṅgamaṃ dassento āha ^b^‘‘atthaṅgamanti bheda’’^eb^nti. Kāmānaṃ uppattibhedaggahaṇeneva ^a^V2.0210^ea^ cettha yathā kāmānaṃ paṭiccasamuppannatā vibhāvitā, evaṃ kāmavatthunopīti ubhayesampi aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā ca vibhāvitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Madhurabhāva^eb^nti iminā kāmasannissitaṃ sukhaṃ somanassaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Yaṃ kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo’’ti (ma. ni. 1.166) hi vuttaṃ. ^b^Amadhurabhāva^eb^nti iminā pana kāmahetukaṃ dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Phassāyatanāna^eb^nti chadvārikassa phassassa kāraṇabhūtānaṃ cakkhādiāyatanānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cakkhādīnaṃ cakkhusamphassādikāraṇāna’’^eb^nti. Punabbhavakaraṇaṃ ^a^M2.0231^ea^ punobhavo uttarapadalopena, mano-saddassa viya ca purimapadassa okārantatā daṭṭhabbā. Punobhavo sīlametesanti ^b^ponobhavikā^eb^. Atha vā sīlatthena ikasaddena gamitatthattā kiriyāvācakasaddassa adassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ yathā apūpabhakkhanasīlo āpūpiko. Atha vā punabbhavaṃ denti, punabbhavāya saṃvattanti, punappunabbhave nibbattentīti ^b^ponobhavikā^eb^. ‘‘Taddhitā’’ti hi bahuvacananiddesā vicittattā vā taddhitānaṃ abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā ‘‘punabbhavaṃ dentī’’tiādīsupi atthesu ponobhavikasaddasiddhi daṭṭhabbā.
[03]Visaṃyojenti paṭipannaṃ puggalaṃ kāmayogādito viyojentīti ^b^visaṃyogā,^eb^ asubhajjhānādīni visaṃyojanakāraṇāni. Tenāha ^b^‘‘visaṃyogāti visaṃyojanakāraṇānī’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Yogasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Bhaṇḍagāmavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyassa paṭhame ^b^carato^eb^ti gacchantassa, caṅkamantassa vā. ^b^Uppajjati kāmavitakko vā^eb^ti vatthukāmesu avītarāgatāya tādise paccaye kāmapaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko uppajjati ce ^a^V2.0211^ea^, yadi uppajjati. ^b^Byāpādavitakko vā vihiṃsāvitakko vā^eb^ti āghātavinaye visesena cittassa adamitattā āghātanimitte byāpādapaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko, leḍḍudaṇḍādīti parahiṃsanavasena vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vā vitakko uppajjati ceti sambandho. ^b^Taṃ ce bhikkhu adhivāsetī^eb^ti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ kāmavitakkādiṃ yathāpaccayaṃ attano citte uppannaṃ ‘‘itipāyaṃ vitakko pāpako, itipi akusalo, itipi sāvajjo, so ca kho attabyābādhāya saṃvattatī’’tiādinā nayena paccavekkhaṇāya abhāvato adhivāseti attano cittaṃ āropetvā vāseti. Adhivāsentoyeva ca ^b^nappajahati^eb^ tadaṅgādippahānavasena na paṭinissajjati. Tato eva ca ^a^M2.0232^ea^^b^na vinodeti^eb^ attano cittasantānato na nudati na nīharati. Tathā avinodanato ^b^na byantīkaroti^eb^ na vigatantaṃ karoti. Ātāpī pahitatto yathā tesaṃ antopi nāvasissati antamaso bhaṅgamattampi, evaṃ karoti, ayaṃ pana tathā na karotīti attho. Tathābhūto pana ^b^na anabhāvaṃ gameti^eb^ anu anu abhāvaṃ na gameti. Na pajahati ce, na vinodeti ceti itiādinā ce-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Evaṃbhūto^eb^ti evaṃ kāmavitakkādīhi pāpavitakkehi samaṅgibhūto. ^b^Anātāpī^eb^ti kilesānaṃ ātāpayikassa vīriyassa abhāvena anātāpī. Pāputrāsalakkhaṇassa ottappassa abhāvena ^b^anottāpī. Satataṃ samitaṃ^eb^ sabbakālaṃ nirantaraṃ. ^b^Kusīto hīnavīriyo^eb^ti kusalehi dhammehi parihāpayitvā akusalapakkhe kucchitaṃ sīdanato kosajjasamannāgamena ca kusīto, sammappadhānavīriyābhāvena hīnavīriyo vīriyavirahitoti ^b^vuccati^eb^ kathīyati. ^b^Ṭhitassā^eb^ti gamanaṃ upacchinditvā tiṭṭhato. Sayanairiyāpathassa visesato kosajjapakkhikattā yathā taṃsamaṅgino bhāvitattā sambhavanti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘jāgarassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Sukkapakkhe ^b^tañce bhikkhu nādhivāsetī^eb^ti āraddhavīriyassapi viharato anādimati saṃsāre cirakālabhāvitattā tathārūpapaccayasamāyoge satisammosena vā kāmavitakkādi uppajjati ce, taṃ bhikkhu attano cittaṃ āropetvā na vāseti, abbhantare na vāsetīti attho. Anadhivāsento kiṃ karoti? ^b^Pajahati^eb^ chaḍḍeti. Kiṃ kacavaraṃ viya piṭakenāti? Na, apica kho taṃ ^b^vinodeti^eb^ nudati nīharati. Kiṃ balibaddaṃ viya patodenāti? Na, atha kho ^b^byantīkaroti^eb^ vigatantaṃ karoti, yathā tesaṃ antopi nāvasissati antamaso bhaṅgamattampi, tathā te karoti. Kathaṃ pana te tathā karoti? ^b^Anabhāvaṃ gameti^eb^ anu anu abhāvaṃ gameti, vikkhambhanappahānena yathā suvikkhambhitā honti, tathā ne karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Evaṃbhūto^eb^tiādīsu ^a^V2.0212^ea^ evaṃ kāmavitakkādīnaṃ anadhivāsena suvisuddhāsayo samāno tāya ca āsayasampattiyā tannimittāya ca payogasampattiyā ^a^M2.0233^ea^ parisuddhasīlo indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū satisampajaññena samannāgato jāgariyaṃ anuyutto tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ ātāpanalakkhaṇena vīriyena samannāgatattā ^b^ātāpī^eb^. Sabbaso pāputrāsena samannāgatattā ^b^ottāpī satataṃ^eb^ rattindivaṃ. ^b^Samitaṃ^eb^ nirantaraṃ samathavipassanānuyogavasena catubbidhasammappadhānasiddhiyā ^b^āraddhavīriyo pahitatto^eb^. Nibbānaṃ pati pesitacittoti ^b^vuccati^eb^ kathīyatīti attho.

[03]Gāthāsu ^b^gehanissita^eb^nti ettha gehavāsīhi apariccattattā gehavāsisabhāvattā gehadhammattā vā gehaṃ vuccati vatthukāmo. Atha vā gehappaṭibaddhabhāvato, kilesakāmānaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānabhāvato vā gehāti vuccanti, taṃvatthukattā kāmavitakkādi gehanissitaṃ nāma. ^b^Kummaggapaṭipanno^eb^ti yasmā ariyamaggassa uppathabhāvato abhijjhādayo tadekaṭṭhadhammā ca kummaggo, tasmā kāmavitakkādibahulo kummaggapaṭipanno. ^b^Mohaneyyesu mucchito^eb^ti mohasaṃvattaniyesu rūpādīsu mucchito sammatto ajjhopanno. ^b^Sambodhi^eb^nti ariyamaggañāṇaṃ. ^b^Phuṭṭha^eb^nti phusituṃ pattuṃ ^b^pāpo so tādiso^eb^ micchāsaṅkappagocaro puggalo ^b^abhabbo,^eb^ na kadāci taṃ pāpuṇātīti attho.

[03]^b^Vitakkaṃ samayitvānā^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ micchāvitakkaṃ paṭisaṅkhānabhāvanābalena vūpasametvā. ^b^Vitakkūpasame rato^eb^ti navannampi mahāvitakkānaṃ accantūpasamabhūte arahatte, nibbāne eva vā ajjhāsayena rato abhirato. ^b^Bhabbo so^eb^ti so yathāvutto sammāpaṭipajjamāno puggalo pubbabhāge samathavipassanābalena sabbavitakke yathārahaṃ tadaṅgādivasena vūpasametvā ṭhito vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānasaṅkhātañca anuttaraṃ ^b^sambodhiṃ phuṭṭhuṃ^eb^ adhigantuṃ ^b^bhabbo^eb^ arahā. Evamettha pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā.
[06]Carasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^sampannasīlā^eb^ti ettha tividhaṃ sampannaṃ paripuṇṇasamaṅgimadhuravasena. Tattha –
[21]‘‘Sampannaṃ ^a^M2.0234^ea^ sālikedāraṃ, suvā bhuñjanti kosiya;
[22]Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe’’ti. (jā. 1.14.1) –

[07]Idaṃ ^a^V2.0213^ea^^b^paripuṇṇasampannaṃ^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno sampanno samannāgato’’ti (vibha. 511) idaṃ ^b^samaṅgisampannaṃ^eb^ nāma. ‘‘Imissā, bhante, mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatalaṃ sampannaṃ, seyyathāpi khuddamadhuṃ anīlakaṃ, evamassāda’’nti (pārā. 17) idaṃ ^b^madhurasampannaṃ^eb^ nāma. Idha paripuṇṇasampannavasena atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sampannasīlāti paripuṇṇasīlā’’^eb^ti āha. Samaṅgisampannavasenapi attho yujjatiyeva, tasmā ^b^sampannasīlā^eb^ti paripuṇṇasīlā hutvātipi sīlasamaṅgino hutvātipi evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tattha sīlassa anavasesasamādānena akhaṇḍādibhāvappattiyā paripuṇṇasīlā, samādānato paṭṭhāya avicchindanato sīlasamaṅgino. Samādānavato hi accantavirodhidhammānuppattiyā sīlasamaṅgitā veditabbā, cetanādīnaṃ pana sīlanalakkhaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ pavattilakkhaṇena vattabbameva natthi.

[03]Tattha ‘‘paripuṇṇasīlā’’ti iminā atthena khettadosavigamena khettapāripūrī viya sīladosavigamena sīlapāripūrī vuttā hoti. Yathā hi khettaṃ bījakhaṇḍaṃ, vappakhaṇḍaṃ, udakakhaṇḍaṃ, ūsakhaṇḍanti catudosasamannāgataṃ aparipūraṃ hoti. Tattha ^b^bījakhaṇḍaṃ^eb^ nāma yattha antarantarā bījāni khaṇḍāni vā pūtīni vā honti, tāni yattha patanti, tattha sassaṃ na uṭṭheti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti, aparipūraṃ hotīti attho. ^b^Vappakhaṇḍaṃ^eb^ nāma yattha akusalo bījāni vapanto antarantarā nipāteti. Evañhi sabbattha sassaṃ na uṭṭheti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti. ^b^Udakakhaṇḍaṃ^eb^ nāma yattha katthaci udakaṃ atibahuṃ vā hoti, na vā hoti. Tatrāpi hi sassāni na uṭṭhenti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti. ^b^Ūsakhaṇḍaṃ^eb^ nāma yattha kassako kismiñci padese naṅgalena bhūmiṃ cattāro pañca vāre kasanto atigambhīraṃ karoti, tato ūsaṃ uppajjati. Tatrāpi hi sassaṃ na uṭṭheti, khettaṃ khaṇḍaṃ hoti, tādisañca khettaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ. Tatrāpi bahumpi vapitvā appaṃ labhati. Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ dosānaṃ vigamā khettaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tādisañca khettaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ. Evameva khaṇḍaṃ, chiddaṃ, sabalaṃ, kammāsanti catudosasamannāgataṃ sīlaṃ aparipūraṃ hoti, tādisañca ^a^M2.0235^ea^ sīlaṃ na mahapphalaṃ hoti na mahānisaṃsaṃ. Imesaṃ pana catunnaṃ dosānaṃ vigamā sīlaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, tādisañca sīlaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsaṃ.

[03]‘‘Sīlasamaṅgino’’ti iminā panatthena sīlena samaṅgibhūtā samodhānagatā samannāgatā hutvā viharathāti idameva vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha dvīhi kāraṇehi sampannasīlatā hoti sīlavipattiyā ādīnavadassanena, sīlasampattiyā ca ānisaṃsadassanena. Tadubhayampi ^b^visuddhimagge^eb^ (visuddhi. 1.14) vitthāritaṃ ^a^V2.0214^ea^. Tattha ‘‘sampannasīlāti ettāvatā ca kira bhagavā catupārisuddhisīlaṃ uddisitvā ‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā’ti iminā tattha jeṭṭhakasīlaṃ vitthāretvā dassetī’’ti divāvihāravāsī sumatthero āha. Antevāsiko panassa tepiṭakacūḷanāgatthero āha – ‘‘ubhayatthāpi pātimokkhasaṃvaro bhagavatā vutto, pātimokkhasaṃvaroyeva hi sīlaṃ, itarāni pana tīṇi sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthī’’ti vatvā taṃ ananujānanto āha – ‘‘indriyasaṃvaro nāma chadvārarakkhāmattakameva, ājīvapārisuddhi dhammena samena paccayuppattimattakaṃ, paccayanissitaṃ paṭiladdhapaccaye idamatthanti paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanamattakaṃ. Nippariyāyena pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīlaṃ. Yassa so bhinno, ayaṃ chinnasīso viya puriso hatthapāde, sesāni rakkhissatīti na vattabbo. Yassa pana so arogo, ayaṃ acchinnasīso viya puriso jīvitaṃ, sesāni puna pākatikāni katvā rakkhituṃ sakkoti. Tasmā ‘sampannasīlā’ti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvaraṃ uddisitvā ‘sampannapātimokkhā’ti tasseva vevacanaṃ vatvā taṃ vitthāretvā dassento ‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvutā’tiādimāhā’’ti.

[03]^b^Pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlena saṃvutā^eb^ti yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhanti laddhanāmena sikkhāpadasīlena pihitakāyavacīdvārā. Evaṃbhūtā ca tena upetā samannāgatā nāma hontīti āha ^b^‘‘upetā hutvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ācārena ca gocarena ca sampannā^eb^ti kāyikavācasikāvītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena, na-vesiyagocaratādisaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampannā, sampannāacāragocarāti attho. ^b^Aṇuppamāṇesū^eb^ti atiparittakesu anāpattigamanīyesu. Dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattesūti apare. ^b^Dosesū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0236^ea^ gārayhesu akusaladhammesu. ^b^Bhayato dassanasīlā^eb^ti paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā bhāyanasīlā. ^b^Sabbasikkhākoṭṭhāsesū^eb^ti mūlapaññattianupaññattisabbatthapaññattipadesapaññattiādibhedesu. ^b^Taṃ taṃ samādātabbaṃ samādāyā^eb^ti yaṃ kiñci sikkhākoṭṭhāsesu mūlapaññattiādibhedesu sikkhitabbaṃ paṭipajjitabbaṃ pūritabbaṃ kāyikaṃ vācasikaṃ vā sīlaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sammā ādāya, sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvāti attho.

[03]^b^Udayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passatī^eb^ti ‘‘avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Taṇhāsamudayā…pe… kammasamudayā…pe… āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni ^a^V2.0215^ea^ pañca lakkhaṇāni passati. Tathā avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Taṇhāsamudayā…pe… kammasamudayā…pe… phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati. Vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passatī’’tiādinā nayena ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañca pañca katvā vuttāni pañcavīsati udayalakkhaṇāni passati.

[03]^b^Vayaṃ passanto pañcavīsati lakkhaṇāni passatī^eb^ti ‘‘avijjānirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Taṇhānirodhā…pe… kammanirodhā…pe… āhāranirodhā rūpanirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati. Avijjānirodhā…pe… taṇhānirodhā…pe… phassanirodhā vedanānirodhoti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati. Vipariṇāmalakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passatī. Vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati’’tiādinā nayena ekekasmiṃ khandhe pañca pañca katvā vuttāni pañcavīsati vayalakkhaṇāni passati. ^b^Pesitatto^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pati pesitacitto. ^b^Kathayantī^eb^ti tathāvidhaṃ bhikkhuṃ buddhādayo ariyā ācikkhanti.

[03]^b^Yataṃ^eb^^a^M2.0237^ea^^b^care^eb^ti vāyamamāno careyya, caṅkamanādivasena gamanaṃ kappentopi ‘‘anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī’’tiādinā (vibha. 432) nayena vuttappadhānavīriyaṃ karonto ghaṭento vāyamanto yathā akusaladhammā pahīyanti, kusaladhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti, evaṃ gamanaṃ kappeyyāti attho. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Yatamenaṃ pasāraye^eb^ti etaṃ pasāretabbaṃ hatthapādādiṃ yataṃ yatamāno yathāvuttavīriyasamaṅgī hutvā pasāreyya, sabbattha padhānaṃ na jaheyyāti adhippāyo.

[03]Idāni yathā paṭipajjanto yataṃ yatanto nāma hoti, taṃ paṭipadaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘uddha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^uddha^eb^nti upari. ^b^Tiriya^eb^nti parito, puratthimadisādivasena samantato disābhāgesūti attho. ^b^Apācīna^eb^nti heṭṭhā. ^b^Yāvatā jagato gatī^eb^ti yattakā sattasaṅkhārabhedassa lokassa pavatti, tattha sabbatthāti attho. Ettāvatā anavasesatā sammasanañāṇassa visayaṃ saṅgahetvā dasseti. ^b^Samavekkhitā^eb^ti samā hetunā ñāyena avekkhitā, aniccādivasena ^a^V2.0216^ea^ vipassitāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Dhammāna^eb^nti sattasuññānaṃ. ^b^Khandhāna^eb^nti rūpādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ. ^b^Udayabbaya^eb^nti udayañca vayañca. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – upari tiriyaṃ adhoti tidhā saṅgahite sabbasmiṃ loke atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ pañcupādānakkhandhasaṅkhātānaṃ sabbesaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aniccādisammasanādhigatena udayabbayañāṇena pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi udayaṃ, pañcavīsatiyā ākārehi vayaṃ samavekkhitā samanupassitā bhaveyyāti.

[03]^b^Cetosamathasāmīci^eb^nti cittasaṃkilesānaṃ accantavūpasamanato cetosamathasaṅkhātassa ariyamaggassa anucchavikaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiṃ. ^b^Sikkhamāna^eb^nti paṭipajjamānaṃ bhāventaṃ ñāṇaparamparā nibbattentaṃ. ^b^Sadā^eb^ti sabbakālaṃ rattiñceva divā ca. ^b^Sata^eb^nti catusampajaññasamannāgatāya satiyā satokārī. Evampettha gāthāvaṇṇanā daṭṭhabbā. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Sīlasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^13^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^M2.0238^ea^^b^uttamavīriyānī^eb^ti seṭṭhavīriyāni visiṭṭhassa atthassa sādhanato. Māro dhiyyati etthāti ^b^māradheyyaṃ,^eb^ kilesamārassa pavattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ, taṃ tebhūmakavaṭṭanti āha ^b^‘‘tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ māradheyya’’^eb^nti. Jātimaraṇato jātaṃ bhayaṃ ^b^jātimaraṇabhayaṃ,^eb^ jātimaraṇameva vā bhayahetuto bhayanti ^b^jātimaraṇabhayaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘jātiñca maraṇañca…pe… bhayassā’’^eb^ti sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Padhānasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe saṃvarādīnaṃ sādhanavasena padahati etehīti ^b^padhānāni. Saṃvarantassa uppannavīriya^eb^nti yathā abhijjhādayo na uppajjanti, evaṃ satiyā upaṭṭhāne cakkhādīnaṃ pidahane analasassa uppannavīriyaṃ. ^b^Pajahantassā^eb^ti vinodentassa. ^b^Uppannavīriya^eb^nti tasseva pahānassa sādhanavasena pavattavīriyaṃ. ^b^Bhāventassa uppannavīriya^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Samādhinimitta^eb^nti samādhi eva. Purimuppannasamādhi hi parato uppajjanakasamādhissa kāraṇaṃ hotīti ‘‘samādhinimitta’’nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Upadhivivekattā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0217^ea^ khandhūpadhiādiupadhīhi vivittattā vinissaṭattā. ^b^Taṃ āgammā^eb^ti taṃ nibbānaṃ maggena adhigamahetu. Rāgādayo virajjanti ettha, etenāti ^b^virāgo^eb^. Evaṃ ^b^nirodho^eb^pi daṭṭhabbo. Yasmā idha bojjhaṅgamissakavasena icchitā, tasmā ^b^‘‘ārammaṇavasena vā adhigantabbavasena vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^adhigantabbavasenā^eb^ti tanninnatāvasena. ^b^Vossaggapariṇāmi^eb^nti vossaggavasena pariṇāmitaṃ pariccajanavasena ceva pakkhandanavasena ca pariṇāmanasīlaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dve vossaggā’’^eb^tiādi. Khandhānaṃ pariccajanaṃ nāma tappaṭibaddhakilesappahānavasenāti yenākārena vipassanā kilese pajahati, tenevākārena tannimittakkhandhe ca pajahatīti vattabbataṃ arahatīti āha ^b^‘‘vipassanā…pe… pariccajatī’’^eb^ti. Yasmā vipassanā vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvaṃ pāpuṇantī ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena ekaṃsato nibbānaṃ pakkhandatīti vattabbataṃ labhati, maggo ca samucchedavasena kilese ^a^M2.0239^ea^ khandhe ca rāgaṃ pariccajati, tasmā yathākkamaṃ vipassanāmaggānaṃ vasena ^b^pakkhandanapariccāgavossaggā^eb^ veditabbā. ^b^Vosaggatthāyā^eb^ti pariccāgavossaggatthāya ceva pakkhandanavossaggatthāya ca. ^b^Pariṇamatī^eb^ti pariccajati. Taṃ pana pariṇāmanaṃ vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvappattiyā ceva ariyamaggabhāvappattiyā ca icchitanti āha ^b^‘‘vipassanābhāvañca maggabhāvañca pāpuṇātī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sesapadesū^eb^ti ‘‘dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī’’tiādīsu sesasambojjhaṅgakoṭṭhāsesu.

[03]^b^Bhaddaka^eb^nti abhaddakānaṃ nīvaraṇādipāpadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanena rāgavigamanena ekantahitattā dullabhattā ca bhaddakaṃ sundaraṃ. Na hi aññaṃ samādhinimittaṃ evaṃ dullabhaṃ rāgassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ atthi. ^b^Anurakkhatī^eb^ti ettha anurakkhanā nāma adhigatasamādhito yathā parihāni na hoti, evaṃ paṭipattisāsana-tappaṭipakkhavigamanenāti āha ^b^‘‘samādhī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Aṭṭhikasaññādikā^eb^ti aṭṭhikajjhānādikā. Saññāsīsena hi jhānaṃ vadati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Saṃvarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame attabhāvo etesaṃ atthīti attabhāvino, tesaṃ ^b^attabhāvīnaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attabhāvavantāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Yāva chattiṃsāya indānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, tāva paṇīte kāme paribhuñjī^eb^ti mandhāturājā kira ekadivasaṃ attano pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pucchi – ‘‘atthi nu kho manussalokato ramaṇīyataraṃ ṭhāna’’nti. Kasmā deva evaṃ bhaṇasi, kiṃ na passasi candimasūriyānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ, nanu etesaṃ ṭhānaṃ ito ramaṇīyataranti? Rājā cakkaratanaṃ purakkhatvā tattha agamāsi.

[03]Cattāro ^a^V2.0218^ea^ mahārājāno ‘‘mandhātumahārājā āgato’’ti sutvā ‘‘tāvamahiddhiko mahārājā na sakkā yuddhena paṭibāhitu’’nti sakarajjaṃ niyyātesuṃ. So taṃ gahetvā puna pucchi – ‘‘atthi nu kho ito ramaṇīyataraṃ ṭhāna’’nti. Athassa tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ kathayiṃsu. ‘‘Tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ, deva, ramaṇīyaṃ, tattha sakkassa devarañño ime cattāro mahārājāno ^a^M2.0240^ea^ pāricārikā dovārikabhūmiyaṃ tiṭṭhanti. Sakko devarājā mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo. Tassimāni upabhogaṭṭhānāni – yojanasahassubbedho vejayantapāsādo, pañcayojanasatubbedhā sudhammadevasabhā, diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko vejayantaratho, tathā erāvaṇo hatthī, dibbarukkhasahassappaṭimaṇḍitaṃ nandanavanaṃ, cittalatāvanaṃ, phārusakavanaṃ, yojanasatubbedho pāricchattako koviḷāro, tassa heṭṭhā saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā paññāsayojanavitthārā pañcadasayojanubbedhā jayasumanapupphavaṇṇā paṇḍukambalasilā, yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo anuppavisatī’’ti.

[03]Taṃ sutvā rājā tattha gantukāmo cakkaratanaṃ abbhukkiri. Taṃ ākāse uṭṭhahi saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya. Atha dvinnaṃ devalokānaṃ vemajjhato cakkaratanaṃ otaritvā pathaviyā āsanne ṭhāne aṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ pariṇāyakaratanappamukhāya caturaṅginiyā senāya. Rājā ekakova attano ānubhāvena tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ agamāsi. Sakko ‘‘mandhātā āgato’’ti sutvā tassa paccuggamanaṃ katvā ‘‘svāgataṃ, mahārāja, sakaṃ, te mahārāja, anusāsa mahārājā’’ti vatvā saddhiṃ nāṭakehi rajjaṃ dve bhāge katvā ekaṃ bhāgamadāsi. Rañño tāvatiṃsabhavane patiṭṭhitamattasseva manussagandhasarīranissandādimanussabhāvo vigacchi, devaloke pavattivipākadāyino aparapariyāyavedanīyassa kammassa katokāsattā sabbadā soḷasavassuddesikatāmālāmilāyanādidevabhāvo pāturahosi. Tassa sakkena saddhiṃ paṇḍukambalasilāya nisinnassa akkhinimisanamattena nānattaṃ paññāyati. Taṃ asallakkhentā devā sakkassa ca tassa ca nānatte muyhanti. So tattha dibbasampattiṃ anubhavamāno tadā manussānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāya yāva chattiṃsa sakkā upapajjitvā cutā, tāva sakkarajjaṃ kāretvā ‘‘kiṃ me iminā upaḍḍharajjenā’’ti atitto kāmehi tato cavitvā attano uyyāne patito manussaloke utukakkhaḷatāya vātātapena phusitagatto kālamakāsi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘devaloke pana yāva chattiṃsāya indānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, tāva paṇīte kāme paribhuñjī’’^eb^ti.
[06]Paññattisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M2.0241^ea^^a^V2.0219^ea^^b^sukhumalakkhaṇappaṭivijjhanakānī^eb^ti aniccādisukhumalakkhaṇānaṃ paṭivijjhanakāni. ^b^Sukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakañāṇenā^eb^ti sukhumalakkhaṇapariggāhakena ñāṇena. ^b^Parato jānitvā^eb^ti avasavattanena aññato jānitvā. Saṅkhārā hi ‘‘mā bhijjiṃsū’’ti icchitāpi bhijjanteva, tasmā te avasavattitāya pare nāma. Sā ca nesaṃ paratā aniccadassane pākaṭā hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iminā hi padena aniccānupassanā kathitā’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Sokhummasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^17-20^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^chandāgati^eb^nti ettha sandhivasena saralopoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘chandena agati’’^eb^nti. ^b^Chandā^eb^ti hetumhi nissakkavacananti āha ^b^‘‘chandenā’’^eb^ti, pemenāti attho. Chandasaddo hettha taṇhāpariyāyo, akusalacchandapariyāyo vā. ^b^Sesesū^eb^ti ‘‘dosāgatiṃ gacchatī’’tiādīsu.

[03]Ettha ca yo ‘‘ayaṃ me mittoti vā, sandiṭṭhoti vā, ñātakoti vā, lañcaṃ vā pana me detī’’ti chandavasena assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ chandena akattabbaṃ karoti nāma. Yo ‘‘ayaṃ me verī’’ti cirakālānubaddhaveravasena vā, taṅkhaṇuppannakodhavasena vā sāmikaṃ assāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ dosena akattabbaṃ karoti nāma. Yo pana mandattā momūhattā yaṃ vā taṃ vā ayuttaṃ akāraṇaṃ vatvā assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ mohena akattabbaṃ karoti nāma. Yo pana ‘‘ayaṃ rājavallabhoti vā visame corādike visamāni vā kāyaduccaritādīni samādāya vattanena visamanissito vā, anatthampi me kareyyā’’ti bhīto assāmikaṃ sāmikaṃ karoti, ayaṃ bhayena akattabbaṃ karoti nāma.

[03]Yo pana kiñci bhājento ‘‘ayaṃ me sandiṭṭho vā sambhatto vā’’ti pemavasena atirekaṃ deti, ‘‘ayaṃ me verī’’ti dosavasena ūnakaṃ deti ^a^M2.0242^ea^, yo muyhanto dinnādinnaṃ ajānamāno kassaci ūnaṃ, kassaci adhikaṃ deti, ‘‘ayaṃ imasmiṃ adīyamāne mayhaṃ anatthampi ^a^V2.0220^ea^ kareyyā’’ti sīto kassaci atirekaṃ deti, so catubbidhopi yathānukkamena chandāgatiādīni gacchanto akattabbaṃ karoti nāma.

[03]^b^Nihīyati tassa yaso^eb^ti tassa agatigāmino kittiyasopi parivārayasopi nihīyati parihāyati. Yassati tena kittīyatīti hi yaso, kitti thutighoso. Yassati tena purecarānucarabhāvena parivārayatīti yaso, parivāro. Aṭṭhamanavamadasamāni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Caravaggo dutiyo.

[03]^b^21^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiyassa paṭhame mahāvelā viya ^b^mahāvelā,^eb^ vipulavālikapuñjatāya mahanto velātaṭo viyāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahāvālikarāsīti attho’’^eb^ti. Uru, maru, sikatā, vālukā, vaṇṇu, vālikāti ime saddā samānatthā, byañjanameva nānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘urūti vālikā vuccatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Najjā^eb^ti nadati saddāyatīti nadī, tassā najjā, nadiyā ninnagāyāti attho. ^b^Nerañjarāyā^eb^ti ‘‘nelañjalāyā’’ti vattabbe la-kārassa ra-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘nerañjarāyā’’ti vuttaṃ, kaddamasevālapaṇakādidosarahitasalilāyāti attho. Keci ‘‘nīlaṃ-jalāyāti vattabbe nerañjarāyā’’ti vadanti. Nāmameva vā etaṃ tassā nadiyāti veditabbaṃ. Tassā nadiyā tīre yattha bhagavā vihāsi, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ajapālanigrodhe’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā panāyaṃ ajapālanigrodho nāma jātoti āha ^b^‘‘tassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Keci^eb^ pana ‘‘yasmā tattha vede sajjhāyituṃ asamatthā mahallakabrāhmaṇā pākāraparikkhepayuttāni nivesanāni katvā sabbe vasiṃsu, tasmāssa ajapālanigrodhoti nāmaṃ jāta’’nti vadanti ^a^M2.0243^ea^. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – na japantīti ajapā, mantānaṃ anajjhāyakāti attho. Ajapālanti ādiyanti nivāsaṃ etthāti ^b^ajapālo^eb^ti. Apare ^a^V2.0221^ea^ pana vadanti ‘‘yasmā majjhanhikasamaye antopaviṭṭhe aje attano chāyāya pāleti rakkhati, tasmā ‘ajapālo’tissa nāmaṃ ruḷha’’nti. Sabbatthāpi nāmametaṃ tassa rukkhassa.

[03]^b^Paṭhamābhisambuddho^eb^ti paṭhamaṃ abhisambuddho, anunāsikalopenāyaṃ niddeso. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘sambuddho hutvā paṭhamamevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭhama^eb^nti ca bhāvanapuṃsakaniddeso, tasmā abhisambuddho hutvā paṭhamaṃ ajapālanigrodhe viharāmīti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. ^b^Ayaṃ vitakko^eb^ti ayaṃ ‘‘kinnu khvāhaṃ…pe… vihareyya’’nti evaṃ pavattavitakko. Hatthī ca vānaro ca tittiro ca ^b^hatthivānaratittirā^eb^.

[03]^b^Ye vuddhamapacāyantī^eb^ti jātivuddho, vayovuddho, guṇavuddhoti tayo vuddhā. Tesu jātisampanno ^b^jātivuddho^eb^ nāma, vaye ṭhito ^b^vayovuddho^eb^ nāma, guṇasampanno ^b^guṇavuddho^eb^ nāma. Tesu guṇasampanno vayovuddho imasmiṃ ṭhāne vuddhoti adhippeto. ^b^Apacāyantī^eb^ti jeṭṭhāpacāyikākammena pūjenti. ^b^Dhammassa kovidā^eb^ti jeṭṭhāpacāyanadhammassa kovidā kusalā. ^b^Diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve. ^b^Pāsaṃsā^eb^ti pasaṃsārahā. ^b^Samparāye ca suggatī^eb^ti samparetabbe imaṃ lokaṃ hitvā gantabbe paralokepi tesaṃ sugatiyeva. Ayaṃ panettha piṇḍattho – khattiyā vā hontu brāhmaṇā vā vessā vā suddā vā gahaṭṭhā vā pabbajitā vā tiracchānagatā vā, ye keci sattā jeṭṭhāpacitikammena sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ vayovuddhānaṃ apacitiṃ karonti, te imasmiñca attabhāve jeṭṭhāpacitikārakāti pasaṃsaṃ vaṇṇanaṃ thomanaṃ labhanti, kāyassa ca bhedā sagge nibbattantīti.

[03]^b^Aññasmi^eb^nti parasmiṃ. Attā na hotīti ^b^añño,^eb^ paro. So panettha na yo koci adhippeto, atha kho garuṭṭhāniyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kañci garuṭṭhāne aṭṭhapetvā’’^eb^ti. Patissati garuno āṇaṃ sampaṭicchatīti patisso, na patisso ^b^appatisso, patissayarahito,^eb^ garupassayarahitoti attho.

[03]^b^Sadevake^eb^ti ^a^M2.0244^ea^ avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho. ^b^Sadevaka^eb^ggahaṇena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ pārisesañāyena itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā. ^b^Samāraka^eb^ggahaṇena chaṭṭhakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ paccāsattiñāyena. Tattha hi māro jāto tannivāsī ca hoti. ^b^Sabrahmaka^eb^vacanena brahmakāyikādibrahmaggahaṇaṃ paccāsattiñāyeneva. ^b^Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāyā^eb^ti sāsanassa paccatthikasamaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇaṃ. Nidassanamattañcetaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ asamitābāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ ^a^V2.0222^ea^ teneva vacanena gahitattā. Kāmaṃ ‘‘sadevake’’tiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ, ‘‘salomako sapakkhako’’tiādīsu pana atulyayoge ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato ^b^pajā^eb^gahaṇanti pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇaṃ.

[03]Devabhāvasāmaññena mārabrahmesu gahitesupi itarehi tesaṃ labbhamānavisesadassanatthaṃ visuṃ gahaṇanti dassento ^b^‘‘māro nāmā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Māro brahmānampi vicakkhukammāya pahotīti āha ^b^‘‘sabbesa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uparī^eb^ti uparibhāge. ^b^Brahmā^eb^ti dasasahassibrahmānaṃ sandhāyāha. Tathā cāha ^b^‘‘dasahi aṅgulīhī’’^eb^tiādi. Idha dīghanikāyādayo viya bāhirakānampi ganthanikāyo labbhatīti āha ^b^‘‘ekanikāyādivasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vatthuvijjādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena vijjāṭṭhānāni saṅgayhanti. Yathāsakaṃ kammakilesehi pajātattā nibbattattā pajā, sattanikāyo, tassā ^b^pajāya. Sadevamanussāyā^eb^ti vā iminā sammutidevaggahaṇaṃ tadavasiṭṭhamanussalokaggahaṇañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Evaṃ bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni abhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicetthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Lokavasena vuttāni^eb^ ‘‘lokīyanti ettha kammaṃ kammaphalānī’’ti katvā. ^b^Pajāvasena^eb^ ‘‘hetupaccayehi pajātā’’ti katvā. ^b^Sīlasampannatara^eb^nti ettha paripuṇṇasampannatā adhippetā ‘‘sampannaṃ sālikedāra’’ntiādīsu (jā. 1.14.1) viya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘adhikataranti attho’’^eb^ti. Paripuṇṇañhi adhikataranti vattuṃ arahati. ^b^Kāraṇa^eb^nti yuttiṃ. ^b^Attha^eb^nti aviparītatthaṃ. ^b^Vaḍḍhi^eb^nti ativaḍḍhinimittaṃ.

[03]^b^Iminā^eb^^a^M2.0245^ea^^b^vacanenā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sutte anantaraṃ vuttavacanena. Na kevalaṃ imināva, suttantarampi ānetvā paṭibāhitabboti dassento ^b^‘‘na me ācariyo atthī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^na me ācariyo atthī^eb^ti lokuttaradhamme mayhaṃ ācariyo nāma natthi. Kiñcāpi lokiyadhammānampi yādiso lokanāthassa adhigamo, na tādiso adhigamo parūpadeso atthi. Lokuttaradhamme panassa lesopi natthi. ^b^Natthi me paṭipuggalo^eb^ti mayhaṃ sīlādīhi guṇehi paṭinidhibhūto puggalo nāma natthi. ^b^Sara^eb^nti karaṇe etaṃ paccattavacananti āha ^b^‘‘sarantenā’’^eb^ti, ^b^sara^eb^nti vā saraṇahetu cāti attho.

[03]^b^Yato^eb^ti bhummatthe tosaddoti āha ^b^‘‘yasmiṃ kāle’’^eb^ti. Rattiyo jānantīti rattaññū, attano pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bahū rattiyo jānanti, cirapabbajitāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rattaññūnaṃ ^a^V2.0223^ea^ mahantabhāvo ^b^rattaññumahantaṃ^eb^. Bhāvappadhāno esa niddeso. ‘‘Rattaññumahatta’’nti vā pāṭho. Esa nayo sesesupi. Theranavamajjhimānaṃ vasena vipulabhāvo ^b^vepullamahantaṃ^eb^. Sikkhattayasaṅgahitassa sāsanabrahmacariyassa jhānābhiññādivasena vipulabhāvo ^b^brahmacariyamahantaṃ^eb^. Visiṭṭhassa paccayalābhassa vipulabhāvo ^b^lābhaggamahantaṃ. Catubbidhena mahantenā^eb^ti catubbidhena mahantabhāvena. ^b^Mahāpajāpatiyā dussayugadānakāle^eb^ti bhagavato saṅghe gāravassa pākaṭakāladassanamattaṃ. Na hi bhagavā tato pubbe saṅghe gāravarahito vihāsi.
[06]Paṭhamauruvelasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^22^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^huhuṅkajātikenā^eb^ti so kira diṭṭhamaṅgaliko mānavasena kodhavasena ca ‘‘huhu’’nti karonto vicarati, tasmā huhuṅkajātikoti vuccati. ‘‘Huhukkajātiko’’tipi paṭhanti, tena saddhiṃ āgatāti attho. ^b^Jarājiṇṇā^eb^ti jarāya khaṇḍadantapalitakesādibhāvaṃ āpāditā. ^b^Vayovuddhā^eb^ti aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ vuddhimariyādappattā. ^b^Jātimahallakā^eb^ti upapattiyā mahallakabhāvena samannāgatā. Mahattaṃ lanti gaṇhantīti ^a^M2.0246^ea^ mahallakā, jātiyā mahallakā, na vibhavādināti jātimahallakā. ^b^Vayoanuppattā^eb^ti pacchimavayaṃ sampattā, pacchimavayo nāma vassasatassa pacchimo tatiyo bhāgo. ^b^Jiṇṇā^eb^ti vā porāṇā, cirakālappavattakulanvayāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Vuddhā^eb^ti sīlācārādiguṇavuddhiyuttā. ^b^Mahallakā^eb^ti vibhavamahantatāya samannāgatā. ^b^Mahaddhanā^eb^ti mahābhogā. ^b^Addhagatā^eb^ti maggappaṭipannā brāhmaṇānaṃ vatacariyādimariyādaṃ avītikkamma caramānā. ^b^Vayoanuppattā^eb^ti jātivuddhabhāvaṃ antimavayaṃ anuppattā. ^b^Sutaṃ neta^eb^nti ettha sutaṃ no etanti padacchedo. ^b^No^eb^ti ca karaṇatthe sāmivacanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘amhehi suta’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Akāle^eb^ti ayuttakāle. ^b^Asabhāvaṃ vadatī^eb^ti yaṃ natthi, taṃ vadati. ^b^Anatthaṃ vadatī^eb^ti akāraṇanissitaṃ vadati. ^b^Akāraṇanissita^eb^nti ca nipphalanti attho. Phalañhi kāraṇanissitaṃ. Akāraṇanissitatā ca tadavinābhāvato akāraṇe nissitaṃ, nipphalaṃ samphanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Avinayaṃ vadatī^eb^ti na saṃvaravinayappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ vadati, attano suṇantassa ca na saṃvaravinayāvahaṃ vadatīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Na hadaye nidhetabbayuttaka^eb^nti ahitasaṃhitattā cittaṃ anuppavesetvā nidhetuṃ ayuttaṃ. ^b^Kathetuṃ ayuttakālenā^eb^ti dhammaṃ kathentena yo attho yasmiṃ kāle ^a^V2.0224^ea^ vattabbo, tato pubbe pacchā ca tassa akālo, tasmiṃ ayuttakāle vattā. ^b^Apadesarahita^eb^nti suttāpadesarahitaṃ. ^b^Sāpadesaṃ sakāraṇaṃ katvā na kathetī^eb^ti ‘‘bhagavatā asuke sutte evaṃ vutta’’nti evaṃ sāpadesaṃ kāraṇasahitaṃ katvā na katheti.

[03]^b^Pariyantarahita^eb^nti paricchedarahitaṃ, suttaṃ vā jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitvā tassa anuyogaṃ upamaṃ vā vatthuṃ vā āharitvā yaṃ suttaṃ jātakaṃ vā nikkhipitaṃ, tassa sarīrabhūtaṃ kathaṃ anāmasitvā bāhirakathaṃyeva katheti, nikkhittaṃ nikkhittamattameva hoti, ‘‘suttaṃ nu kho katheti jātakaṃ nu kho, nāssa antaṃ vā koṭiṃ vā passāmā’’ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. Yathā vaṭarukkhasākhānaṃ gatagataṭṭhāne pārohā otaranti, otiṇṇo-tiṇṇaṭṭhāne viruḷhiṃ āpajjitvā puna vaḍḍhantiyeva, evaṃ aḍḍhayojanampi yojanampi gacchatiyeva. Gacchante gacchante pana mūlarukkho vinassati, anujātapārohamūlāniyeva tiṭṭhanti, evaṃ ayampi nigrodhadhammakathiko nāma hoti. Nikkhittaṃ nikkhittameva katvā passeneva pariharanto gacchati. Yo pana bahumpi ^a^M2.0247^ea^ bhaṇanto ‘‘etadatthamidaṃ vutta’’nti nikkhittasuttato aññampi anuyogūpamāvatthuvasena tadupayogīnaṃ āharitvā āharitvā jānāpetuṃ sakkoti, tathārūpassa dhammakathikassa bahumpi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^Na lokiyalokuttarātthanissita^eb^nti attano paresañca na lokiyalokuttarahitāvahaṃ.

[03]Pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttivasena ca buddhādīhi bhāsitattā pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti ^b^pāḷi,^eb^ pariyattidhammo. Purimassa atthassa pacchimena atthena anusandhānaṃ ^b^anusandhi,^eb^ atthamukhena pana pāḷippadesānampi anusandhi hotiyeva. Svāyaṃ anusandhi pucchānusandhiajjhāsayānusandhiyathānusandhiādivasena catubbidho, taṃtaṃdesanānaṃ pana pubbāparapāḷivasena anusandhivasena ^b^pubbāparavasenā^eb^ti paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Uggahita^eb^nti byañjanaso atthaso ca uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gahitaṃ, pariyāpuṇanavasena ceva paripucchāvasena ca hadayena gahitanti attho. Vaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇatthikehi sotabbato ^b^sutaṃ,^eb^ pariyattidhammo. Taṃ dhāretīti ^b^sutadharo^eb^. Yo hi sutadharo, sutaṃ tasmiṃ patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti suppatiṭṭhitaṃ arogikaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sutassa ādhārabhūto’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. Ekaṃ padaṃ ekakkharampi avinaṭṭhaṃ hutvā sannicīyatīti sannicayo, sutaṃ sannicayo etasminti ^b^sutasannicayo. Ajjhosāyā^eb^ti anuppavisitvā. ^b^Tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti na sammussati.

[03]^b^Paguṇā^eb^ti vācuggatā. ^b^Niccalika^eb^nti aviparivattaṃ. ^b^Saṃsanditvā^eb^ti aññehi saṃsanditvā. ^b^Samanuggāhitvā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0225^ea^ paripucchāvasena atthaṃ ogāhitvā. Pabandhassa vicchedābhāvato ^b^gaṅgāsotasadisaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Bhavaṅgasotasadisa’’nti vā pāṭho, akittimaṃ sukhappavattīti attho. Suttekadesassa suttamattassa ca vacasā paricayo idha nādhippeto, vaggādivasena pana adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘suttadasaka…pe… sajjhāyitā’’^eb^ti, ‘‘dasasuttāni gatāni, dasavaggāni gatānī’’tiādinā sallakkhetvā vācāya sajjhāyitāti attho. Manasā anu anu pekkhitā bhāgaso nijjhāyitā cintitā ^b^manasānupekkhitā. Rūpagataṃ viya paññāyatī^eb^ti rūpagataṃ viya cakkhussa vibhūtaṃ hutvā paññāyati. ^b^Suppaṭividdhā^eb^ti nijjaṭaṃ niggumbaṃ katvā suṭṭhu yāthāvato paṭividdhā.

[03]Adhikaṃ ^a^M2.0248^ea^ cetoti ^b^abhiceto,^eb^ upacārajjhānacittaṃ. Tassa pana adhikatā pākatikakāmāvacaracittehi sundaratāya, sā paṭipakkhato suddhiyāti āha ^b^‘‘abhikkantaṃ visuddhaṃ citta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Adhicitta^eb^nti samādhimāha. Sopi upacārasamādhi daṭṭhabbo. Vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ, samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ, apītijaṃ kāyasukhaṃ, satipārisuddhijaṃ ñāṇasukhanti catubbidhampi jhānasukhaṃ paṭipakkhato nikkhantataṃ upādāya nekkhammasukhanti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘nekkhammasukhaṃ vindatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjituṃ samattho^eb^ti iminā tesu jhānesu samāpajjanavasībhāvamāha. ^b^Nikāmalābhī^eb^ti pana vacanato āvajjanādhiṭṭhānapaccavekkhaṇavasiyopi vuttā evāti veditabbā. ^b^Sukheneva paccanīkadhamme vikkhambhetvā^eb^ti etena tesaṃ jhānānaṃ sukhappaṭipadataṃ khippābhiññatañca dasseti.

[03]^b^Vipulāna^eb^nti vepullaṃ pāpitānaṃ jhānānaṃ. Vipulatā nāma subhāvitabhāvena ciratarappavattiyā, sā ca paricchedānurūpāva icchitabbāti ^b^‘‘vipulāna’’^eb^nti vatvā ^b^‘‘yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthoti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti āha. Paricchedakālañhi appatvāva vuṭṭhahanto akasiralābhī na hoti yāvadicchitaṃ pavattetuṃ asamatthattā. Idāni yathāvutte samāpajjanādivasībhāve byatirekavasena vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘ekacco hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^lābhīyeva hotī^eb^ti idaṃ paṭiladdhamattassa jhānassa vasena vuttaṃ. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti icchiticchitakkhaṇe. ^b^Pāripanthike^eb^ti vasībhāvassa paccanīkadhamme. Jhānādhigamassa pana paccanīkadhammā pageva vikkhambhitā, aññathā jhānādhigamo eva na siyā. ^b^Kicchena vikkhambhetī^eb^ti kicchena visodheti. Kāmādīnavapaccavekkhaṇādīhi kāmacchandādīnaṃ viya aññesampi samādhipāripanthikānaṃ dūrasamussāraṇaṃ idha vikkhambhanaṃ visodhanañcāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Nāḷikayanta^eb^nti kālamānanāḷikayantamāha.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhapitasaṅkappo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0226^ea^ na sammāpaṇihitasaṅkappo. ^b^Abhiññāpāragū^eb^ti sabbesaṃ lokiyalokuttaradhammānaṃ abhiññāya pāraṃ gato, sabbadhamme abhivisiṭṭhāya aggamaggapaññāya jānitvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^Pariññāpāragū^eb^ti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ pariññāya pāraṃ gato, pañcakkhandhe parijānitvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^Bhāvanāpāragū^eb^ti catunnaṃ maggānaṃ bhāvanāya pāraṃ gato, cattāro magge bhāvetvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^Pahānapāragū^eb^ti sabbakilesānaṃ pahānena pāraṃ gato, sabbakilese pajahitvā ṭhitoti attho ^a^M2.0249^ea^. ^b^Sacchikiriyāpāragū^eb^ti nirodhasacchikiriyāya pāraṃ gato, nirodhaṃ sacchikatvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^Samāpattipāragū^eb^ti sabbasamāpattīnaṃ samāpajjanena pāraṃ gato, sabbā samāpattiyo samāpajjitvā ṭhitoti attho. ^b^Brahmacariyassa kevalī^eb^ti yaṃ brahmacariyassa kevalaṃ sakalabhāvo, tena samannāgato, sakalacatumaggabrahmacariyavāsoti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sakalabrahmacariyo’’^eb^ti, paripuṇṇamaggabrahmacariyoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Dutiyauruvelasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^23^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^b^loko^eb^ti lujjanapalujjanaṭṭhena loko. Atthato purimasmiṃ ariyasaccadvayaṃ, idha pana dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ veditabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lokoti dukkhasacca’’^eb^nti. ^b^Visaṃyutto^eb^ti visaṃsaṭṭho na paṭibaddho, sabbesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ sammadeva samucchinnattā tato vippamuttoti attho. ^b^Lokasamudayo^eb^ti suttantanayena taṇhā, abhidhammanayena pana abhisaṅkhārehi saddhiṃ diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ. ^b^Lokanirodho^eb^ti nibbānaṃ. ^b^Sacchikato^eb^ti attapaccakkho kato. ^b^Lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadā^eb^ti sīlādikkhandhattayasaṅgaho ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo. So hi lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ gacchati adhigacchati, tadatthaṃ ariyehi paṭipajjīyati cāti lokanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti vuccati.
[03]Ettāvatā tathāni abhisambuddho yāthāvato gatoti ^b^tathāgato^eb^ti ayamattho dassito hoti. Cattāri hi ariyasaccāni tathāni nāma. Yathāha –
[08]‘‘Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, tathāni avitathāni anaññathāni. Katamāni cattāri? Idaṃ dukkhanti, bhikkhave, tathametaṃ avitathametaṃ anaññathameta’’nti (saṃ. ni. 5.1090; paṭi. ma. 2.8) vitthāro.

[03]Apica ^a^V2.0227^ea^ tathāya gatoti ^b^tathāgato, gato^eb^ti ca avagato atīto patto paṭipannoti attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yasmā bhagavā ^a^M2.0250^ea^ sakalalokaṃ tīraṇapariññāya tathāya aviparītāya gato avagato, tasmā loko tathāgatena abhisambuddhoti tathāgato. Lokasamudayaṃ pahānapariññāya tathāya gato atītoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhaṃ sacchikiriyāya tathāya gato pattoti tathāgato. Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ tathaṃ aviparītaṃ gato paṭipannoti tathāgatoti. Evaṃ imissā pāḷiyā tathāgatabhāvadīpanavasena attho veditabbo.

[03]Iti bhagavā catusaccābhisambodhavasena attano tathāgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetvā idāni tattha diṭṭhādiabhisambodhavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yaṃ, bhikkhave’’^eb^tiādimāha. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘catūhi saccehi attano buddhabhāvaṃ kathetvā’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ tathāgatasaddabuddhasaddānaṃ atthato ninnānākaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Tathā ceva hi pāḷi pavattāti. ^b^Diṭṭhanti rūpāyatanaṃ^eb^ daṭṭhabbato. Tena yaṃ diṭṭhaṃ yaṃ dissati, yaṃ dakkhati, yaṃ samavāye passeyya, taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhanteva gahitaṃ kālavisesassa anāmaṭṭhabhāvato yathā ‘‘duddha’’nti dasseti. ^b^Suta^eb^ntiādīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^Sutanti saddāyatanaṃ^eb^ sotabbato. ^b^Muta^eb^nti sanissaye indriye nissayaṃ muñcitvā pāpuṇitvā gahetabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘patvā gahetabbato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Viññāta^eb^nti vijānitabbaṃ. Taṃ pana diṭṭhādivinimuttaṃ viññeyyanti āha ^b^‘‘sukhadukkhādi dhammārammaṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Patta^eb^nti yathā tathā patvā hatthagataṃ, adhigatanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pariyesitvā vā apariyesitvā vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pariyesita^eb^nti pattiyā atthaṃ pariyiṭṭhaṃ. Taṃ pana pattaṃ vā siyā appattaṃ vā, ubhayathāpi pariyesitamevāti āha ^b^‘‘pattaṃ vā appattaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Dvayenapi dvippakārampi pattaṃ dvippakārampi pariyesitaṃ tena tena pakārena tathāgatena abhisambuddhanti dasseti. ^b^Cittena anusañcarita^eb^nti te pana apāpetvā citteneva anu anu sañcaritaṃ, viparitakkitanti attho.

[03]^b^Pītakantiādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^saddena lohitaodātādisabbaṃ rūpārammaṇabhāgaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Sumano^eb^ti rāgavasena lobhavasena saddhādivasena vā sumano. ^b^Dummano^eb^ti byāpādavitakkavasena vā vihiṃsāvitakkavasena vā dummano. ^b^Majjhatto^eb^ti aññāṇavasena, ñāṇavasena vā majjhatto. Esa nayo sabbattha. Tattha ^b^ādi^eb^saddena saṅkhasaddo, paṇavasaddo, pattagandho, pupphagandho, puppharaso, phalaraso, upādinnaṃ, anupādinnaṃ, majjhattavedanā ^a^M2.0251^ea^ kusalakammaṃ akusalakammanti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Appatta^eb^nti ñāṇena asampattaṃ, aviditanti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ñāṇena asacchikata’’^eb^nti. ^b^Lokena gata^eb^nti lokena ñātaṃ. ^b^Tatheva gatattā^eb^ti tatheva ñātattā abhisambuddhattā ^a^V2.0228^ea^, gatasaddena ekattaṃ buddhiatthanti attho. Gatiattho hi dhātavo buddhiatthā bhavantīti akkharacintakā.

[03]^b^Yañca, bhikkhave, ratiṃ tathāgato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambujjhatī^eb^ti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃ tathāāgatattādiatthena tathāgato bhagavā bodhimaṇḍe aparājitapallaṅke nisinno tiṇṇaṃ mārānaṃ matthakaṃ madditvā uttaritarābhāvato anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ adhigacchati. ^b^Yañca rattiṃ anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyatī^eb^ti yassañca visākhapuṇṇamāya rattiyaṃyeva kusinārāyaṃ upavattane mallānaṃ sālavane yamakasālānamantare anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyati. ^b^Yaṃ etasmiṃ antare^eb^ti imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ saupādisesānupādisesanibbānadhātūnaṃ majjhe pañcacattālīsavassaparimāṇakāle paṭhamabodhiyampi majjhimabodhiyampi pacchimabodhiyampi yaṃ suttageyyādippabhedaṃ dhammaṃ ^b^bhāsati^eb^ nidassanavasena, ^b^lapati^eb^ uddisanavasena, ^b^niddisati^eb^ pariniddisanavasena. ^b^Sabbaṃ taṃ tatheva hotī^eb^ti taṃ etthantare desitaṃ sabbaṃ suttageyyādinavaṅgaṃ buddhavacanaṃ atthato byañjanato ca anūnaṃ anadhikaṃ sabbākāraparipuṇṇaṃ rāgamadanimmadanaṃ dosamadanimmadanaṃ mohamadanimmadanaṃ, natthi tattha vālaggamattampi avakkhalitaṃ, ekamuddikāya lañchitaṃ viya ekāya nāḷiyā mitaṃ viya ekatulāya tulitaṃ viya ca taṃ tatheva hoti yassatthāya bhāsitaṃ, ekanteneva tassa sādhanato, ^b^no aññathā,^eb^ tasmā tathaṃ avitathaṃ anaññathaṃ. Etena tathāvāditāya tathāgatoti dasseti. Gadāttho ayaṃ gatasaddo da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā, tasmā tathaṃ gadatīti tathāgatoti attho. Atha vā āgadanaṃ āgado, vacananti attho. Tato aviparīto āgado assāti da-kārassa ta-kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti evamettha padasiddhi veditabbā.

[03]^b^Yathāvādī^eb^ti ye dhamme bhagavā ‘‘ime dhammā akusalā sāvajjā viññugarahitā samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī’’ti paresaṃ dhammaṃ desento vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ pahāsi. Ye pana ^a^M2.0252^ea^ dhamme bhagavā – ‘‘ime dhammā kusalā anavajjā viññuppasatthā samattā samādinnā hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantī’’ti vadati, te dhamme ekanteneva sayaṃ upasampajja viharati, tasmā yathāvādī bhagavā tathākārīti veditabbo. Tathā sammadeva sīlādiparipūraṇavasena sammāpaṭipadāyaṃ yathākārī bhagavā, tatheva dhammadesanāya paresaṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpanavasena ^b^tathāvādī^eb^. Bhagavato hi vācāya kāyo anulometi, kāyassapi vācā, tasmā ^a^V2.0229^ea^ yathāvādī tathākārī, yathākārī tathāvādī ca hoti. Evaṃbhūtassa ca yathā vācā, kāyopi tathā gato pavatto. Yathā ca kāyo, vācāpi tathā gatā pavattāti attho.

[03]^b^Abhibhū anabhibhūto^eb^ti upari bhavaggaṃ, heṭṭhā avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu bhagavā sabbasatte abhibhavati sīlenapi samādhināpi paññāyapi vimuttiyāpi, na tassa tulā vā pamāṇaṃ vā atthi. Asamo asamasamo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo atulo appameyyo anuttaro dhammarājā devadevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā, tato eva ayaṃ na kenaci abhibhūto. ^b^Dakkhatī^eb^ti sabbaṃ passati. Visesavacanicchāyapi abhāvato anavasesavisayo dasasaddo. Tena yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ nāma, sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya passatīti dīpeti. Aviparītaṃ āsayādiavabodhena hitūpasaṃhārādinā ca satte, bhāvaññatthattūpanayavasena saṅkhāre, sabbākārena suciṇṇavasitāya samāpattiyo, cittañca vase vattetīti ^b^vasavattī^eb^ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Visaṃyutto^eb^ti catūhi yogehi visaṃyutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catunnaṃ yogānaṃ pahānena visaṃyutto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṇhādiṭṭhiupayehi virahito^eb^ti sabbasmimpi loke taṇhādiṭṭhisaṅkhātehi upayehi virahito.

[03]^b^Abhibhavitvā ṭhito^eb^ti tabbisayakilesappahānena abhibhuyya atikkamitvā ṭhito. ^b^Cattāropi ganthe mocetvā ṭhito^eb^ti sabbe abhijjhākāyaganthādike sakasantānato mocetvā ṭhito. Veneyyasantāne vā attano desanāvilāsena tesaṃ pamocanoti ^b^sabbaganthappamocano. Phuṭṭhassa paramā santī^eb^ti assa anena khīṇāsavena buddhena ^a^M2.0253^ea^ paramā santi ñāṇaphusanena phuṭṭhāti evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘phuṭṭhassā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Nibbāne kutoci bhayaṃ natthī^eb^ti kutoci bhayakāraṇato nibbāne bhayaṃ natthi asaṅkhatabhāvena sabbaso khemattā. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘khemañca vo, bhikkhave, dhammaṃ desessāmi khemagāminiñca paṭipada’’ntiādi (saṃ. ni. 4.379-408). Nibbānappattassa vā kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti ^b^nibbānaṃ akutobhaya^eb^nti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo, na kutoci bhayaṃ ettha etasmiṃ adhigateti ^b^akutobhayaṃ,^eb^ nibbānanti evamettha nibbacanañca daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Anīgho^eb^ niddukkho. ^b^Sabbakammakkhayaṃ patto^eb^ti sabbesaṃ kammānaṃ khayaṃ pariyosānaṃ accantabhāvaṃ patto. Upadhī sammadeva khīyanti etthāti ^b^upadhisaṅkhayo,^eb^ nibbānanti āha ^b^‘‘upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne’’^eb^ti. ^b^Cakka^eb^nti dhammacakkaṃ. ^b^Pavattayī^eb^ti teparivaṭṭaṃ dvādasākāraṃ pavattesi ^a^V2.0230^ea^. Mahantehi sīlādiguṇehi samannāgatattā ^b^mahantaṃ. Vītasārada^eb^nti catuvesārajjayogena vītasāradaṃ. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Lokasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^24^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^b^bāḷhaṃ kho ne pasaṃsasī^eb^ti ne samaṇe bāḷhaṃ katvā pasaṃsasi vaṇṇayasi. Kīdisaṃ sīlaṃ etesanti ^b^kiṃsīlā^eb^. Ko samācāro etesanti ^b^kiṃsamācārā. Guṇamaggasaṇṭhitā^eb^ti guṇaggasaṇṭhitā. ^b^Ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro, aggaguṇe patiṭṭhitāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Santindriyā^eb^ santamānasā, ‘‘santaṃ tesaṃ gataṃ ṭhita’’ntipi paṭhanti. ^b^Ekakiyā^eb^ti ekakā, catūsu iriyāpathesu ekakā hutvā viharantīti adhippāyo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘adutiyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tādisā samaṇā mamātī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. Tena –
[21]‘‘Kāyakammaṃ suci nesaṃ, vācākammaṃ anāvilaṃ;
[22]Manokammaṃ suvisuddhaṃ, tādisā samaṇā mama.
[21]‘‘Vimalā ^a^M2.0254^ea^ saṅkhamuttābhā, suddhā antarabāhirā;
[22]Puṇṇā suddhehi dhammehi, tādisā samaṇā mama.
[21]‘‘Lābhena unnato loko, alābhena ca onato;
[22]Lābhālābhena ekaṭṭhā, tādisā samaṇā mama.
[21]‘‘Yasena unnato loko, ayasena ca onato;
[22]Yasāyasena ekaṭṭhā, tādisā samaṇā mama.
[21]‘‘Pasaṃsāyunnato loko, nindāyapi ca onato;
[22]Samā nindāpasaṃsāsu, tādisā samaṇā mama.
[21]‘‘Sukhena ^a^V2.0231^ea^ unnato loko, dukkhenapi ca onato;
[22]Akampā sukhadukkhesu, tādisā samaṇā mamā’’ti. (dha. pa. aṭṭha. 2.303 cūḷasubhaddāvatthu) –
[07]Evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^‘‘Dūre santo’’^eb^tiādigāthāya ayamattho. ^b^Santo^eb^ti rāgādīnaṃ santatāya buddhādayo santo nāma, idha pana pubbabuddhesu katādhikārā ussannakusalamūlā bhāvitabhāvanā sattā santoti adhippetā. ^b^Pakāsantī^eb^ti dūre ṭhitāpi buddhānaṃ ñāṇapathaṃ āgacchantā pākaṭā honti. ^b^Himavantovā^eb^ti yathā tiyojanasahassavitthato pañcayojanasatubbedho caturāsītiyā kūṭasahassehi paṭimaṇḍito himavantapabbato dūre ṭhitānampi abhimukhe ṭhito viya pakāsati, evaṃ pakāsantīti attho. ^b^Asantettha na dissantī^eb^ti lābhagarukā, vitthiṇṇaparalokā, āmisacakkhukā, jīvikatthāya pabbajitā, bālapuggalā asanto nāma. Te ettha buddhānaṃ dakkhiṇassa jāṇumaṇḍalassa santike nisinnāpi na dissanti na paññāyanti. ^b^Rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā^eb^ti rattiṃ caturaṅgasamannāgate andhakāre khittā sarā viya tathārūpassa upanissayabhūtassa pubbahetuno abhāvena na paññāyantīti attho.
[03]^b^Brahmadeyya^eb^nti seṭṭhadeyyaṃ, yathā dinnaṃ na puna gahetabbaṃ hoti nissaṭṭhaṃ pariccattaṃ, evaṃ dinnanti attho.

[03]^b^Diṭṭhaṃ na maññatī^eb^ti ettha ^b^diṭṭha^eb^nti maṃsacakkhunāpi diṭṭhaṃ, dibbacakkhunāpi diṭṭhaṃ, rūpāyatanassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Yañhi cakkhudvayena katadassanakiriyāsamāpanaṃ, yaṃ ^a^M2.0255^ea^ cakkhudvayaṃ passati apassi passissati, samavāye passeyya, taṃ sabbaṃ kālavisesavacanicchāya abhāvato ‘‘diṭṭha’’nteva vuttaṃ yathā ‘‘duddha’’nti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhaṃ rūpāyatana’’^eb^nti. ^b^Evarūpāni hi vacanānī^eb^ti ‘‘daṭṭhabbaṃ sotabba’’ntiādīni.
[03]^b^Lābhepi tādī, alābhepi tādī^eb^ti yathā alābhakāle lābhassa laddhakālepi tathevāti tādiso. ^b^Yasepī^eb^ti yase satipi mahāparivārakālepi. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Kāḷakārāmasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^25^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^V2.0232^ea^^b^nayida^eb^nti ettha ^b^na^eb^-iti paṭisedhe nipāto, tassa ‘‘vussatī’’ti iminā sambandho ‘‘na vussatī’’ti, ^b^ya^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^-saddo ‘‘ekamidāhaṃ, bhikkhave, samayaṃ ukkaṭṭhāyaṃ viharāmi subhagavane sālarājamūle’’tiādīsu (dī. ni. 2.91; ma. ni. 1.501) nipātamattaṃ, ‘‘idaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, appamattakaṃ sīlamattaka’’ntiādīsu (dī. ni. 1.27) yathāvutte āsannapaccakkhe āgato.
[21]‘‘Idañhi taṃ jetavanaṃ, isisaṅghanisevitaṃ;
[22]Āvutthaṃ dhammarājena, pītisañjananaṃ mamā’’ti. (ma. ni. 3.387-388; saṃ. ni. 1.48, 101) –
[07]Ādīsu vakkhamāne āsannapaccakkhe. Idhāpi vakkhamāneyeva āsannapaccakkhe daṭṭhabbo.
[03]^b^Brahmacariya^eb^-saddo –
[21]‘‘Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
[21]Kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
[21]Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti,
[22]Idañca te nāga mahāvimānaṃ.
[21]‘‘Ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke,
[27]Saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā;
[26]Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi,
[22]Santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
[21]‘‘Taṃ ^a^M2.0256^ea^ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ,
[27]Tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
[26]Iddhī jutī balavīriyūpapatti,
[22]Idañca me vīra mahāvimāna’’nti. –
[07]Imasmiṃ ^a^V2.0233^ea^^b^puṇṇakajātake^eb^ (jā. 2.22.1595) dāne āgato.
[21]‘‘Kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo;
[22]Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī’’ti. –
[07]Imasmiṃ ^b^aṅkurapetavatthusmiṃ^eb^ (pe. va. 275, 277) veyyāvacce.
[03]‘‘Evaṃ kho taṃ, bhikkhave, tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī’’ti imasmiṃ ^b^tittirajātake^eb^ (cūḷava. 311) pañcasikkhāpadasīle.
[03]‘‘Taṃ kho pana me, pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya…pe… yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā’’ti imasmiṃ ^b^mahāgovindasutte^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.329) brahmavihāre.
[03]‘‘Pare abrahmacārī bhavissanti, mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā’’ti imasmiṃ ^b^sallekhasutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.83) methunaviratiyaṃ.
[21]‘‘Mayañca bhariyā nātikkamāma,
[27]Amhe ca bhariyā nātikkamanti;
[26]Aññatra tāhi brahmacariyaṃ carāma,
[22]Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare’’ti. –
[07]Imasmiṃ ^b^mahādhammapālajātake^eb^ (jā. 1.10.97) sadārasantose.
[03]‘‘Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ brahmacariyaṃ caritā, tapassī sudaṃ homī’’ti ^b^lomahaṃsasutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 1.155) vīriye.
[21]‘‘Hīnena brahmacariyena, khattiye upapajjati;
[22]Majjhimena ca devattaṃ, uttamena visujjhatī’’ti. –
[07]^b^Nimijātake^eb^ (jā. 2.22.429) attadamanavasena kate aṭṭhaṅgike uposathe.
[03]‘‘Idaṃ ^a^M2.0257^ea^^a^V2.0234^ea^ kho pana me, pañcasikha, brahmacariyaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya…pe… ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo’’ti ^b^mahāgovindasutteyeva^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.329) ariyamagge.

[03]‘‘Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāva devamanussehi suppakāsita’’nti ^b^pāsādikasutte^eb^ (dī. ni. 3.174) sikkhattayasaṅgahite sakalasmiṃ sāsane. Idhāpi ariyamagge sāsane ca vattati.

[03]^b^Vussatī^eb^ti vusīyati, carīyatīti attho. ^b^Janakuhanattha^eb^nti ‘‘aho ayyo sīlavā vattasampanno appiccho santuṭṭho mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo’’tiādinā janassa sattalokassa vimhāpanatthaṃ. Keci pana ^b^‘‘kuhanattha^eb^nti pāpicchassa icchāpakatassa sato sāmantajappanairiyāpathanissitapaccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātena tividhena kuhanavatthunā kuhakabhāvena janassa vimhāpanattha’’nti vadanti. Idhāpi ayamevattho dassito. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘tīhi kuhanavatthūhi janassa kuhanatthāyā’’^eb^ti, janassa vimhāpanatthāyāti attho. ^b^Janalāpanattha^eb^nti ‘‘evarūpassa nāma ayyassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissatī’’ti pasannacittehi ‘‘kenattho, kiṃ āharīyatū’’ti vadāpanatthaṃ. ‘‘Janalapanattha’’ntipi paṭhanti, tassa pāpicchassa sato paccayatthaṃ parikathobhāsādivasena lapanabhāvena upalāpakabhāvena janassa lapanatthanti attho. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘na janalapanatthanti na janassa upalāpanattha’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Na itivādappamokkhānisaṃsattha^eb^nti ettha ‘‘na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsattha’’ntipi paṭhanti. Tattha yvāyaṃ ‘‘ākaṅkheyya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhu ‘lābhī assaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārāna’nti, sīlesvevassa paripūrakārī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.65) sīlānisaṃsabhāvena vutto catupaccayalābho ca. Catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ sakkaccadānasaṅkhāto ādarabahumānagarukaraṇasaṅkhāto ca sakkāro, yo ca ‘‘sīlasampanno bahussuto sutadharo āraddhavīriyo’’tiādinā nayena uggacchanakathutighosasaṅkhāto siloko brahmacariyaṃ vasantānaṃ diṭṭhadhammiko ānisaṃso, tadatthanti attho. Keci pana ^b^‘‘lābhasakkārasilokānisaṃsattha^eb^nti pāpicchasseva sato lābhādigarutāya lābhasakkārasilokasaṅkhātassa ānisaṃsassa udayassa nipphādanattha’’nti evamatthaṃ vadanti.

[03]^b^Na^eb^^a^M2.0258^ea^^b^iti maṃ jano jānātū^eb^ti evaṃ brahmacariyavāse sati ‘‘sīlavā kalyāṇadhammo’’tiādinā ^a^V2.0235^ea^ maṃ loko jānātu sambhāvetūti attano santaguṇavasena sambhāvanatthampi na idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti sambandho. Keci pana ‘‘pāpicchassa sato asantaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyena ‘iti evaṃguṇoti maṃ loko jānātū’ti na idaṃ brahmacariyaṃ vussatī’’ti evamettha atthaṃ vadanti. Sabbatthāpi panettha purimo purimoyeva atthavikappo sundarataro.

[03]^b^Atha kho^eb^ti ettha ^b^athā^eb^ti aññatthe nipāto, ^b^kho^eb^ti avadhāraṇe. Tena kuhanādito aññadatthaṃyeva idaṃ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṃ vussatīti dasseti. Idāni taṃ payojanaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘saṃvaratthaṃ pahānattha’’^eb^nti āha. Tattha pañcavidho saṃvaro – pātimokkhasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti. ‘‘Iti iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto’’tiādinā (vibha. 511) nayena āgato ayaṃ ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvaro,^eb^ sīlasaṃvarotipi vuccati. ‘‘Rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye saṃvaraṃ āpajjatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.295; saṃ. ni. 4.239; a. ni. 3.16) āgato ayaṃ ^b^satisaṃvaro^eb^.
[21]‘‘Yāni sotāni lokasmiṃ, sati tesaṃ nivāraṇaṃ;
[22]Sotānaṃ saṃvaraṃ brūmi, paññāyete pidhīyare’’ti. (su. ni. 1041; cūḷani. ajitamāṇavapucchāniddeso 4; netti. 4.11, 45) –
[07]Āgato ayaṃ ^b^ñāṇasaṃvaro^eb^. ‘‘Khamo hoti sītassa uṇhassā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.24; a. ni. 4.114; 6.58) nayena āgato ayaṃ ^b^khantisaṃvaro^eb^.
[03]‘‘Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.26; a. ni. 4.114; 6.58) nayena āgato ayaṃ ^b^vīriyasaṃvaro^eb^.

[03]Atthato pana pāṇātipātādīnaṃ pajahanavasena vattappaṭivattānaṃ pūraṇavasena ca pavattā cetanā ceva virati ca. Saṅkhepato sabbo kāyavacīsaṃyamo, vitthārato sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamo sīlasaṃvaro. Sati eva ^b^satisaṃvaro,^eb^ satippadhānā vā kusalā khandhā. Ñāṇameva ^b^ñāṇasaṃvaro^eb^. Adhivāsanavasena adoso, adosappadhānā vā ^a^M2.0259^ea^ tathāpavattā kusalā khandhā ^b^khantisaṃvaro,^eb^ paññāti eke. Kāmavitakkādīnaṃ abhibhavanavasena pavattaṃ vīriyameva ^b^vīriyasaṃvaro^eb^. Tesu paṭhamo kāyaduccaritādīsu dussīlassa saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, dutiyo muṭṭhassaccassa ^a^V2.0236^ea^, tatiyo aññāṇassa, catuttho akkhantiyā, pañcamo kosajjassa saṃvaraṇato pidahanato saṃvaroti veditabbo. Evametassa saṃvarassa atthāya ^b^saṃvaratthaṃ^eb^ saṃvaranipphādanatthanti attho.

[03]^b^Tīhi pahānehī^eb^ti tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedasaṅkhātehi tīhi pahānehi. Pañcavidhappahānampi idha vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Pañcavidhañhi pahānaṃ tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedappaṭippassaddhinissaraṇavasena. Tattha yaṃ dīpālokeneva tamassa paṭipakkhabhāvato alobhādīhi lobhādikassa nāmarūpaparicchedādivipassanāñāṇehi tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ, seyyathidaṃ – pariccāgena lobhādimalassa, sīlena pāṇātipātādidussīlyassa, saddhādīhi assaddhiyādikassa, nāmarūpavavatthānena sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā, paccayapariggahena ahetuvisamahetudiṭṭhīnaṃ, tasseva aparabhāgena kaṅkhāvitaraṇena kathaṃkathībhāvassa, kalāpasammasanena ahaṃmamāti gāhassa, maggāmaggavavatthānena amagge maggasaññāya, udayadassanena ucchedadiṭṭhiyā, vayadassanena sassatadiṭṭhiyā, bhayadassanena sabhaye abhayasaññāya, ādīnavadassanena assādasaññāya, nibbidānupassanena abhiratisaññāya, muccitukamyatāñāṇena amuccitukamyatāya, upekkhāñāṇena anupekkhāya, anulomena dhammaṭṭhitiyaṃ nibbāne ca paṭilomabhāvassa, gotrabhunā saṅkhāranimittaggāhassa pahānaṃ, etaṃ ^b^tadaṅgappahānaṃ^eb^ nāma.

[03]Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa, tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ, etaṃ ^b^vikkhambhanappahānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano santāne ‘‘diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā’’tiādinā (dha. sa. 277; vibha. 628) nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagahaṇassa accantaṃ appavattibhāvena samucchindanaṃ, etaṃ ^b^samucchedappahānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Yaṃ pana phalakkhaṇe paṭippassaddhatthaṃ kilesānaṃ, etaṃ ^b^paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ^eb^ nāma. Yaṃ sabbasaṅkhatanissaṭattā pahīnasabbasaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ, etaṃ ^b^nissaraṇappahānaṃ^eb^ nāma ^a^M2.0260^ea^. Tassa pañcavidhassapi tathā tathā rāgādikilesānaṃ paṭinissajjanaṭṭhena samatikkamanaṭṭhena vā pahānassa atthāya, pahānasādhanatthanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Tattha saṃvarena kilesānaṃ cittasantāne pavesanivāraṇaṃ pahānena ca pavesanivāraṇameva samugghāto cāti vadanti. Ubhayenapi pana yathārahaṃ ubhayaṃ sampajjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sīlādidhammā eva hi saṃvaraṇato saṃvaraṃ, pajahanato pahānanti.

[03]^b^Anītiha^eb^nti ^a^V2.0237^ea^ ītiyo vuccanti upaddavā diṭṭhadhammikā samparāyikā ca. Ītiyo hantīti ītihaṃ, anu ītihanti ^b^anītihaṃ,^eb^ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca. Atha vā ītīhi anatthehi saddhiṃ hananti gacchanti pavattantīti ītihā, taṇhādiupakkilesā. Natthi ettha ītihāti ^b^anītihaṃ^eb^. Ītihā vā yathāvuttenatthena titthiyasamayā, tappaṭipakkhato idaṃ ^b^anītihaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Anitiha’’ntipi pāṭho. Tassattho – ‘‘itihāya’’nti dhammesu anekaṃsaggāhabhāvato vicikicchā itihaṃ nāma, sammāsambuddhappaveditattā yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjantānaṃ nikkaṅkhabhāvasādhanato ca natthi ettha itihanti ^b^anitihaṃ,^eb^ aparapattiyanti attho. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī’’ti, ‘‘atakkāvacaro’’ti (dī. ni. 2.67; ma. ni. 1.281; 2.337; saṃ. ni. 1.172; mahāva. 7-8) ca. Gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pana ‘‘anītiha’’nti dīghaṃ katvā paṭhanti. Pacchimaṃ panettha atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘itihaparivajjita’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ ogadhaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ pāraṃ gacchatīti nibbānogadhagāmī, vimuttirasattā ekanteneva nibbānasampāpakoti attho, taṃ ^b^nibbānogadhagāminaṃ^eb^ brahmacariyaṃ. ^b^Nibbānogadho^eb^ti vā ariyamaggo vuccati tena vinā nibbānāvagāhaṇassa asambhavato tassa ca nibbānaṃ anālambitvā appavattanato, tañcetaṃ ekantasampādanena gacchatīti ^b^nibbānogadhagāmī^eb^. Atha vā ^b^nibbānogadhagāmina^eb^nti nibbānassa antogāminaṃ. Maggabrahmacariyañhi nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karitvā tassa anto eva pavattatīti. Imameva ca atthavikappaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘nibbānassa antogāmina’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^So^eb^ti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho, so bhagavā ^b^adesayi^eb^ desesi ^a^M2.0261^ea^. ^b^Mahantehī^eb^ti mahāātumehi uḷārajjhāsayehi. Mahantaṃ nibbānaṃ, mahante vā sīlakkhandhādike esanti gavesantīti ^b^mahesino,^eb^ buddhādayo ariyā. Tehi ^b^anuyāto^eb^ paṭipanno.

[03]^b^Yathā buddhena desita^eb^nti yathā abhiññeyyādibhāvena sammāsambuddhena mayā desitaṃ, evaṃ ye etaṃ maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadatthaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyañca paṭipajjanti. Te diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ anusāsantassa satthu mayhaṃ sāsanakārino ovādappaṭikarā sakalassa vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ pariyantaṃ appavattiṃ karissanti, dukkhassa vā antaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarissantīti.
[06]Brahmacariyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^26^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^V2.0238^ea^^b^kuhakā^eb^ti sāmantajappanādinā kuhanavatthunā kuhakā, asantaguṇasambhāvanicchāya kohaññaṃ katvā paresaṃ viddhaṃsakāti attho. ^b^Thaddhā^eb^ti ‘‘kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo, appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthīyatī’’ti (a. ni. 3.25, 27) evaṃ vuttena kodhena ca, ‘‘dubbaco hoti dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgato akkhamo appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsani’’nti (ma. ni. 1.181; pārā. 426). Evaṃ vuttena dovacassena ca, ‘‘jātimado, gottamado, lābhamado, ārogyamado, yobbanamado, jīvitamado’’ti (vibha. 832) evaṃ vuttajātimadādibhedena mānena ca garukātabbesu garūsupi nipaccakāraṃ akatvā ayosalākaṃ gilitvā ṭhitā viya anonatā hutvā vicaraṇakā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kodhena cā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Upalāpakā^eb^ti micchājīvavasena kulasaṅgaṇhakā. ^b^Lapā^eb^ti paccayatthaṃ payuttavācāvasena nippesikatāvasena lapakāti attho. ^b^Siṅga^eb^nti siṅgāraṃ. Tañhi kusalassa vijjhanato suṭṭhu āsevitatāya sīse parikkhittaṃ sunibbattaṃ visāṇaṃ viya thirattā ca siṅgaṃ viyāti siṅgaṃ, nāgarikabhāvasaṅkhātassa kilesasiṅgassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Siṅgārabhāvo ^b^siṅgāratā,^eb^ siṅgārakaraṇakāakāro vā. Cāturabhāvo ^b^cāturatā^eb^. Tathā ^a^M2.0262^ea^^b^cāturiyaṃ^eb^. Parikkhatabhāvo ^b^parikkhatatā,^eb^ parikhaṇitvā ṭhapitasseva daḷhasiṅgārassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Evaṃ sabbehi vārehi kilesasiṅgāratāva kathitā.

[03]^b^Uggatanaḷā^eb^ti naḷasadisaṃ tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā vicaraṇakā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tucchamānaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitā’’^eb^ti. Yasmā te kuhanādiyogato na sammāpaṭipannā, tasmā ^b^‘‘mama santakā na hontī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Apagatā^eb^ti yadipi te mama sāsane pabbajitā, yathānusiṭṭhaṃ pana appaṭipajjanato apagatā eva imasmā dhammavinayā, ito te suvidūre ṭhitāti dasseti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
[21]‘‘Nabhañca dūre pathavī ca dūre,
[27]Pāraṃ samuddassa tadāhu dūre;
[26]Tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti,
[22]Satañca dhammo asatañca rājā’’ti. (jā. 2.21.414);
[03]^b^Sabbattha^eb^^a^V2.0239^ea^^b^patthaṭatāya vepullaṃ pāpuṇantī^eb^ti sabbattha patthaṭabhāvena sīlādidhammakkhandhapāripūriyā vepullaṃ pāpuṇanti.
[06]Kuhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^27^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^niddosānī^eb^ti avajjarahitāni āgamanasuddhito kāyamaṇḍanādikilesavatthubhāvābhāvato ca. Tattha sulabhatāya pariyesanadukkhassa abhāvo dassito, appatāya pariharaṇadukkhassapi abhāvo dassito, anavajjatāya agarahitabbatāya bhikkhusāruppabhāvo dassito hoti. Appatāya vā parittāsassa avatthutā, sulabhatāya gedhādīnaṃ avatthutā, anavajjatāya ādīnavadassananissaraṇapaññānaṃ atthitā dassitā hoti. Appatāya vā lābhena na somanassaṃ janayanti, alābhena na domanassaṃ janayanti, anavajjatāya vippaṭisāranimittaṃ aññāṇupekkhaṃ na janayanti avippaṭisāravatthubhāvato.

[03]^b^Paṃsukūla^eb^nti ^a^M2.0263^ea^ saṅkārakūṭādīsu yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena paṃsukūlaṃ viyāti paṃsukūlaṃ, paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlanti evaṃ laddhanāmaṃ rathikādīsu patitanantakāni uccinitvā katacīvaraṃ. ^b^Rukkhamūla^eb^nti vivekānurūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci rukkhasamīpaṃ. ^b^Yaṃ kiñci mutta^eb^nti yaṃ kiñci gomuttaṃ. Keci panettha ‘‘gomuttaparibhāvitaharītakakhaṇḍaṃ ^b^pūtimutta’’^eb^nti vadanti. ‘‘Pūtibhāvena āpaṇādito vissaṭṭhaṃ chaḍḍitaṃ apariggahitaṃ yaṃ kiñci bhesajjaṃ ^b^pūtimutta^eb^nti adhippeta’’nti apare.

[03]^b^Yato kho^eb^ti paccatte nissakkavacanaṃ, yaṃ khoti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Tena tuṭṭho hotī^eb^ti vuttakiriyaṃ parāmasati. ^b^Tuṭṭho^eb^ti santuṭṭho. ^b^Idamassāha^eb^nti yvāyaṃ catubbidhena yathāvuttena paccayena appena sulabhena santoso, idaṃ imassa bhikkhuno sīlasaṃvarādīsu aññataraṃ ekaṃ sāmaññaṅgaṃ samaṇabhāvakāraṇanti ahaṃ vadāmi. Santuṭṭhassa hi catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ hoti, samathavipassanā ca bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. Atha vā sāmaññaṃ nāma ariyamaggo, tassa saṅkhepato dve aṅgā bāhiraṃ ajjhattikanti.
