Tattha bāhiraṃ sappurisūpanissayo saddhammassavanañca. Ajjhattikaṃ pana yonisomanasikāro dhammānudhammappaṭipatti ca. Tesu yasmā yathārahaṃ dhammānudhammappaṭipattibhūtā tassa mūlabhūtā cete dhammā, yadidaṃ appicchatā santuṭṭhitā pavivittatā asaṃsaṭṭhatā ^a^V2.0240^ea^ āraddhavīriyatāti evamādayo, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘idamassāhaṃ aññataraṃ sāmaññaṅganti vadāmī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Senāsanamārabbhā^eb^ti vihārādiṃ mañcapīṭhādiñca senāsanaṃ nissāya. ^b^Cīvaraṃ pānabhojana^eb^nti nivāsanādicīvaraṃ ambapānakādipānaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyādibhuñjitabbavatthuñca ārabbhāti sambandho. ^b^Vighāto^eb^ti vighātabhāvo, cittassa dukkhaṃ na hotīti yojanā. Ayañhettha saṅkhepattho – ‘‘amukasmiṃ nāma āvāse paccayā sulabhā’’ti labhitabbaṭṭhānagamanena vā ‘‘mayhaṃ pāpuṇāti, na tuyha’’nti vivādāpajjanena vā navakammakaraṇādivasena vā senāsanādīni pariyesantānaṃ asantuṭṭhānaṃ icchitālābhādinā yo vighāto cittassa hoti, so tattha santuṭṭhassa na hoti. ^b^Disā nappaṭihaññatī^eb^ti santuṭṭhiyā cātuddisabhāvena disā na paṭihanati. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘cātuddiso appaṭigho ca hoti, santussamāno itarītarenā’’ti (su. ni. 42).

[03]^b^Samaṇadhammassa^eb^^a^M2.0264^ea^^b^anulomā^eb^ti samaṇadhammassa samathavipassanābhāvanāya, ariyamaggasseva vā anucchavikā appicchatādayo. ^b^Tuṭṭhacittassa bhikkhuno^eb^ti tuṭṭhacittena bhikkhunā. ^b^Adhiggahitā hontī^eb^ti paṭipakkhadhamme abhibhavitvā gahitā honti. ^b^Antogatā^eb^ti abbhantaragatā. Na ^b^paribāhirā^eb^ti na bāhirā katā.
[06]Santuṭṭhisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^28^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^vaṃsa^eb^-saddo ‘‘piṭṭhivaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā nisīdatī’’tiādīsu dvinnaṃ gopānasīnaṃ sandhānaṭṭhāne ṭhapetabbadaṇḍake āgato.
[21]‘‘Vaṃso visālo ca yathā visatto,
[27]Puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā;
[26]Vaṃsakkaḷīrova asajjamāno,
[22]Eko care khaggavisāṇakappo’’ti. –

[07]Ādīsu kaṭṭhake. ‘‘Bherisaddo mudiṅgasaddo vaṃsatālasaddo’’tiādīsu tūriyavisese, veṇūtipi vuccati ^a^V2.0241^ea^. ‘‘Bhinnena piṭṭhivaṃsena mato hatthī’’tiādīsu hatthiādīnaṃ piṭṭhivemajjhe padese. ‘‘Kulavaṃsaṃ ṭhapessāmī’’tiādīsu kulanvaye. ‘‘Vaṃsānurakkhako paveṇīpālako’’tiādīsu guṇānupubbiyaṃ guṇānaṃ pabandhappavattiyaṃ. Idha pana catupaccayasantosabhāvanārāmatāsaṅkhātaguṇānaṃ pabandhe daṭṭhabbo. Tassa pana vaṃsassa kulanvayaṃ guṇanvayañca nidassanavasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^khattiyavaṃso^eb^ti khattiyakulavaṃso. Esa nayo sesapadesupi. ^b^Samaṇavaṃso^eb^ pana samaṇatanti samaṇapaveṇī. ^b^Mūlagandhādīna^eb^nti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena yathā sāragandhādīnaṃ saṅgaho, evamettha gorasādīnampi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo, dutiyena pana ^b^ādi^eb^-sadena kāsikavatthasappimaṇḍādīnaṃ.

[03]^b^Ariya^eb^-saddo amilakkhesupi manussesu pavattati, yesaṃ nivasanaṭṭhānaṃ ariyaṃ āyatananti vuccati. Yathāha ‘‘yāvatā, ānanda, ariyaṃ āyatana’’nti ^a^M2.0265^ea^ (dī. ni. 2.152; udā. 76). Lokiyasādhujanesupi ‘‘ye hi vo ariyā parisuddhakāyasamācārā, tesaṃ ahaṃ aññataro’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.35). Idha pana ye ‘‘ārakā kilesehī’’tiādinā laddhanibbacanā paṭividdhāriyasaccā, te eva adhippetāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ke pana te ariyā’’^eb^ti pucchaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘ariyā vuccantī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ye mahāpaṇidhānakappato paṭṭhāya yāvāyaṃ kappo, etthantare uppannā sammāsambuddhā. Te tāva sarūpato dassetvā tadaññepi sammāsambuddhe paccekabuddhe buddhasāvake ca saṅgahetvā anavasesato ariye dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yāva sāsanaṃ antaradhāyati, tāva satthā dharati eva nāmāti imameva bhagavantaṃ. Ye cetarahi buddhasāvakā, te ca sandhāya paccuppannaggahaṇaṃ. Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle te te paccuppannāti ce, atītānāgataggahaṇaṃ na kattabbaṃ siyā.

[03]Idāni yathā bhagavā ‘‘dhammaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṃ majjhekalyāṇaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇaṃ sātthaṃ sabyañjanaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ pakāsessāmi, yadidaṃ cha chakkānī’’ti ^b^chachakkadesanāya^eb^ (ma. ni. 3.420) aṭṭhahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi. Evaṃ mahāariyavaṃsadesanāya ariyānaṃ vaṃsaṃ ‘‘cattārome, bhikkhave, ariyavaṃsā aggaññā rattaññā vaṃsaññā porāṇā, asaṃkiṇṇā asaṃkiṇṇapubbā na saṃkīyanti na saṃkīyissanti, appaṭikuṭṭhā samaṇehi brāhmaṇehi viññūhī’’ti yehi navahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, tāni tāva ānetvā thomanāvaseneva vaṇṇento ^b^‘‘te kho panete’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Aggāti jānitabbā^eb^ sabbavaṃsehi seṭṭhabhāvato seṭṭhabhāvasādhanato ca.

[03]^b^Rattaññā cirarattāti jānitabbā^eb^ rattaññūhi buddhādīhi tehi ca tathā anuṭṭhitattā. ^b^Vaṃsāti jānitabbā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0242^ea^ buddhādīnaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsāti jānitabbā. ^b^Porāṇā^eb^ti purātanā. ^b^Na adhunappattikā^eb^ti na adhunātanā. ^b^Avikiṇṇā^eb^ti na khittā na chaḍḍitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anapanītā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na apanītapubbā^eb^ti na chaḍḍitapubbā, tissannampi sikkhānaṃ paripūraṇūpāyabhāvato na pariccattapubbā. Tato eva idānipi na apanīyanti, anāgatepi na apanīyissantiyeva. Dhammasabhāvassa vijānanena ^b^viññū^eb^. Samitapāpā ^b^samaṇā^eb^ ceva ^a^M2.0266^ea^ bāhitapāpā ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^ ca. ^b^Tehi appaṭikuṭṭhā^eb^ appaṭikkhittā. Ye hi na paṭikkositabbā, te aninditabbā. Agarahitabbā apariccajitabbatāya appaṭikkhipitabbā hontīti.

[03]^b^Santuṭṭho^eb^ti ettha yathādhippetasantosameva dassentena paccayasantosavasena santuṭṭhoti vuttaṃ, jhānavipassanādivasenapi idha bhikkhuno santuṭṭhatā hotīti. ^b^Itarītarenā^eb^ti itarena itarena. Itarasaddo aniyamavacano dvikkhattuṃ vuccamāno yaṃ-kiñcisaddehi samānattho hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yena kenacī’’^eb^ti. Svāyaṃ aniyamavācitāya eva yathā thūlādīnaṃ aññataravacano, evaṃ yathāladdhādīnampi aññataravacanoti. Tattha dutiyapakkhasseva idha icchitabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘atha kho’’^eb^tiādimāha. Nanu ca yathāladdhādayopi thūlādayo eva? Saccametaṃ, tathāpi atthi viseso. Yo hi yathāladdhesu thūlādīsu santoso, so yathālābhasantosova, na itaro. Na hi so paccayamattasannissayo icchito, atha kho attano kāyabalasāruppabhāvasannissayopi. Thūladukādayo tayopi cīvare labbhanti, majjhimo catupaccayasādhāraṇo, pacchimo pana cīvare senāsane ca labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ime tayo santose^eb^ti idaṃ sabbasaṅgāhikanayena vuttaṃ. Ye hi parato gilānapaccayaṃ piṇḍapāte eva pakkhipitvā cīvare vīsati, piṇḍapāte pannarasa, senāsane pannarasāti samapaññāsa santosā vuccanti, te sabbepi yathārahaṃ imesu eva tīsu santosesu saṅgahaṃ samosaraṇaṃ gacchantīti.

[03]^b^Cīvaraṃ jānitabba^eb^nti ‘‘idaṃ nāma cīvaraṃ kappiya’’nti jātito cīvaraṃ jānitabbaṃ. ^b^Cīvarakhetta^eb^nti cīvarassa uppattikkhettaṃ. ^b^Paṃsukūla^eb^nti paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ, paṃsukūlalakkhaṇappattaṃ cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti attho. ^b^Cīvarasantoso^eb^ti cīvare labbhamāno sabbo santoso jānitabbo. ^b^Cīvarappaṭisaṃyuttāni dhutaṅgāni jānitabbāni,^eb^ yāni gopento cīvarasantosena sammadeva santuṭṭho hotīti. Khomakappāsikakoseyyakambalasāṇabhaṅgāni ^b^khomādīni^eb^. Tattha ^b^khomaṃ^eb^ nāma khomasuttehi vāyitaṃ khomapaṭṭacīvaraṃ. Tathā sesānipi. ^b^Sāṇa^eb^nti sāṇavākasuttehi katacīvaraṃ. ^b^Bhaṅga^eb^nti pana khomasuttādīni sabbāni, ekaccāni vā missetvā katacīvaraṃ. Bhaṅgampi vākamayamevāti keci. ^b^Chā^eb^ti gaṇanaparicchedo. Yadi evaṃ ito aññā ^a^M2.0267^ea^ vatthajāti natthīti? No natthi. Sā pana ^a^V2.0243^ea^ etesaṃ anulomāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dukūlādīnī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena pattuṇṇaṃ, somārapaṭṭaṃ, cīnapaṭṭaṃ, iddhijaṃ, devadinnanti tesaṃ saṅgaho. Tattha dukūlaṃ sāṇassa anulomaṃ vākamayattā. Pattuṇṇadese sañjātavatthaṃ ^b^pattuṇṇaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Koseyyaviseso’’ti hi abhidhānakose vuttaṃ. Somāradese cīnadese ca jātavatthāni ^b^somāracīnapaṭṭāni^eb^. Pattuṇṇādīni tīṇi koseyyassa anulomāni pāṇakehi katasuttamayattā. ^b^Iddhijaṃ^eb^ ehibhikkhūnaṃ puññiddhiyā nibbattacīvaraṃ, taṃ khomādīnaṃ aññataraṃ hotīti tesaṃ eva anulomaṃ. Devatāhi dinnacīvaraṃ ^b^devadinnaṃ,^eb^ taṃ kapparukkhe nibbattaṃ jāliniyā devakaññāya anuruddhattherassa dinnavatthasadisaṃ, tampi khomādīnaṃyeva anulomaṃ hoti tesu aññatarabhāvato.

[03]^b^Imānī^eb^ti antogadhāvadhāraṇavacanaṃ, imāni evāti attho. Buddhādīnaṃ paribhogayoggatāya ^b^kappiyacīvarāni^eb^. Idāni avadhāraṇena nivattitāni ekadesena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘kusacīra’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha kusatiṇehi aññehi vā tādisehi tiṇehi katacīvaraṃ ^b^kusacīraṃ^eb^. Akkavākādīhi vākehi katacīvaraṃ ^b^vākacīraṃ^eb^. Catukkoṇehi tikoṇehi vā phalakehi katacīvaraṃ ^b^phalakacīraṃ^eb^. Manussānaṃ kesehi katakambalaṃ ^b^kesakambalaṃ^eb^. Cāmarivālāssavālādīhi kataṃ ^b^vālakambalaṃ^eb^. Makacitantūhi vāyito ^b^potthako. Camma^eb^nti migacammādi yaṃ kiñci cammaṃ. Ulūkapakkhehi ganthitvā katacīvaraṃ ^b^ulūkapakkhaṃ^eb^. Bhujapattatacādimayaṃ ^b^rukkhadussaṃ^eb^. Tirīṭakanti attho. Sukhumatarāhi latāhi latāvākehi vā vāyitaṃ ^b^latādussaṃ^eb^. Erakavākehi kataṃ ^b^erakadussaṃ^eb^. Tathā ^b^kadalidussaṃ^eb^. Sukhumehi veḷuvilīvehi kataṃ ^b^veḷudussaṃ. Ādi^eb^-saddena vakkalādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Akappiyacīvarāni^eb^ titthiyaddhajabhāvato.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhannaṃ mātikānaṃ vasenā^eb^ti ‘‘sīmāya deti, katikāya detī’’tiādinā (mahāva. 379) āgatānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ cīvaruppattimātikānaṃ vasena. Cīvarānaṃ paṭilābhakkhettadassanatthañhi bhagavatā ‘‘aṭṭhimā, bhikkhave, mātikā’’tiādinā mātikā ṭhapitā. ^b^Mātikā^eb^ti hi mātaro cīvaruppattijanikāti.

[03]^b^Sosānika^eb^nti ^a^M2.0268^ea^ susāne patitaṃ. ^b^Pāpaṇika^eb^nti āpaṇadvāre patitaṃ. ^b^Rathiya^eb^nti puññatthikehi vātapānantarena rathikāya chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ. ^b^Saṅkārakūṭaka^eb^nti saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ. ^b^Sināna^eb^nti nahānacoḷakaṃ, yaṃ bhūtavejjehi sasīsaṃ nahāyitvā kālakaṇṇicoḷanti chaḍḍetvā gacchanti. ^b^Tittha^eb^nti titthacoḷaṃ, sinānatitthe chaḍḍitapilotikā. ^b^Aggidaḍḍha^eb^nti agginā daḍḍhappadesaṃ. Tañhi manussā chaḍḍenti. ^b^Gokhāyitādīni^eb^ pākaṭāneva. Tānipi hi manussā chaḍḍenti. ^b^Dhajaṃ ussāpetvā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0244^ea^ nāvaṃ ārohantehi vā yuddhaṃ pavisantehi vā dhajayaṭṭhiṃ ussāpetvā, tattha baddhaṃ vātena ^b^ānītaṃ^eb^ tehi chaḍḍitanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Sādakabhikkhunā^eb^ti gahapaticīvarassa sādiyanabhikkhunā. ^b^Ekamāsamatta^eb^nti cīvaramāsasaññitaṃ ekamāsamattaṃ ^b^vitakketuṃ vaṭṭati,^eb^ na tato paranti adhippāyo. Sabbassapi hi taṇhāniggahatthā sāsane paṭipattīti. ^b^Paṃsukūliko addhamāseneva karoti^eb^ aparappaṭibaddhattā paṭilābhassa, itarassa pana parappaṭibaddhattā māsamattaṃ anuññātaṃ. ^b^Idaṃ māsaḍḍhamāsamattaṃ…pe… vitakkasantoso^eb^ vitakkentassa parimitakālikattā. Mahātheraṃ tattha attano sahāyaṃ icchantopi garugāravena ^b^‘‘gāmadvāraṃ, bhante, gamissāmi’’^eb^iccevāha. Theropi tassa ajjhāsayaṃ ñatvā ^b^‘‘ahampāvuso, gamissāmī’’^eb^ti āha. ‘‘Imassa bhikkhuno vitakkassa avasaro mā hotū’’ti ^b^pañhaṃ pucchamāno gāmaṃ pāvisi. Uccārapalibuddho^eb^ti uccārena pīḷito. Tadā bhagavato dukkarakiriyānussaraṇamukhena tathāgate uppannassa pītisomanassavegassa balavabhāvena kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā ^b^tasmiṃyeva…pe… tīṇi phalāni patto^eb^.

[03]^b^Kattha labhissāmī^eb^ti cintanāpi lābhāsāpubbikāti tathā ^b^‘‘acintetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ‘‘Sundaraṃ labhissāmi, manāpaṃ labhissāmī’’tievamādicintanāya kā nāma kathā, kathaṃ pana gantabbanti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gamana’’^eb^nti. Tena cīvaraṃ paṭicca kiñcipi na cintetabbamevāti dasseti. Apesalo appatirūpāyapi pariyesanāya paccayo bhaveyyāti ^b^‘‘pesalaṃ bhikkhuṃ gahetvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Āhariyamāna^eb^nti susānādīsu patitaṃ vatthaṃ ‘‘ime bhikkhū paṃsukūlapariyesanaṃ carantī’’ti ñatvā kenaci purisena tato ānīyamānaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ laddhaṃ gaṇhantassapī^eb^ti evaṃ paṭilābhasantosaṃ akopetvā laddhaṃ gaṇhantassapi. ^b^Attano^eb^^b^pahonakamattenevā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0269^ea^ yathāladdhānaṃ paṃsukūlānaṃ ekapaṭṭadupaṭṭānaṃ atthāya attano pahonakappamāṇeneva. Avadhāraṇena upari paccāsaṃ nivatteti. Gāme bhikkhāya āhiṇḍantena sapadānacārinā viya dvārappaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ ^b^loluppavivajjanaṃ^eb^ nāma loluppassa dūrasamussāritattā.

[03]^b^Yāpetu^eb^nti attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ. ^b^Dhovanupagenā^eb^ti dhovanayoggena. ^b^Paṇṇānī^eb^ti ambajambādipaṇṇāni. ^b^Akopetvā^eb^ti santosaṃ akopetvā. ^b^Pahonakanīhārenevā^eb^ti antaravāsakādīsu yaṃ kātukāmo, tassa pahonakaniyāmeneva yathāladdhaṃ thūlasukhumādiṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ. ^b^Timaṇḍalappaṭicchādanamattassevā^eb^ti nivāsanaṃ ce nābhimaṇḍalaṃ, jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ, itarañce galavāṭamaṇḍalaṃ ^a^V2.0245^ea^, jāṇumaṇḍalanti timaṇḍalappaṭicchādanamattasseva karaṇaṃ. Taṃ pana atthato tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ heṭṭhimantena vuttaparimāṇaṃyeva hoti. ^b^Avicāretvā^eb^ na vicāretvā.
[03]^b^Kusibandhanakāle^eb^ti maṇḍalāni yojetvā sibbanakāle. ^b^Satta vāre^eb^ti satta sibbanavāre. Kappabinduapadesena kassaci vikārassa akaraṇaṃ ^b^kappasantoso^eb^.

[03]Sītappaṭighātanādi atthāpattito sijjhatīti mukhyameva cīvaraparibhoge payojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘hirikopīnappaṭicchādanamattavasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘yāvadeva hirikopīnappaṭicchādanattha’’nti (ma. ni. 1.23; a. ni. 6.58; mahāni. 206). ^b^Vaṭṭati,^eb^ na tāvatā santoso kuppati sambhārānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ alābhato. ^b^Sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvā^eb^ti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇabhogibhāve ṭhatvā. ^b^Itī^eb^tiādinā paṭhamasseva ariyavaṃsassa paṃsukūlikaṅgatecīvarikaṅgānaṃ tesañcassa paccayataṃ dassento ‘‘iti ime dhammā aññamaññassa samuṭṭhāpakā upatthambhakā cā’’ti dīpeti. Esa nayo ito paresu.

[03]^b^Santuṭṭho hoti vaṇṇavādī^eb^ti ettha catukkoṭikaṃ sambhavati. Tattha catutthoyeva pakkho vaṇṇitathomitoti tathā desanā katā. ^b^Eko santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ na katheti^eb^ seyyathāpi thero nāḷako. ^b^Eko na santuṭṭho hoti, santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti^eb^ seyyathāpi upanando sakyaputto. ^b^Eko neva santuṭṭho hoti, na santosassa vaṇṇaṃ katheti^eb^ seyyathāpi thero lāḷudāyi ^a^M2.0270^ea^. ^b^Eko santuṭṭho ceva hoti, santosassa ca vaṇṇaṃ katheti^eb^ seyyathāpi thero mahākassapo.

[03]^b^Anesana^eb^nti ayuttaṃ esanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appatirūpa’’^eb^nti, sāsane ṭhitānaṃ appatirūpaṃ ayoggaṃ. ^b^Kohaññaṃ karonto^eb^ti cīvaruppādananimittaṃ paresaṃ kuhanaṃ vimhāpanaṃ karonto. ^b^Uttasatī^eb^ti taṇhāsantāsena uparūpari tasati. ^b^Paritassatī^eb^ti parito tassati. Yathā sabbe kāyavacippayogā tadatthā eva jāyanti, evaṃ sabbabhāgehi tasati. Gadhitaṃ vuccati giddho, so cettha abhijjhālakkhaṇo adhippeto. Gadhitaṃ etassa natthīti ^b^agadhito^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘vigatalobhagiddho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Muccha^eb^nti taṇhāvasena muyhanaṃ. Tassa samussayassa adhigataṃ ^b^anāpanno^eb^ anupagato. ^b^Anotthato^eb^ anajjhotthato. ^b^Apariyonaddho^eb^ti taṇhacchadanena acchādito. ^b^Ādīnavaṃ passamāno^eb^ti diṭṭhadhammikaṃ samparāyikañca dosaṃ passanto. Gadhitaparibhogato nissarati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0246^ea^, idamaṭṭhikatā. Taṃ pajānātīti ^b^nissaraṇapañño^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yāvadeva…pe… jānanto’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Nevattānukkaṃsetī^eb^ti attānaṃ neva ukkaṃseti na ukkhipati na ukkaṭṭhato dahati. ^b^Aha^eb^ntiādi ukkaṃsanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Na vambheti^eb^ na hīḷeti na nihīnato dahati. ^b^Tasmiṃ cīvarasantose^eb^ti tasmiṃ yathāvutte vīsatividhe cīvarasantose. Kāmañcettha vuttappakārasantosaggahaṇeneva cīvarahetu anesanāpajjanādipi gahitameva tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato, asati ca abhāvato. Vaṇṇavāditāattukkaṃsanaparavambhanāni pana gahitāni na hontīti ^b^‘‘vaṇṇavādādīsu vā’’^eb^ti vikappo vutto. Ettha ca ^b^dakkho^eb^tiādi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ vasenassa yathāvuttasantosādī ijjhanti, taṃdassanaṃ. Tattha ^b^dakkho^eb^ti iminā tesaṃ samuṭṭhāpanapaññaṃ dasseti. ^b^Analaso^eb^ti iminā paggaṇhanavīriyaṃ, ^b^sampajāno^eb^ti iminā pārihāriyapaññaṃ, ^b^paṭissato^eb^ti iminā tattha asammosavuttiṃ dasseti.

[03]^b^Piṇḍapāto jānitabbo^eb^ti pabhedato piṇḍapāto jānitabbo. ^b^Piṇḍapātakkhetta^eb^nti piṇḍapātassa uppattiṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Piṇḍapātasantoso jānitabbo^eb^ti ^a^M2.0271^ea^ piṇḍapātasantosappabhedo jānitabbo. Idha bhesajjampi piṇḍapātagatikameva. Āharitabbato hi sappiādīnampi gahaṇaṃ kataṃ.

[03]^b^Piṇḍapātakkhettaṃ^eb^ piṇḍapātassa uppattiṭṭhānaṃ khettaṃ viya khettaṃ. Uppajjati ettha, etenāti ca ^b^uppattiṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Saṅghato vā hi bhikkhuno piṇḍapāto uppajjati uddissavasena vā. Tattha sakalassa saṅghassa dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^saṅghabhattaṃ^eb^. Katipaye bhikkhū uddisitvā uddesena dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^uddesabhattaṃ^eb^. Nimantetvā dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^nimantanaṃ^eb^. Salākāya dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^salākabhattaṃ^eb^. Ekasmiṃ pakkhe ekadivasaṃ dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^pakkhikaṃ^eb^. Uposathe uposathe dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^uposathikaṃ^eb^. Pāṭipadadivase dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^pāṭipadikaṃ^eb^. Āgantukānaṃ dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^āgantukabhattaṃ^eb^. Dhuragehe eva ṭhapetvā dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^dhurabhattaṃ^eb^. Kuṭiṃ uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^kuṭibhattaṃ^eb^. Gāmavāsiādīhi vārena dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^vārabhattaṃ^eb^. Vihāraṃ uddissa dātabbabhattaṃ ^b^vihārabhattaṃ^eb^. Sesāni pākaṭāneva.

[03]^b^Vitakketi^eb^ ‘‘kattha nu kho ahaṃ ajja piṇḍāya carissāmī’’ti. ^b^‘‘Sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmā’’^eb^ti therena vutte ^b^‘‘asukagāme, bhante’’^eb^ti kāmametaṃ paṭivacanadānaṃ, yena pana cittena cintetvā taṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ettakaṃ cintetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti vitakkamāḷake ṭhatvā ^a^V2.0247^ea^ vitakkitakālato paṭṭhāya. ^b^Tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hotī^eb^ti idaṃ tiṇṇampi ariyavaṃsikānaṃ vasena gahetabbaṃ, na ekacārikasseva. Sabbopi hi ariyavaṃsiko ekavārameva vitakketuṃ labhati, na tato paraṃ. ^b^Paribāhiro^eb^ti ariyavaṃsikabhāvato bahibhūto. Svāyaṃ vitakkasantoso kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena na kuppati visujjhati ca. Ito paresupi eseva nayo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabba’’^eb^nti. ^b^Gahetabbamevā^eb^ti aṭṭhānappayutto ^b^eva^eb^-saddo. Yāpanamattameva gahetabbanti yojetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ piṇḍapātappaṭiggahaṇe. ^b^Appa^eb^nti attano yāpanappamāṇatopi appaṃ gahetabbaṃ dāyakassa cittārādhanatthaṃ. ^b^Pamāṇenevā^eb^ti attano pamāṇeneva appaṃ gahetabbaṃ. ^b^Pamāṇena gahetabba^eb^nti ettha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paṭiggahaṇasmiñhī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Makkhetī^eb^ti viddhaṃseti apaneti. ^b^Vinipāteti^eb^ vināseti aṭṭhānaviniyogena. ^b^Sāsana^eb^nti satthusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ ^b^na karoti^eb^ na paṭipajjati. Sapadānacārinā viya ^a^M2.0272^ea^ dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ ^b^loluppavivajjanasantoso^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘dvārapaṭipāṭiyā gantabba’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Harāpetvā^eb^ti adhikaṃ apanetvā. Āhāragedhato nissarati etenāti ^b^nissaraṇaṃ^eb^. Jighacchāya paṭivinodanatthaṃ katā, kāyassa ṭhitiādipayojanaṃ pana atthāpattito āgatamevāti āha ^b^‘‘jighacchāya…pe… santoso nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nidahitvā na paribhuñjitabbaṃ^eb^ tadahupīti adhippāyo. Itarattha pana sikkhāpadeneva vāritaṃ. ^b^Sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhitenā^eb^ti sīlavantehi bhikkhūhi sādhāraṇabhogibhāve ṭhitena.

[03]^b^Senāsanenā^eb^ti sayanena āsanena ca. Yattha yattha hi mañcādike vihārādike ca seti, taṃ senaṃ. Yattha yattha pīṭhādike āsati, taṃ āsanaṃ. Tadubhayaṃ ekato katvā ^b^‘‘senāsana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mañco’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^mañco^eb^ masārakādi. Tathā ^b^pīṭhaṃ^eb^. Mañcabhisi, pīṭhabhisīti duvidho ^b^bhisi. Vihāro^eb^ pākāraparicchinno sakalo āvāso, ‘‘dīghamukhapāsādo’’ti keci. ^b^Aḍḍhayogo^eb^ dīghapāsādo, ‘‘ekapassacchādanakasenāsana’’nti keci. ^b^Pāsādo^eb^ti caturassapāsādo, ‘‘āyatacaturassapāsādo’’ti keci. ^b^Hammiya^eb^nti muṇḍacchadanapāsādo. ^b^Guhā^eb^ti kevalā pabbataguhā. ^b^Leṇaṃ^eb^ dvārabandhaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭo^eb^ bahalabhittikagehaṃ, yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi eva chadanaṃ hoti, ‘‘aṭṭalākārena karīyatī’’tipi vadanti. ^b^Māḷo^eb^ ekakūṭasaṅgahito anekakoṇo paṭissayaviseso, ‘‘vaṭṭākārena katasenāsana’’nti keci.

[03]^b^Piṇḍapāte^eb^^a^V2.0248^ea^^b^vuttanayenevā^eb^ti ‘‘sādako bhikkhu ‘ahaṃ kattha vasissāmī’ti vitakketī’’tiādinā yathārahaṃ piṇḍapāte vuttanayeneva veditabbā. ‘‘Tato paraṃ vitakkento ariyavaṃsā cuto hoti paribāhiro, senāsanaṃ kuhiṃ labhissāmīti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gantabba’’nti ca evamādi sabbaṃ purimanayeneva.

[03]Kasmā panettha paccayasantosaṃ dassentena bhagavatā gilānapaccayasantoso na gahitoti? Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbanti dassento ^b^‘‘gilānapaccayo pana piṇḍapāte eva paviṭṭho’’^eb^ti āha, āharitabbatāsāmaññenāti adhippāyo. Yadi evaṃ tatthāpi piṇḍapāte viya vitakkasantosādayopi ^a^M2.0273^ea^ pannarasa santosā icchitabbāti? Noti dassento āha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. Nanu cettha dvādaseva dhutaṅgāni viniyogaṃ gatāni, ekaṃ pana nesajjikaṅgaṃ na katthaci viniyuttanti āha ^b^‘‘nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmāriyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī’’^eb^ti. Ayañca attho aṭṭhakathāruḷho evāti dassento ^b^‘‘vuttampi ceta’’^eb^ntiādimāha.

[03]^b^Pathaviṃ pattharamāno viyā^eb^tiādi ariyavaṃsadesanāya sudukkarabhāvadassanaṃ mahāvisayattā tassā desanāya. Yasmā nayasahassapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ hoti, ariyamaggādhigamāya vitthārato pavattiyamānā desanā ^b^cittuppādakaṇḍe^eb^ ayañca bhāvanārāmāriyavaṃsakathā ariyamaggādhigamāya vitthārato pavattiyamānā eva hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sahassanayapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ…pe… desanaṃ ārabhī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Paṭipakkhavidhamanato abhimukhabhāvena ramaṇaṃ āramaṇaṃ ^b^ārāmo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘abhiratīti attho’’^eb^ti. Byadhikaraṇānampi padānaṃ vasena bhavati bāhiratthasamāso yathā ‘‘urasilomo kaṇṭhekāḷo’’ti āha ^b^‘‘bhāvanāya ārāmo assāti bhāvanārāmo’’^eb^ti. Abhiramitabbaṭṭhena vā ārāmo, bhāvanā ārāmo assāti ^b^bhāvanārāmo^eb^ti evampettha samāsayojanā veditabbā. ^b^Bhāvento ramatī^eb^ti etena bhāvanārāmasaddānaṃ kattusādhanataṃ kammadhārayasamāsatañca dasseti. ^b^‘‘Pajahanto ramatī’’^eb^ti vuttattā ^b^pahānārāmo^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]Kāmaṃ ‘‘nesajjikaṅgaṃ bhāvanārāmāriyavaṃsaṃ bhajatī’’ti vuttaṃ bhāvanānuyogassa anucchavikattā, nesajjikaṅgavasena pana nesajjikassa bhikkhuno ekaccāhi āpattīhi anāpattibhāvoti tampi saṅgaṇhanto ^b^‘‘terasannaṃ dhutaṅgāna’’^eb^nti vatvā vinayaṃ patvā garuke ṭhātabbanti icchitattā sallekhassa apariccajanavasena paṭipatti nāma vinaye ṭhitassevāti āha ^a^V2.0249^ea^^b^‘‘terasannaṃ…pe… kathitaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. Kāmaṃ suttābhidhammapiṭakesupi tattha tattha sīlakathā āhaṭāyeva, yehi pana guṇehi sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti, tesu kathitesu yathā sīlakathābāhullaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ kathitaṃ hoti, evaṃ bhāvanākathābāhullaṃ suttapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakañca catutthena ariyavaṃsena kathitena kathitameva hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bhāvanārāmena avasesaṃ piṭakadvayaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti. ‘‘So nekkhammaṃ bhāvento ^a^M2.0274^ea^ ramatī’’ti nekkhammapadaṃ ādiṃ katvā tattha desanāya pavattattā sabbesampi vā samathavipassanāmaggadhammānaṃ yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhato nikkhamanena nekkhammasaññitānaṃ tattha āgatattā so pāṭho nekkhammapāḷīti vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘nekkhamapāḷiyā kathetabbo’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^aṭṭhakathāyaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sabbepi kusalā dhamā, nekkhammanti pavuccare’’ti. ^b^Dasuttarasuttantapariyāyenā^eb^ti dasuttarasuttantadhammena (dī. ni. 3.350 ādayo) dasuttarasuttante āgatanayenāti vā attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^So^eb^ti jāgariyaṃ anuyutto bhikkhu. ^b^Nekkhamma^eb^nti kāmehi nikkhantabhāvato nekkhammasaññitaṃ paṭhamajjhānūpacāraṃ, so ‘‘abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā’’tiādinā (vibha. 508) āgato. Paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgabhāvanā hi idhādhippetā, tasmā ‘‘abyāpāda’’ntiādīsupi evameva attho veditabbo. Saupāyānañhi aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ aṭṭhārasannaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānañca vasenettha desanā pavattāti. Tattha ^b^abyāpāda^eb^nti mettā. ^b^Ālokasañña^eb^nti vibhūtaṃ katvā manasikaraṇena upaṭṭhitāalokasañjānanaṃ. ^b^Avikkhepa^eb^nti samādhiṃ. ^b^Dhammavavatthāna^eb^nti kusalādidhammānaṃ yāthāvanicchayaṃ, ‘‘sapaccayanāmavavatthāna’’ntipi vadanti. Evaṃ kāmacchandādinīvaraṇappahānena ‘‘abhijjhaṃ loke pahāyā’’tiādinā vuttassa paṭhamajjhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadāya bhāvanārāmataṃ pahānārāmatañca dassetvā idāni saha upāyena aṭṭhasamāpattīhi aṭṭhārasahi ca mahāvipassanāhi taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ñāṇa’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Nāmarūpapariggahaṇakaṅkhāvitaraṇānañhi vibandhabhūtassa mohassa dūrīkaraṇena ñātapariññāya ṭhitassa aniccasaññādayo sijjhanti. Tathā jhānasamāpattīsu anabhiratinimittena pāmojjena tattha anabhiratiyā vinoditāya jhānādīnaṃ samadhigamoti samāpattivipassanaṃ arativinodanāvijjāpadālanaupāyo. Uppaṭipāṭiniddeso pana nīvaraṇasabhāvāya avijjāya heṭṭhānīvaraṇesu saṅgahadassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñcāpi paṭhamajjhānūpacāreyeva dukkhaṃ, catutthajjhānūpacāreyeva sukhaṃ pahīyati, atisayappahānaṃ pana sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘catutthajjhānaṃ sukhadukkhe’’^eb^ti.

[03]Aniccassa ^a^M2.0275^ea^, aniccanti ca anupassanā ^b^aniccānupassanā,^eb^ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ aniccataṃ gahetvā ^a^V2.0250^ea^ pavattāya anupassanāyetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^Niccasañña^eb^nti saṅkhatadhammesu niccā sassatāti pavattaṃ micchāsaññaṃ. Saññāsīsena diṭṭhicittānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^Nibbidānupassana^eb^nti saṅkhāresu nibbindanākārena pavattaṃ anupassanaṃ. ^b^Nandi^eb^nti sappītikataṇhaṃ. ^b^Virāgānupassana^eb^nti virajjanākārena pavattaṃ anupassanaṃ. ^b^Nirodhānupassana^eb^nti saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhassa anupassanaṃ. ‘‘Te saṅkhārā nirujjhantiyeva, āyatiṃ samudayavasena na uppajjantī’’ti evaṃ vā anupassanā ^b^nirodhānupassanā^eb^. Tenevāha ‘‘nirodhānupassanāya nirodheti no samudetī’’ti. Muccitukāmatā hi ayaṃ balappattāti. Paṭinissajjanākārena pavattā anupassanā ^b^paṭinissaggānupassanā^eb^. Paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā hi ayaṃ. ^b^Ādāna^eb^nti niccādivasena gahaṇaṃ. Santatisamūhakiccārammaṇānaṃ vasena ekattaggahaṇaṃ ^b^ghanasaññā. Āyūhanaṃ^eb^ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ. Avatthāvisesāpatti ^b^vipariṇāmo. Dhuvasañña^eb^nti thirabhāvaggahaṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Nimitta^eb^nti samūhaghanavasena, sakiccaparicchedatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ saviggahataṃ. ^b^Paṇidhi^eb^nti rāgādipaṇidhiṃ. Sā panatthato taṇhāvasena saṅkhāresu ninnatā. ^b^Abhinivesa^eb^nti attānudiṭṭhi. Aniccadukkhādivasena sabbadhammatīraṇaṃ ^b^adhipaññādhammavipassanā. Sārādānābhinivesa^eb^nti asāre sāranti gahaṇavipallāsaṃ. ‘‘Issarakuttādivasena loko samuppanno’’ti abhiniveso ^b^sammohābhiniveso^eb^. Keci pana ‘‘ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānantiādinā (ma. ni. 1.18; saṃ. ni. 2.20) pavattasaṃsayāpatti sammohābhiniveso’’ti vadanti. Saṅkhāresu tāṇaleṇabhāvaggahaṇaṃ ^b^ālayābhiniveso^eb^. ‘‘Ālayaratā ālayasammuditā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.64, 67; ma. ni. 1.281; 2.337; saṃ. ni. 1.172; mahāva. 7, 8) ca vacanato ālayo taṇhā, sāyeva cakkhādīsu rūpādīsu ca abhinivesavasena pavattiyā ālayābhinivesoti keci. Evaṃ ṭhitā te saṅkhārā paṭinissajjīyantīti pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ ^b^paṭisaṅkhānupassanā^eb^. Vaṭṭato vigatattā vivaṭṭaṃ nibbānaṃ, tattha ārammaṇasaṅkhātena anupassanena pavattiyā ^b^vivaṭṭānupassanā^eb^ gotrabhu. ^b^Saṃyogābhinivesa^eb^nti saṃyujjanavasena saṅkhāresu nivesanaṃ. ^b^Diṭṭhekaṭṭhe^eb^ti diṭṭhiyā sahajātekaṭṭhe pahānekaṭṭhe ca. ^b^Oḷārike^eb^ti uparimaggavajjhe kilese ^a^M2.0276^ea^ apekkhitvā vuttaṃ, aññathā dassanappahātabbāpi dutiyamaggavajjhehipi oḷārikāti. ^b^Aṇusahagate^eb^ti aṇubhūte. Idaṃ heṭṭhimamaggavajjhe apekkhitvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabbakilese^eb^ti avasiṭṭhasabbakilese. Na hi paṭhamādimaggehipi pahīnā kilesā puna pahīyantīti.

[03]^b^Eva^eb^nti paṭisambhidāmagge (paṭi. ma. 1.41, 95) nekkhammapāḷiyā yojanaṃ nigametvā ^b^dīghanikāye^eb^tiādinā dasuttarapariyāyena (dī. ni. 3.350 ādayo) yojanaṃ dasseti ^a^V2.0251^ea^. ^b^Ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramatī^eb^ti ca nayidaṃ dasuttarasutte (dī. ni. 3.350 ādayo) āgataniyāmena vuttaṃ, tattha pana ‘‘eko dhammo bhāvetabbo, eko dhammo pahātabbo’’ti desanā āgatā. Evaṃ santepi yasmā atthato bhedo natthi, tasmā paṭisambhidāmagge (paṭi. ma. 1.41, 95) nekkhammapāḷiyaṃ āgatanīhāreneva ^b^‘‘ekaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvento ramati, ekaṃ dhammaṃ pajahanto ramatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sesavāresupi.

[03]^b^Eva^eb^ntiādinā dasuttarapariyāyena (dī. ni. 3.350 ādayo) yojanaṃ nigametvā idāni satipaṭṭhānasuttantapariyāyena (ma. ni. 1.105 ādayo) yojanaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘majjhimanikāye’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Kāmañcettha kāyānupassanāvaseneva saṃkhipitvā yojanā katā, ekavīsatiyā pana ṭhānānaṃ vasenapi yojanā kātabbā. Idāni abhidhammaniddesapariyāyena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abhidhamme niddesapariyāyenā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Aniccato^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāsu^eb^ (visuddhi. 2.698; visuddhi. mahāṭī. 2.698) vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Ukkaṇṭhita^eb^nti adhikusalesu dhammesu pantasenāsanesu ca ukkaṇṭhādiñca, ananuyogoti attho. Ariyavaṃsapūrako dhīro sīlavā bhikkhu ariyavaṃsaparipūraṇassa bhedaṃ anicchanto samāhito vipassako ca paccayaghātena aratiyā ratiyā ca sahitā abhibhavitā hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aratiratisaho, bhikkhave, dhīro’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Ariyavaṃsasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^29^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^a^M2.0277^ea^ jhānādibhedo dhammo pajjati etenāti dhammapadaṃ, anabhijjhāva dhammapadaṃ ^b^anabhijjhādhammapadaṃ,^eb^ anabhijjhāpadhāno vā dhammakoṭṭhāso ^b^anabhijjhādhammapadaṃ^eb^. Evaṃ sesesupi. Atthato pana ^b^anabhijjhādhammapadaṃ^eb^ nāma alobho vā alobhasīsena adhigatajjhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni vā. ^b^Abyāpādo dhammapadaṃ^eb^ nāma mettā vā mettāsīsena adhigatajjhānādīni vā. ^b^Sammāsatidhammapadaṃ^eb^ nāma sūpaṭṭhitassati vā satisīsena adhigatajjhānādīni vā. ^b^Sammāsamādhidhammapadaṃ^eb^ nāma aṭṭhasamāpatti vā aṭṭhasamāpattisīsena adhigatajjhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānāni vā. Dasāsubhavasena vā adhigatajjhānādīni ^b^anabhijjā dhammapadaṃ^eb^. Catubrahmavihāravasena ^a^V2.0252^ea^ adhigatāni ^b^abyāpādo dhammapadaṃ^eb^. Dasānussati āhārepaṭikūlasaññāvasena adhigatāni ^b^sammāsatidhammapadaṃ^eb^. Dasakasiṇāanāpānavasena adhigatāni ^b^sammāsamādhidhammapadaṃ. Anabhijjhālū^eb^ti anabhijjhāyanasīlo. Abhipubbo jhesaddo abhijjhāyanaṭṭho. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘nittaṇho hutvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pakatibhāvaṃ avijahantenā^eb^ti parisuddhabhāvaṃ sabhāvasaṅkhātānavajjasaṅkhātaṃ pakatibhāvaṃ avijahantena. Sāvajjadhammasamuppattiyā hi cittassa anavajjabhāvo jahito hotīti.
[06]Dhammapadasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^30^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^b^abhiññātā^eb^ti ediso ca ediso cāti abhilakkhaṇavasena ñātā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ñātā pākaṭā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti ettha ^b^paṭisallāna^eb^nti tehi tehi saddhivihārikāntevāsikaupāsakādisattehi ceva rūpārammaṇādisaṅkhārehi ca paṭinivattitvā apasakkitvā sallīnaṃ nilīyanaṃ, ekībhāvo pavivekoti vuttaṃ hoti. Yo tato vuṭṭhito, so paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito nāma hoti. Bhagavā pana yasmā paṭisallānā uttamato phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāsi, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vatthukāmesū^eb^ti rūpādīsu kilesakāmassa vatthubhūtesu kāmesu. ^b^Bahalarāga^eb^nti thiramūladummocanīyatāhi ajjhosānena bahalabhūtaṃ kilesakāmaṃ ^a^M2.0278^ea^. ^b^Sakāraṇā^eb^ti yehi kāraṇehi paresaṃ vāde dosaṃ dassenti, tehi kāraṇehi sakāraṇā. Na hi lakkhaṇayuttena hetunā vinā paravādesu dosaṃ dassetuṃ sakkā.

[03]^b^Evamādī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^saddena ‘‘natthi hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā’’ti (dī. ni. 1.168) evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti, tasmā ^b^evamādivādino^eb^ evaṃ hetuppaṭikkhepavādinoti attho. Ettha ca natthikadiṭṭhi vipākaṃ paṭibāhati, akiriyadiṭṭhi kammaṃ paṭibāhati, ahetukadiṭṭhi ubhayaṃ paṭibāhati. Tattha kammaṃ paṭibāhantena vipāko paṭibāhito hoti, vipākaṃ paṭibāhantenapi kammaṃ paṭibāhitaṃ. Iti sabbepete atthato ubhayapaṭibāhakā ahetuvādā ceva akiriyavādā ca natthikavādā ca honti.

[03]^b^Okkantaniyamā^eb^ti ogāḷhamicchattaniyamā. ^b^Sajjhāyatī^eb^ti taṃ diṭṭhidīpakaṃ ganthaṃ uggahetvā paṭhati. ^b^Vīmaṃsatī^eb^ti tassa atthaṃ vicāreti. ^b^Tassā^eb^tiādi vīmaṃsanākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Tasmiṃ^eb^^a^V2.0253^ea^^b^ārammaṇe^eb^ti yathāparikappitahetupaccayābhāvādike natthi hetūtiādinayappavattāya laddhiyā ārammaṇe. ^b^Micchāsati santiṭṭhatī^eb^ti ‘‘natthi hetū’’tiādivasena anussavūpaladdhe atthe tadākāraparivitakkanehi saviggahe viya sarūpato cittassa paccupaṭṭhite cirakālaparicayena evametanti nijjhānakkhamabhāvūpagamanena nijjhānakkhantiyā tathāgahite punappunaṃ tatheva āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa micchāvitakkena samānīyamānā micchāvāyāmopatthambhitā ataṃsabhāvaṃ taṃsabhāvanti gaṇhantī micchāsatīti laddhanāmā taṃladdhisahagatā taṇhā santiṭṭhati. ^b^Cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hotī^eb^ti yathāvuttavitakkādipaccayalābhena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe avaṭṭhitatāya anekaggataṃ pahāya cittaṃ ekaggaṃ appitaṃ viya hoti micchāsamādhinā. Sopi hi paccayavisesena laddhabhāvanābalo kadāci samādhānapaṭirūpakiccakaro hotiyeva paharaṇavijjhanādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Javanāni javantī^eb^ti anekakkhattuṃ tenākārena pubbabhāgiyesu javanavāresu pavattesu sabbapacchime javanavāre satta javanāni javanti. ^b^Paṭhamajavane satekiccho hoti, tathā dutiyādīsū^eb^ti dhammasabhāvadassanametaṃ, na pana tasmiṃ khaṇe tesaṃ satekicchabhāvāpādanaṃ kenaci ^a^M2.0279^ea^ sakkā kātuṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tesu tīsu micchādassanesu. ^b^Koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamatī^eb^ti yassa ekasmiṃyeva abhiniveso āsevanā pavattā, so ekaṃyeva dassanaṃ okkamati. Yassa dvīsu tīsupi vā abhiniveso āsevanā pavattā, so ^b^dve tīṇi okkamati^eb^. Etena yā pubbe ubhayapaṭibāhikatāmukhena pavattā atthasiddhā sabbadiṭṭhikā, sā pubbabhāgiyā, micchāniyāmokkantiyā pana yathāsakaṃ paccayasamudāgamadiṭṭhito bhinnārammaṇānaṃ viya visesādhigamānaṃ ekajjhaṃ anuppattiyā abhikiṇṇā evāti dasseti. Ekasmiṃ okkantepi dvīsu tīsu okkantesupi niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova hotīti iminā tissannampi diṭṭhīnaṃ samānaphalataṃ samānabalañca dasseti. Tasmā tissopi cetanā ekassa uppannā aññamaññaṃ anubalappadāyikā honti.

[03]Kiṃ panesa etasmiññeva attabhāve niyato, udāhu aññasmimpīti? Etasmiññeva niyato. Akusalañhi nāmetaṃ abalaṃ, na kusalaṃ viya mahābalaṃ. Aññathā sammattaniyāmo viya accantiko siyā, āsevanavasena pana bhavantarepi taṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ rocetiyeva. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘vaṭṭakhāṇuko nāmesa satto’’^eb^ti. Tasmā ‘‘sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggo eva bālo’’ti viya vaṭṭakhāṇujotanā, yādisehi pana paccayehi ayaṃ taṃ dassanaṃ okkanto puna kadāci micchattaniyāmo tappaṭikkhepapaccaye paṭicca tato sīsukkhepanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yebhuyyenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Edisā^eb^ti ‘‘buddhānampi atekicchā’’tiādinā vuttasadisā.

[03]^b^Attano^eb^^a^V2.0254^ea^^b^nindābhayenā^eb^ti ‘‘sammā diṭṭhiñca nāma te garahantī’’tiādinā attano upari parehi vattabbanindābhayena. ^b^Ghaṭṭanabhayenā^eb^ti tathā paresaṃ apasādanabhayena. Sahadhammena parena attano upari kātabbaniggaho upārambho, tato parittāso upārambhabhayaṃ. Taṃ pana atthato upavādabhayaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘upavādabhayenā’’^eb^ti. Paṭippassaddhivasena abhijjhā vinayati etenāti ^b^abhijjhāvinayo,^eb^ arahattaphalaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘abhijjhāvinayo vuccati arahatta’’^eb^nti.
[06]Paribbājakasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Uruvelavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^31^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthassa ^a^M2.0280^ea^ paṭhame ^b^cattāri cakkānī^eb^ti ettha cakkaṃ nāma dārucakkaṃ, ratanacakkaṃ, dhammacakkaṃ, iriyāpathacakkaṃ, sampatticakkanti pañcavidhaṃ. Tattha ‘‘yaṃ panidaṃ, samma, rathakāracakkaṃ chahi māsehi niṭṭhitaṃ chārattūnehī’’ti (a. ni. 3.15) idaṃ dārucakkaṃ. ‘‘Pitarā pavattitaṃ cakkaṃ anuvattetī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 1.215) idaṃ ratanacakkaṃ. ‘‘Mayā pavattitaṃ cakka’’nti (su. ni. 562; bu. vaṃ. 27.17; jā. 1.1.104; 1.5.100, 103) idaṃ dhammacakkaṃ. ‘‘Catucakkaṃ navadvāra’’nti (saṃ. ni. 1.29, 109) idaṃ iriyāpathacakkaṃ. ‘‘Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī’’ti (a. ni. 4.31) idaṃ sampatticakkaṃ. Idhāpi etadeva adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘cattāri sampatticakkāni vattantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anucchavike dese^eb^ti puññakiriyāya sammāpaṭipattiyā anurūpadese. ^b^Sevanaṃ^eb^ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanaṃ. ^b^Bhajanaṃ^eb^ bhattivasena payirupāsanaṃ. ^b^Attano sammā ṭhapana^eb^nti attano cittasantānassa yoniso ṭhapanaṃ. Saddhādīsu nivesananti āha ^b^‘‘sace’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Idameva cettha pamāṇa^eb^nti idameva pubbekatapuññatāsaṅkhātaṃ sampatticakkaṃ eva etesu sampatticakkesu pamāṇabhūtaṃ itaresaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ^a^V2.0255^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yena hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^So eva ca^eb^ katapuñño ^b^puggalo attānaṃ sammā ṭhapeti^eb^ akatapuññassa tadabhāvato.
[06]Cakkasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^32^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^tassa dānameva dātabba^eb^nti pabbajitassa pabbajitaparikkhāraṃ pattacīvarādi, gihino gihiparikkhāraṃ vatthāvudhayānasayanādi dātabbaṃ. ^b^Sabba^eb^nti sabbaṃ upakāraṃ. ^b^Makkhetvā nāseti^eb^ makkhibhāve ṭhatvā. ^b^Telena viya makkhetī^eb^ti satadhotatelena makkheti viya. ^b^Atthavaḍḍhanakathā^eb^ti hitāvahakathā. Kathāgahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ, paresaṃ hitāvaho kāyappayogopi ^a^M2.0281^ea^^b^atthacariyā^eb^. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana vacippayogavaseneva atthacariyā vuttā. ^b^Samānattatā^eb^ti sadisabhāvo, samānaṭṭhāne ṭhapanaṃ, taṃ panassa samānaṭṭhapanaṃ attasadisatākaraṇamukhena ekasambhogatā. Attano sukhuppattiyaṃ tassa ca dukkhuppattiyaṃ tena dukkhena attanā ekasambhogatāti āha ^b^‘‘samānasukhadukkhabhāvo’’^eb^ti. Sā ca samānasukhadukkhatā ekato nisajjādinā pākaṭā hotīti dassento ^b^‘‘ekāsane’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Tattha jātiyā hīno bhogena adhiko dussaṅgaho hoti. Na hi sakkā tena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogo kātuṃ jātiyā hīnattā. Tassa tathā akariyamāne ca so kujjhati bhogena adhikattā, tasmā so dussaṅgaho. Bhogena hīno jātiyā adhikopi dussaṅgaho hoti. So hi ‘‘ahaṃ jātimā’’ti bhogasampannena saddhi ekaparibhogaṃ icchati, tasmiṃ akariyamāne kujjhati. Ubhohipi hīno susaṅgaho hoti. Na hi so itarena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogaṃ icchati jātiyā hīnabhāvato, na akariyamāno kujjhati bhogena hīnabhāvato. Ubhohi sadisopi susaṅgahoyeva. Sadisabhāveneva itarena saha ekaparibhogassa paccāsīsāya, akaraṇe ca tassa kujjhanassa abhāvato. Bhikkhu dussīlo dussaṅgaho hoti. Na hi sakkā tena saddhiṃ ekaparibhogaṃ kātuṃ, akariyamāne ca kujjhati. Sīlavā pana susaṅgaho hoti. Sīlavā hi adīyamānepi kismiñci āmise akariyamānepi saṅgahe na kujjhati, aññaṃ attanā saddhiṃ paribhogaṃ akarontampi na pāpakena cittena passati pesalabhāvato. Tato eva paribhogopi anena saddhiṃ sukaro hoti, tasmā gihi ce, ubhohi sadiso. Pabbajito ce, sīlavā puggalo ^a^V2.0256^ea^. Evaṃ samānattatāya saṅgahetabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘so sace gahaṭṭhassa jātiyā pabbajitassa sīlena sadiso hoti, tassāyaṃ samānattatā kātabbā’’^eb^ti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Saṅgahasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^33^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tatiye ^a^M2.0282^ea^^b^sīho^eb^ti parissayasahanato paṭipakkhahananato ca ‘‘sīho’’ti laddhanāmo migādhipati. ^b^Cattāro^eb^ti samānepi sīhajātibhāve vaṇṇavisesādisiddhena visesena cattāro sīhā. Te idāni nāmato vaṇṇato āhārato dassetvā idhādhippetasīhaṃ nānappakārato vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘tiṇasīho’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tiṇabhakkho sīho ^b^tiṇasīho^eb^ purimapade uttarapadalopena yathā ‘‘sākapatthivo’’ti (pāṇini 2.1.60). Kāḷavaṇṇatāya ^b^kāḷasīho^eb^. Tathā ^b^paṇḍusīho^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāḷagāvisadiso, paṇḍupalāsavaṇṇagāvisadiso’’^eb^ti ca. Rattakambalassa viya kesaro kesarakalomo etassa atthīti ^b^kesarī^eb^. Lākhāparikammakatehi viya pādapariyantehīti ca yojanā.
[03]Kammānubhāvasiddhādhipaccamahesakkhatāhi ^b^sabbamigagaṇassa rājā. Suvaṇṇaguhato vā^eb^tiādi ‘‘sīhassa vihāro kiriyā evaṃ hotī’’ti katvā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Samaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā^eb^ti sabbabhāgehi samameva bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā. ^b^Ākaḍḍhitvā^eb^ti purato ākaḍḍhitvā. ^b^Abhiharitvā^eb^ti abhimukhaṃ haritvā. ^b^Saṅghāta^eb^nti vināsaṃ. Vīsatiyaṭṭhikaṃ ṭhānaṃ ^b^usabhaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Samasīho^eb^ti samajātiko samappabhāvo ca sīho. ^b^Samānosmī^eb^ti desanāmattaṃ, samappabhāvatāya eva ^b^na bhāyati. Sakkāyadiṭṭhibalavatāyā^eb^ti ‘‘ke aññe amhehi uttaritarā, atha kho mayameva mahābalā’’ti evaṃ balātimānanimittāya ahaṃkārahetubhūtāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā balavabhāvena. ^b^Sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā pahīnattā^eb^ti nirahaṃkārattā attasinehassa suṭṭhu samugghātattā ^b^na bhāyati^eb^.
[03]^b^Tathā^eb^^a^V2.0257^ea^^b^tathā^eb^ti sīhasadisatādinā tena tena pakārena attānaṃ kathesīti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivaritvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sīhoti kho’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Katamahābhinīhārassa lokanāthassa bodhiyā niyatabhāvappattiyā ekantabhāvī buddhabhāvoti katvā ‘‘tīsu pāsādesu nivāsakālo ^a^M2.0283^ea^, magadharañño paṭiññādānakālo, pāyāsassa paribhuttakālo’’tiādinā abhisambodhito purimāvatthāpi sīhasadisā katvā dassitā. Bhāvini bhūtūpacāropi hi lokavohāro. Vijjābhāvasāmaññato dvivijjaṃ itaravijjampi ekajjhaṃ gahetvā paṭiccasamuppādasammasanato taṃ puretarasiddhaṃ viya katvā āha ^b^‘‘tisso vijjā sodhetvā’’^eb^ti. Anulomapaṭilomato pavattañāṇassa vasena ^b^‘‘yamakañāṇamanthanenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Tattha viharantassā^eb^ti ajapālanigrodhamūle viharantassa. ^b^Ekādasame divase^eb^ti sattasattāhato paraṃ ekādasame divase. ^b^Acalapallaṅke^eb^ti isipatane dhammacakkappavattanatthaṃ nisinnapallaṅke. Tampi hi kenaci appaṭivattiyaṃ dhammacakkappavattanatthaṃ nisajjāti katvā vajirāsanaṃ viya acalapallaṅkaṃ vuccati. ^b^Imasmiñca pana pade^eb^ti ‘‘dveme, bhikkhave, antā’’tiādinayappavatte ca imasmiṃ saddhammakoṭṭhāse. ^b^Dhammaghoso…pe… dasasahassilokadhātuṃ paṭicchādesi^eb^ ‘‘sabbattha ṭhitā suṇantū’’ti adhiṭṭhānena. ^b^Soḷasahākārehī^eb^ti dukkhapariññā, samudayappahānaṃ, nirodhasacchikiriyā, maggabhāvanāti ekekasmiṃ magge cattāri cattāri katvā soḷasahi ākārehi.

[03]Paṭhamena nayena abhisambodhito purimatarāvatthāpi avassaṃbhāvitāya gahetvā sīhasadisataṃ dassetvā idāni abhisambuddhāvatthāsu eva sīhasadisataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aparo nayo’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhahi kāraṇehī^eb^ti ‘‘tathā āgatoti tathāgato, tathā gatoti tathāgato, tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato, tathadhamme yāthāvato abhisambuddhoti tathāgato, tathadassitāya tathāgato, tathavāditāya tathāgato, tathākāritāya tathāgato, abhibhavanaṭṭhena tathāgato’’ti (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.7; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.12; saṃ. ni. aṭṭha. 2.3.78; a. ni. aṭṭha. 1.1.170; udā. aṭṭha. 18; itivu. aṭṭha. 38; theragā. aṭṭha. 1.3; bu. vaṃ. aṭṭha. 1.2 nidānakathā; mahāni. aṭṭha. 14; paṭi. ma. 1.37) evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhahi tathāgatasādhakehi kāraṇehi. Yadipi bhagavā bodhipallaṅke nisinnamatteva abhisambuddho na jāto, tathāpi tāya nisajjāya nisinnova panujja sabbaṃ parissayaṃ abhisambuddho jāto. Tathā hi taṃ ^a^V2.0258^ea^ ‘‘aparājitapallaṅka’’nti vuccati, tasmā ^b^‘‘yāva bodhipallaṅkā vā’’^eb^ti vatvā tena aparitussanto ^b^‘‘yāva arahattamaggañāṇā vā’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Iti^eb^^a^M2.0284^ea^^b^sakkāyo^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^saddo nidassanattho. Tena sakkāyo sarūpato parimāṇato paricchedato ca dassitoti āha ^b^‘‘ayaṃ sakkāyo’’^eb^tiādi. ‘‘Ayaṃ sakkāyo’’ti iminā pañcupādānakkhandhā sarūpato dassitā. ^b^‘‘Ettako sakkāyo’’^eb^ti iminā te parimāṇato dassitā. Tassa ca parimāṇassa ekantikabhāvaṃ dassentena ^b^‘‘na ito bhiyyo sakkāyo atthī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Sabhāvato^eb^ti salakkhaṇato. ^b^Sarasato^eb^ti sakiccato. ^b^Pariyantato^eb^ti parimāṇapariyantato. ^b^Paricchedato^eb^ti yattake ṭhāne tassa pavattitassa paricchindanato. ^b^Parivaṭumato^eb^ti pariyosānappavattito. ^b^Sabbepi pañcupādānakkhandhā dassitā honti^eb^ yathāvuttena vibhāgena. ^b^Ayaṃ sakkāyassa samudayo nāmā^eb^ti ayaṃ āhārādisakkāyassa samudayo nāma. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettāvatā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Atthaṅgamo^eb^ti nirodho. ‘‘Āhārasamudayā āhāranirodhā’’ti ca asādhāraṇameva taṃ gahetvā sesesu ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Paṇṇāsalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍita^eb^nti paṇṇāsaudayavayalakkhaṇavibhūsitaṃ samudayatthaṅgamaggahaṇato. ^b^Khīṇāsavattā^eb^ti anavasesaṃ sāvasesañca āsavānaṃ parikkhīṇattā. Anāgāmīnampi hi bhayaṃ cittutrāsañca na hotīti. ^b^Ñāṇasaṃvego^eb^ bhayatupaṭṭhānapaññā. ^b^Itarāsaṃ pana devatāna^eb^nti akhīṇāsavadeve sandhāya vadati. ^b^Bhoti dhammālapanamatta^eb^nti sabhāvakathanamattaṃ.

[03]^b^Cakka^eb^nti satthu āṇācakkaṃ. Taṃ pana dhammato āgatanti ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^. Tattha ariyasāvakānaṃ paṭivedhadhammato āgatanti ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^. Itaresaṃ desanādhammato āgatanti ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^. Duvidhepi ñāṇaṃ padhānanti ñāṇasīsena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampī’’^eb^ti. Idāni taṃ ñāṇaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘paṭivedhañāṇaṃ nāmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Yasmā tassa ñāṇassa paṭividdhattā bhagavā tāni saṭṭhi nayasahassāni veneyyānaṃ dassetuṃ samattho ahosi, tasmā tāni saṭṭhi nayasahassāni tena ñāṇena saddhiṃyeva siddhānīti katvā dassento ^b^‘‘saṭṭhiyā ca nayasahassehi paṭivijjhī’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Tiparivaṭṭa^eb^nti ‘‘idaṃ dukkha’’nti ca ‘‘pariññeyya’’nti ca ‘‘pariññāta’’nti ca evaṃ tiparivaṭṭaṃ, taṃyeva ^b^dvādasākāraṃ^eb^. ^b^Ta^eb^nti desanāñāṇaṃ. ^b^Esa^eb^ bhagavā. ^b^Appaṭipuggalo^eb^ti paṭinidhibhūtapuggalarahito. ^b^Ekasadisassā^eb^ti nibbikārassa.
[06]Sīhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^34^eb^^b^.^eb^ Catutthe ^a^M2.0285^ea^^a^V2.0259^ea^^b^aggesu pasādā^eb^ti seṭṭhesu pasādā. ^b^Aggā vā pasādā^eb^ti seṭṭhabhūtā pasādā. Seṭṭhavacano hettha ^b^agga^eb^saddo. Purimasmiṃ atthavikappe aggasaddena buddhādiratanattayaṃ vuccati. Tesu bhagavā tāva asadisaṭṭhena, guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhena, asamasamaṭṭhena ca aggo. So hi mahābhinīhāraṃ dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ pavicayañca ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi ceva buddhaguṇehi ca payojanehi ca sesajanehi asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi aggo. Ye cassa te guṇā mahākaruṇādayo, tehi sesasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi sabbasattuttamatāya aggo. Ye pana purimakā sammāsambuddhā sabbasattehi asamā, tehi saddhiṃ ayameva rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva dhammakāyaguṇehi ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi aggo. Tathā dullabhapātubhāvato acchariyamanussabhāvato bahujanahitasukhāvahato adutiyāsahāyādibhāvato ca bhagavā loke aggoti vuccati. Yathāha –

[08]‘‘Ekapuggalassa, bhikkhave, pātubhāvo dullabho lokasmiṃ. Katamassa ekapuggalassa? Tathāgatassa arahato sammāsammuddhassa. Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso. Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati bahujana…pe… sammāsambuddho. Ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati adutiyo asahāyo appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggalo asamo asamasamo dvipadānaṃ aggo. Katamo ekapuggalo? Tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho’’ti (a. ni. 1.171-173).

[03]Dhammasaṅghā aññadhammasaṅghehi asadisaṭṭhena visiṭṭhaguṇatāya dullabhapātubhāvādinā ca aggā. Tathā hi tesaṃ svākkhātatādisuppaṭipannatādiguṇavisesehi aññe dhammasaṅghasadisā appataraṃ nihīnā vā natthi, kuto seṭṭhā. Sayameva tehi visiṭṭhaguṇatāya seṭṭhā. Tathā dullabhuppādācchariyabhāvabahujanahitasukhāvahādutiyāsahāyādisabhāvā ca te. Yadaggena hi bhagavā dullabhapātubhāvo, tadaggena ^a^M2.0286^ea^ dhammasaṅghāpīti. ^b^Acchariyā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. Evaṃ aggesu seṭṭhesu uttamesu pavaresu guṇavisiṭṭhesu pasādāti ^b^aggappasadā^eb^.

[03]Dutiyasmiṃ panatthe yathāvuttesu aggesu buddhādīsu uppattiyā aggabhūtā pasādā ^b^aggappasādā^eb^. Ye pana ariyamaggena āgatā aveccappasādā, te ekanteneva aggabhūtā pasādāti ^b^aggappasādā^eb^. Yathāha – ‘‘idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato ^a^V2.0260^ea^ hotī’’tiādi (saṃ. ni. 5.1037-1038). Aggavipākattāpi cete ^b^aggappasādā^eb^. Vuttampi cetaṃ – ‘‘agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko’’ti (a. ni. 4.34; itivu. 90).

[03]^b^Apadā vā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^vā^eb^-saddo samuccayattho, na vikappattho. Yathā ‘‘anuppanno vā kāmāsavo uppajjati, uppanno vā kāmāsavo pavaḍḍhatī’’ti (ma. ni. 1.17) ettha anuppanno ca uppanno cāti attho. Yathā ca ‘‘bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ vā anuggahāyā’’ti ettha bhūtānañca sambhavesīnañcāti attho. Yathā ca ‘‘aggito vā udakato vā mithubhedato vā’’ti (dī. ni. 2.152) ettha aggito ca udakato ca mithubhedato cāti attho, evaṃ ‘‘apadā vā…pe… aggamakkhāyatī’’ti (a. ni. 4.34; itivu. 90) etthāpi apadā ca dvipadā cāti sampiṇḍanavasena attho daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘vā-saddo samuccayattho, na vikappattho’’ti.

[03]^b^Rūpino^eb^ti rūpavanto. Na rūpinoti ^b^arūpino. Saññino^eb^ti saññavanto. Na saññinoti ^b^asaññino^eb^. ‘‘Apadā vā’’tiādisabbapadehi kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo, arūpabhavo, ekavokārabhavo, catuvokārabhavo, pañcavokārabhavo, saññibhavo, asaññibhavo, nevasaññināsaññibhavoti navavidhepi bhave sattepi anavasesato pariyādiyitvā dasseti. Ettha hi rūpiggahaṇena kāmabhavo, rūpabhavo, pañcavokārabhavo, ekavokārabhavo ca dassito, arūpiggahaṇena arūpabhavo, catuvokārabhavo ca dassito, saññibhavādayo pana sarūpeneva dassitā. Apadādiggahaṇena kāmabhavapañcavokārabhavasaññibhavānaṃ ekadesova dassito.

[03]Kasmā ^a^M2.0287^ea^ panettha yathā adutiyasutte ‘‘dvipadānaṃ aggo’’ti dvipadā eva gahitā, evaṃ dvipadaggahaṇameva akatvā apadādiggahaṇaṃ katanti? Vuccate – adutiyasutte tāva seṭṭhataravasena dvipadaggahaṇameva kataṃ. Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahupadesu na uppajjati, dvipadesuyeva uppajjati. Kataresu dvipadesu? Manussesu ceva devesu ca. Manussesu uppajjamāno sakalalokaṃ vase vattetuṃ samattho buddho hutvā uppajjati, devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātuṃ vase vattanako mahābrahmā hutvā uppajjati, so tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati. Iti tatopi seṭṭhataravasenesa dvipadānaṃ aggoti tattha vuttaṃ. Idha pana anavasesapariyādānavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘yāvatā, bhikkhave, sattā apadā vā…pe… nevasaññināsaññino vā, tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti ^a^V2.0261^ea^. Niddhāraṇe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Ma^eb^-kāro padasandhikaro, aggo akkhāyatīti padavibhāgo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘guṇehi aggo’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Aggo vipāko hotī^eb^ti agge sammāsambuddhe pasannānaṃ yo pasādo aggo seṭṭho uttamakoṭibhūto vā, tasmā tassa vipākopi aggo seṭṭho uttamakoṭibhūto uḷāratamo paṇītatamo hoti. So pana pasādo duvidho lokiyalokuttarabhedato. Tesu lokiyassa tāva –
[21]‘‘Ye keci buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse,
[27]Na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
[26]Pahāya mānusaṃ dehaṃ,
[22]Devakāyaṃ paripūressanti. (dī. ni. 2.332; itivu. aṭṭha. 90; saṃ. ni. 1.37);
[21]‘‘Buddhoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti;
[22]Varameva hi sā pīti, kasiṇenapi jambudīpassa. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.6; itivu. aṭṭha. 90);
[21]‘‘Sataṃ hatthī sataṃ assā, sataṃ assatarīrathā;
[27]Sataṃ kaññāsahassāni, āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā;
[22]Ekassa padavītihārassa, kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasiṃ’’. (cūḷava. 305);

[08]‘‘Sādhu ^a^M2.0288^ea^ kho, devānaminda, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, buddhaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti. Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhiggaṇhanti dibbena āyunā, dibbena vaṇṇena, dibbena sukhena, dibbena yasena, dibbena ādhipateyyena, dibbehi rūpehi, dibbehi saddehi, dibbehi gandhehi, dibbehi rasehi, dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.341) –
[07]Evamādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena pasādaphalavisesayogo veditabbo, tasmā so apāyadukkhavinivattanena saddhiṃ sampattibhavesu sukhavisesadāyakova daṭṭhabbo.
[03]Lokuttaro ^a^V2.0262^ea^ pana sāmaññaphalavipākadāyako vaṭṭadukkhavinivattako. Sabbopi cāyaṃ pasādo paramparāya vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vinivattetiyeva. Vuttañhetaṃ –

[08]‘‘Yasmiṃ samaye, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako attano saddhaṃ anussarati, nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, na dosapariyuṭṭhitaṃ…pe… na mohapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti, ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti, ujugatacittassa pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati…pe… nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī’’ti.

[03]^b^Dhammā^eb^ti sabhāvadhammā. ^b^Saṅkhatā^eb^ti samecca sambhūya paccayehi katāti saṅkhatā, sapaccayā dhammā. Hetūhi paccayehi ca na kehici katā saṅkhatāti ^b^asaṅkhatā,^eb^ apaccayo nibbānaṃ. Saṅkhatānaṃ pariyositabhāvena ‘‘asaṅkhatā’’ti puthuvacanaṃ. ^b^Virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti tesaṃ saṅkhatāsaṅkhatadhammānaṃ yo virāgasaṅkhāto asaṅkhatadhammo, so sabhāveneva saṇhasukhumabhāvato santatarapaṇītatarabhāvato gambhīrādibhāvato madanimmadanādibhāvato aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ pavaranti vuccati. ^b^Yadida^eb^nti nipāto, yo ayanti attho. ^b^Madanimmadano^eb^tiādīni sabbāni nibbānavevacanāni. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘virāgotiādīni nibbānasseva nāmānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Rāgamadādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena mānamadapurisamadādike saṅgaṇhāti ^a^M2.0289^ea^. ^b^Sabbā pipāsā^eb^ti kāmapipāsādikā sabbā pipāsā. ^b^Sabbe ālayā samugghātaṃ gacchantī^eb^ti kāmālayādikā sabbepi ālayā samugghātaṃ yanti. ^b^Vaṭṭānī^eb^ti kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭāni. ^b^Taṇhā^eb^ti aṭṭhasatappabhedā sabbāpi taṇhā.
[03]^b^Aggo vipāko hotī^eb^ti etthāpi –
[22]‘‘Ye keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse…pe…’’. (dī. ni. 2.332; saṃ ni. 1.37);
[22]‘‘Dhammoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti…pe…’’. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.6; itivu. aṭṭha. 90);
[08]‘‘Sādhu kho, devānaminda, dhammaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda, evamidhekacce…pe… dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.341) –
[07]Evamādīnaṃ ^a^V2.0263^ea^ suttapadānaṃ vasena dhamme pasādassa phalavisesayogo veditabbo.

[03]^b^Saṅghā vā gaṇā vā^eb^ti janasamūhasaṅkhātā yāvatā loke saṅghā vā gaṇā vā. ^b^Tathāgatasāvakasaṅgho^eb^ti aṭṭhāriyapuggalasamūhasaṅkhāto diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhato tathāgatassa sāvakasaṅgho. ^b^Aggamakkhāyatī^eb^ti attano sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiādiguṇavisesena tesaṃ saṅghānaṃ aggo seṭṭho uttamo pavaroti vuccati. ^b^Yadida^eb^nti yāni imāni. ^b^Cattāri purisayugāni^eb^ yugaḷavasena, paṭhamamaggaṭṭho paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷaṃ, yāva catutthamaggaṭṭho catutthaphalaṭṭhoti idamekaṃ yugaḷanti evaṃ cattāri purisayugāni. ^b^Aṭṭha purisapuggalā^eb^ti purisapuggalavasena eko paṭhamamaggaṭṭho, eko paṭhamaphalaṭṭhoti iminā nayena aṭṭha purisapuggalā. Ettha ca purisoti vā puggaloti vā ekatthāni etāni padāni, veneyyavasena panevaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho^eb^ti yānimāni yugaḷavasena cattāri yugāni pāṭiyekkato aṭṭha purisapuggalā, esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho. ^b^Āhuneyyo^eb^tiādīni vuttatthāneva. Idhāpi –
[22]‘‘Ye keci saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse…pe…’’. (dī. ni. 2.332; saṃ. ni. 1.37);
[22]‘‘Saṅghoti kittayantassa, kāye bhavati yā pīti…pe…’’. (dī. ni. aṭṭha. 1.6; itivu. aṭṭha. 90);
[08]‘‘Sādhu ^a^M2.0290^ea^ kho, devānaminda, saṅghaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇagamanahetu kho, devānaminda…pe… dibbehi phoṭṭhabbehī’’ti (saṃ. ni. 4.341) –

[07]Ādīnaṃ suttapadānaṃ vasena saṅghe pasādassa phalavisesayogo tassa aggavipākatā ca veditabbā. Tathā anuttariyapaṭilābho sattamabhavādito paṭṭhāya vaṭṭadukkhasamucchedo anuttarasukhādhigamoti evamādiuḷāraphalanipphādanavasena aggavipākatā veditabbā.

[03]Gāthāsu ^b^aggato^eb^ti agge ratanattaye, aggabhāvato vā pasannānaṃ. ^b^Aggaṃ dhamma^eb^nti aggasabhāvaṃ buddhasubodhiṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiṃ, ratanattayassa anaññasādhāraṇaṃ uttamasabhāvaṃ, dasabalādisvākkhātatādisuppaṭipannatādiguṇasabhāvaṃ vā. ^b^Vijānata^eb^nti vijānantānaṃ. Evaṃ sādhāraṇato aggappasādavatthuṃ dassetvā idāni asādhāraṇato taṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^a^V2.0264^ea^^b^‘‘agge buddhe’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^pasannāna^eb^nti aveccappasādena ca itarappasādena ca pasannānaṃ adhimuttānaṃ. ^b^Virāgūpasame^eb^ti virāge upasame ca, sabbassa rāgassa sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantavirāgahetubhūte accantaupasamahetubhūte cāti attho. ^b^Sukhe^eb^ti vaṭṭadukkhakkhayabhāvena saṅkhārūpasamasukhabhāvena sukhe.

[03]^b^Aggasmiṃ dānaṃ dadata^eb^nti agge ratanattaye dānaṃ dadantānaṃ deyyadhammaṃ pariccajantānaṃ. Tattha dharamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā, parinibbutaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa dhātucetiyādike upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā buddhe dānaṃ dadanti nāma. ‘‘Dhammaṃ pūjessāmā’’ti dhammadhare puggale catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā dhammañca ciraṭṭhitikaṃ karontā dhamme dānaṃ dadanti nāma. Tathā ariyasaṅghaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahantā pūjentā sakkarontā taṃ uddissa itarasmimpi tathā paṭipajjantā saṅghe dānaṃ dadanti nāma. ^b^Aggaṃ puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī^eb^ti evaṃ ratanattaye pasannena cetasā uḷāraṃ pariccāgaṃ uḷārañca pūjāsakkāraṃ pavattentānaṃ divase divase aggaṃ uḷāraṃ kusalaṃ upacīyati. Idāni tassa puññassa aggavipākatāya aggabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aggaṃ āyū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^āyū^eb^ti dibbaṃ vā mānusaṃ vā aggaṃ uḷāraṃ paramaṃ āyu ^b^pavaḍḍhati^eb^ uparūpari ^a^M2.0291^ea^ brūhati. ^b^Vaṇṇo^eb^ti rūpasampadā. ^b^Yaso^eb^ti parivārasampadā. ^b^Kittī^eb^ti thutighoso. ^b^Sukha^eb^nti kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ. ^b^Bala^eb^nti kāyabalañceva ñāṇabalañca.

[03]^b^Aggassa^eb^ ratanattayassa dānaṃ ^b^dātā^eb^. Atha vā ^b^aggassa^eb^ deyyadhammassa dānaṃ uḷāraṃ katvā tattha puññaṃ pavattetā. ^b^Aggadhammasamāhito^eb^ti aggena pasādadhammena dānādidhammena ca saṃhito samannāgato acalappasādayutto, tassa vā vipākabhūtehi bahujanassa piyamanāpatādidhammehi yutto. ^b^Aggappatto pamodatī^eb^ti yattha yattha sattanikāye uppanno, tattha tattha aggabhāvaṃ seṭṭhabhāvaṃ adhigato, aggabhāvaṃ vā lokuttaramaggaphalaṃ adhigato pamodati abhiramati paritussatīti.
[06]Aggapasādasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^35^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^V2.0265^ea^^b^ariye ñāye^eb^ti saṃkilesato ārakattā ariye niddose parisuddhe niyyānikadhammabhāvato ñāye kāraṇeti attho. Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ, taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenātī ñāyo, ariyamaggo. So eva ca sampāpakahetubhāvato kāraṇanti vuccati. Idha pana saha vipassanāya ariyamaggo adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘sahavipassanake magge’’^eb^ti. Gāthāsu ^b^‘‘ñāyaṃ dhamma’’^eb^nti etthāpi eseva nayo.
[06]Vassakārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^36^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^b^ukkāhi dhāriyamānāhī^eb^ti dīpikāhi dhāriyamānāhi, daṇḍadīpikāsu jāletvā dhāriyamānāsu māpitattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tañhi nagaraṃ ‘‘maṅgaladivase sukhaṇe sunakkhattaṃ mā atikkamī’’ti rattimpi ukkāsu dhāriyamānāsu māpitaṃ. Ukkāsu ṭhāti ^b^ukkaṭṭhā,^eb^ ukkāsu vijjotayantīsu ^a^M2.0292^ea^ ṭhitā patiṭṭhitāti mūlavibhūjādipakkhepena (pāṇini 3.2.5) saddasiddhi veditabbā. Niruttinayena vā ukkāsu ṭhitāsu ṭhitā āsīti ^b^ukkaṭṭhā^eb^. Apare pana bhaṇanti ‘‘bhūmibhāgasampattiyā manussasampattiyā upakaraṇasampattiyā ca sā nagarī ukkaṭṭhaguṇayogato ^b^ukkaṭṭhā^eb^ti nāmaṃ labhatī’’ti. ^b^Setabya^eb^nti tassa nagarassa nāmaṃ. Taṃ pana kassapadasabalassa jātanagaranti āha ^b^‘‘atīte kassapasammāsambuddhassa jātanagara’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Vijjantarikāyā^eb^ti vijjuniccharaṇakkhaṇe. ^b^Antarato^eb^ti hadaye. ^b^Antarā^eb^ti ārambhanibbattīnaṃ vemajjhe. ^b^Antarikāyā^eb^ti antarāḷe. Ettha ca ‘‘tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya (a. ni. 6.44; 10.75), etesaṃ antarā kappā gaṇanato asaṅkhyeyyā (bu. vaṃ. 28.3), antarantarā kathaṃ opapātetī’’ti (ma. ni. 2.426) ca ādīsu viya kāraṇavemajjhesu vattamānā antarāsaddā eva udāharitabbā siyuṃ, na pana cittakkhaṇavivaresu vattamānā antarāntarikasaddā. Antarāsaddassa hi ayamatthuddhāroti.

[03]Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo siyā – yesu antarāsaddo vattati, tesu antarasaddopi vattatīti samānatthattā antarāsaddatthe vattamāno antarasaddo udāhaṭo. Antarāsaddo eva vā ‘‘yassantarato’’ti ^a^V2.0266^ea^ ettha gāthāsukhatthaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Antarāsaddo eva pana ikasaddena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ‘‘antarikā’’ti vuttoti evamettha udāharaṇodāharitabbānaṃ virodhābhāvo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti^eb^ sāmivacanassa pasaṅge antarāsaddayogena upayogavacanassa icchitattā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘antarāsaddena pana yuttattā upayogavacanaṃ kata’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā^eb^ti parinibbute bhagavati dhātūnaṃ atthāya kusināranagaraṃ parivāretvā ṭhitehi sesarājūhi ‘‘amhākaṃ dhātuyo vā dentu yuddhaṃ vā’’tiādinā kosinārakehi mallehi saddhiṃ kataṃ vivādaṃ vūpasametvā. So kira brāhmaṇo tesaṃ vivādaṃ sutvā ‘‘ete rājāno bhagavato parinibbutaṭṭhāne vivādaṃ karonti, na kho panetaṃ patirūpaṃ, alaṃ iminā kalahena, vūpasamessāmi na’’nti gantvā unnate padese ṭhatvā dvebhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ doṇagajjitaṃ nāma ^a^M2.0293^ea^ avoca. Tattha paṭhamabhāṇavāre tāva ekapadampi te na jāniṃsu. Dutiyabhāṇavārapariyosāne ca ‘‘ācariyassa viya bho saddo, ācariyassa viya bho saddo’’ti sabbe niravā ahesuṃ. Jambudīpatale kira kulaghare jāto yebhuyyena tassa na-antevāsiko nāma natthi, atha kho so attano vacanaṃ sutvā nirave tuṇhībhūte viditvā puna –
[21]‘‘Suṇantu bhonto mama ekavācaṃ,
[27]Amhāka buddho ahu khantivādo;
[26]Na hi sādhuyaṃ uttamapuggalassa,
[22]Sarīrabhāge siyā sampahāro.
[21]‘‘Sabbeva bhonto sahitā samaggā,
[27]Sammodamānā karomaṭṭhabhāge;
[26]Vitthārikā hontu disāsu thūpā,
[22]Bahū janā cakkhumato pasannā’’ti. (dī. ni. 2.237) –

[07]Imaṃ gāthādvayaṃ vatvā taṃ kalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo aṭṭhadhā bhājetvā adāsi, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sakalajambudīpe uppannaṃ mahākalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhātuyo bhājessatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Lakkhaṇacakkānī^eb^ti dvīsu pādatalesu dve lakkhaṇacakkāni.

[03]^b^Āsavenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0267^ea^ kammakilesakāraṇena āsavena. Ettha hi tebhūmakañca kammaṃ, avasesā ca akusalā dhammā ‘‘āsavā’’ti vuttā. ^b^Devūpapattī^eb^ti devesu uppatti nibbatti. Ettha ca yakkhagandhabbatāya vinimuttā sabbe devā devaggahaṇena gahitā. ^b^Gandhabbo vā vihaṅgamo^eb^ ākāsacārī. ^b^Aha^eb^nti vibhattivipariṇāmena yojetabbaṃ.
[06]Doṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^37^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^nibbānasantikeyeva caratī^eb^ti kilesanibbānassa anupādāparinibbānassa ca santikeyeva carati ‘‘na cirasseva adhigamissatī’’ti katvā ^a^M2.0294^ea^. Gāthāya ^b^appamādarato^eb^ti samathavipassanāya appamajjane rato abhirato, appamādeneva rattindivaṃ vītināmentoti attho. ^b^Pamādaṃ bhayato passanto^eb^ti nirayūpapattiādibhayahetuto pamādaṃ bhayato passanto. ^b^Abhabbo parihānāyā^eb^ti so evarūpo samathavipassanādhammehi maggaphalehi vā parihānāya abhabbo. Samathavipassanāto hi sampattato na parihāyati, itarāni ca appattāni pāpuṇātīti.
[06]Aparihāniyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^38^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame ^b^antavā loko^eb^ti ekapassena vaḍḍhitaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ ‘‘loko’’ti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi. Lābhī hi jhānacakkhunā passitvā gaṇhāti, itaro takkamattena. ^b^Anantavā^eb^ti samantato vaḍḍhitaṃ appamāṇaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ ‘‘loko’’ti gāhena vā takkena vā uppannadiṭṭhi. ^b^Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra^eb^nti jīvo sarīrañca ekameva vatthūti uppannadiṭṭhi. ^b^Vissaṭṭhānī^eb^ti sakapariccajanavasena nissaṭṭhāni. ^b^Vantānī^eb^ti idaṃ puna anādiyanabhāvadassanavasena vuttaṃ. Cattampi hi keci gaṇhanti, nayidamevanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘vantānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na hi yaṃ yena vantaṃ, na so taṃ puna ādīyati. Vantampi kiñci sasantatilaggaṃ siyā, nayidamevanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘muttānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘chinnabandhanāni katānī’’^eb^ti, santatito vinimocanavasena chinnabandhanāni katānīti attho. Muttampi kiñci muttabandhanaṃ viya phalaṃ kuhiñci tiṭṭhati, na evamidanti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘pahīnānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yathā kiñci dunnissaṭṭhaṃ puna ^a^V2.0268^ea^ ādāya sammadeva nissaṭṭhaṃ ‘‘paṭinissaṭṭha’’nti vuccati, evaṃ vipassanāya nissaṭṭhāni ādinnasadisāni maggena pahīnāni paṭinissaṭṭhāni nāma hontīti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘paṭinissaṭṭhānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘yathā na puna cittaṃ ārohanti, evaṃ paṭinissajjitānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kāmesanā^eb^ti kāmānaṃ esanā, kāmasaṅkhātā vā esanā kāmesanā. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘tattha katamā kāmesanā? Yo kāmesu kāmacchando kāmarāgo kāmanandī kāmapipāsā kāmamucchā kāmajjhosānaṃ, ayaṃ ^a^M2.0295^ea^ vuccati kāmesanā’’ti, tasmā kāmarāgo ‘‘kāmesanā’’ti veditabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘kāmesanā…pe… anāgāmimaggena pahīnā’’^eb^ti. Bhavānaṃ esanā ^b^bhavesanā^eb^. Vuttampi cetaṃ ‘‘tattha katamā bhavesanā? Yo bhavesu bhavacchando…pe… bhavajjhosānaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā’’ti, tasmā bhavesanarāgo rūpārūpabhavapatthanāti veditabbo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘bhavesanā pana arahattamaggena pahīyatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Brahmacariyassa esanā ^b^brahmacariyesanā^eb^. Sā ca maggabrahmacariyassa, diṭṭhigatikasammatabrahmacariyassa ca gavesanavasena dvippakārāti āha ^b^‘‘brahmacariyaṃ esissāmī’’^eb^tiādi. Diṭṭhigatikasammatassa brahmacariyassa esanāpi hi brahmacariyesanāti vuccati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –

[08]‘‘Tattha katamā brahmacariyesanā? Sassato lokoti vā, asassato lokoti vā, antavā lokoti vā, anantavā lokoti vā, taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīranti vā, aññaṃ jīvaṃ aññaṃ sarīranti vā, hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti vā, yā evarūpā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāraṃ diṭṭhivisūkāyikaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ gāho patiṭṭhāho abhiniveso parāmāso kummaggo micchāpatho micchattaṃ titthāyatanaṃ vipariyesaggāho, ayaṃ vuccati brahmacariyesanā’’ti (vibha. 919).

[07]Tasmā diṭṭhigatikasammatassa brahmacariyassa esanā diṭṭhabrahmacariyesanāti veditabbā. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘diṭṭhibrahmacariyesanā pana sotāpattimaggeneva paṭippassambhatī’’^eb^ti. Ettāvatā ca rāgadiṭṭhiyo esanāti ^a^V2.0269^ea^ dassitaṃ hoti. Na kevalañca rāgadiṭṭhiyo eva esanā, tadekaṭṭhaṃ kammampi. Vuttampi cetaṃ –

[08]‘‘Tattha katamā kāmesanā? Kāmarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati kāmesanā. Tattha katamā bhavesanā? Bhavarāgo tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ ^a^M2.0296^ea^ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati bhavesanā. Tattha katamā brahmacariyesanā? Antaggāhikā diṭṭhi tadekaṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ kāyakammaṃ vacīkammaṃ manokammaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati brahmacariyesanā’’ti (vibha. 919).
[03]^b^Navavidhamāno^eb^ti ‘‘seyyassa seyyohamasmī’’tiādinā (saṃ. ni. 4.108; dha. sa. 1121; vibha. 866; mahāni. 21) āgato navavidhamāno.

[03]‘‘Kāmesanā’’tiādigāthāya pana ^b^brahmacariyesanā sahā^eb^ti brahmacariyesanāya saddhiṃ. Vibhattilopena hi ayaṃ niddeso. Karaṇatthe vā etaṃ paccattavacanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti ‘‘brahmacariyesanāya saddhiṃ kāmesanā bhavesanāti tisso esanā’’ti. Tāsu brahmacariyesanaṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘itisaccaparāmāso, diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samussayā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tassattho – iti evaṃ saccanti parāmāso ^b^itisaccaparāmāso^eb^. Idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti diṭṭhiyā pavattiākāraṃ dasseti. Diṭṭhiyo eva sabbānatthahetubhāvato ^b^diṭṭhiṭṭhānā^eb^. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘‘micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ, bhikkhave, vajjaṃ vadāmī’’ti (a. ni. 1.310). Tā eva ca uparūpari vuddhiyā mānalobhādikilesasamussayanena vaṭṭadukkhasamussayanena ca ^b^samussayā,^eb^ ‘‘idameva saccaṃ moghamañña’’nti micchābhinivisamānā sabbānatthahetukā kilesadukkhūpacayato hetubhūtā ca diṭṭhiyo brahmacariyesanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Etena pavattiākārato nibbattito ca brahmacariyesanā dassitāti veditabbā.

[03]^b^Sabbarāgavirattassā^eb^ti sabbehi kāmabhavarāgehi virattassa. Tato eva taṇhākkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne vimuttattā ^b^taṇhākkhayavimuttino^eb^ arahato. ^b^Esanā paṭinissaṭṭhā^eb^ti kāmesanā, bhavesanā sabbaso nissaṭṭhā pahīnā. ^b^Diṭṭhiṭṭhānā samūhatā^eb^ti brahmacariyesanāsaṅkhātā diṭṭhiṭṭhānā ca paṭhamamaggeneva samugghātitā. Evampi imissā gāthāya atthavaṇṇanā veditabbā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Patilīnasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^39^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame ^a^M2.0297^ea^^a^V2.0270^ea^^b^anukulayañña^eb^nti anukulaṃ kulānukkamaṃ upādāya dātabbadānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘amhākaṃ…pe… kulānukulavasena yajitabba’’^eb^nti. Vaṃsaparamparāya pacchā duggatapurisehi padātabbadānaṃ. Evarūpaṃ kulaṃ sīlavante uddissa nibaddhadānaṃ, tasmiṃ kule daliddānipi na upacchindanti. Tatridaṃ vatthu – anāthapiṇḍikassa ghare pañca salākabhattasatāni dīyiṃsu. Dantamayasalākānaṃ pañcasatāni ahesuṃ. Atha taṃ kulaṃ anukkamena dāliddiyena abhibhūtaṃ. Ekā tasmiṃ kule dārikā ekasalākato uddhaṃ dātuṃ nāsakkhi. Sāpi pacchā sātavāhanaṃ raṭṭhaṃ gantvā khalaṃ sodhetvā laddhadhaññena taṃ salākaṃ adāsi. Eko thero rañño ārocesi. Rājā taṃ ānetvā aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi. Sā tato paṭṭhāya puna pañcapi salākasatāni pavattesi.

[03]^b^Assamedha^eb^ntiādīsu porāṇakarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ, purisamedhaṃ, sammāpāsaṃ, vācāpeyyanti cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ, yehi rājāno lokaṃ saṅgaṇhiṃsu. Tattha nipphannasassato dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ ^b^sassamedhaṃ^eb^ nāma, sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho. Mahāyodhānaṃ chamāsikabhattavetanānuppadānaṃ ^b^purisamedhaṃ^eb^ nāma, purisasaṅgaṇhane medhāvitāti attho. Daliddamanussānaṃ hatthe lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ ^b^sammāpāsaṃ^eb^ nāma. Tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti, tasmā sammāpāsanti vuccati. ‘‘Tāta, mātulā’’tiādinā pana saṇhavācābhaṇanaṃ ^b^vācāpeyyaṃ^eb^ nāma, peyyavajjaṃ piyavacanatāti attho. Evaṃ catūhi vatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtānnapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ, manussā mudā modanā ure putte naccentā apārutagharadvārā viharanti. Idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato ^b^niraggaḷa^eb^nti vuccati. Ayaṃ porāṇikā paveṇī. Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattentā ummūlaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhantiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā ^b^brāhmaṇadhammiyasutte^eb^ –
[21]‘‘Tesaṃ ^a^M2.0298^ea^ āsi vipallāso, disvāna aṇuto aṇuṃ…pe…;
[22]Te tattha mante ganthetvā, okkākaṃ tadupāgamu’’nti. (su. ni. 301-304);

[03]Idāni ^a^V2.0271^ea^ tehi parivattetvā ṭhapitamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘assamedha’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^medhantī^eb^ti vadhenti. ^b^Dvīhi pariyaññehī^eb^ti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi. ^b^Sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhiṃsanassā^eb^ti sattanavutādhikānaṃ pañcannaṃ pasusatānaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa. Tathā hi vadanti –
[21]‘‘Chasatāni niyujjanti, pasūnaṃ majjhime hani;
[22]Assamedhassa yaññassa, ūnāni pasūhi tīhī’’ti. (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.120);

[03]^b^Samma^eb^nti yugacchidde pakkhipitabbadaṇḍakaṃ. ^b^Pāsantī^eb^ti khipanti. ^b^Saṃhārimehī^eb^ti sakaṭehi vahitabbehi. Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinaditīre pathaviyā vivare dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi, andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā ‘‘ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo’’ti saññāya tattha sammāpāsayaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘nimuggokāsato pabhutī’’^eb^ti. Ayūpo appakadivaso yāgo, sayūpo bahudivasaṃ neyyo ^b^satrayāgo^eb^ti. Mantapadābhisaṅkhatānaṃ sappimadhūnaṃ ^b^vāja^eb^miti samaññā. Hiraññasuvaṇṇagomahiṃsādi ^b^sattarasakadakkhiṇassa^eb^. Sāragabbhakoṭṭhāgārādīsu natthi ettha aggaḷanti ^b^niraggaḷo^eb^. Tattha kira yaññe attano sāpateyyaṃ anavasesato anigūhitvā niyyātīyati.

[03]^b^Mahārambhā^eb^ti bahupasughātakammā. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘vividhā yattha haññare’’ti vakkhamānattā ‘‘mahākiccā mahākaraṇīyā’’ti paṭhamo atthavikappo vutto. Dutiyo pana atthavikappo ‘‘mahārambhāti papañcavasena ajeḷakā’’tiādi vuttanti adhippāyena ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādinā āraddho. ^b^Nirārambhā^eb^ti etthāpi vuttanayena attho veditabbo. Nanu ca pāṇātipātādiakusalakammassa appamattakampi phalaṃ nupalabbhati, tasmā tassa nipphalabhāvaṃ avatvā ‘‘na te honti mahapphalā’’ti kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘niravasesatthe’’^eb^tiādi. Anugataṃ kulanti ^b^anukulaṃ,^eb^ kulānugatanti attho. Ye niccabhattādiṃ pubbapurisehi paṭṭhapitaṃ aparāparaṃ anupacchindantā manussā ^a^M2.0299^ea^ dadanti, te anukulaṃ yajanti nāma. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘ye aññe anukulaṃ yajantī’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Ujjayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^40^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^V2.0272^ea^^b^pāṇasamārambharahita^eb^nti pāṇaghātarahitaṃ. ^b^Abyābajjhaṃ sukhaṃ lokaṃ, paṇḍito upapajjatī^eb^ti kāmacchandādibyāpādavirahitattā abyābajjhaṃ niddukkhaṃ. Parapīḷābhāve pana vattabbaṃ natthi. Jhānasamāpattivasena sukhabahulattā sukhaṃ ekantasukhaṃ brahmalokaṃ jhānapuññena, itarapuññena pana tadaññasampattibhavasaṅkhātaṃ sukhaṃ lokaṃ paṇḍito sappañño upeti. Sesaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Udāyisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Cakkavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^41^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcamassa paṭhame ^b^diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāyā^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sukhavihāratthāya, nikkilesatāya nirāmisena sukhena viharaṇatthāyāti attho. Iminā cattāri phalasamāpattijjhānāni khīṇāsavassa āsavakkhayādhigamato aparabhāge adhigatarūpārūpajjhānāni ca kathitāni. ^b^Dibbacakkhuñāṇadassanappaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti dibbacakkhuñāṇappaṭilābhatthāya. Dibbacakkhuñāṇañhi rūpagatassa dibbassa itarassa ca dassanaṭṭhena idha ‘‘ñāṇadassana’’nti adhippetaṃ. ^b^Ālokasaññaṃ manasi karotī^eb^ti divā vā rattiṃ vā sūriyadīpacandamaṇiukkāvijjulatādīnaṃ āloko divā rattiñca upaladdho, yathāladdhavaseneva ālokaṃ manasi karoti citte ṭhapeti, tathā ca naṃ manasi karoti, yathāssa subhāvitālokakasiṇassa viya kasiṇāloko yathicchakaṃ yāvadicchakañca so āloko rattiyaṃ upatiṭṭhati ^a^M2.0300^ea^, yena tattha divāsaññaṃ ṭhapeti, divā viya vigatathinamiddho hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yathā divā tathā ratti’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Yathā divā ālokasaññā manasi katā, tatheva naṃ rattimpi manasi karotī^eb^ti yathā divā diṭṭho āloko, tatheva taṃ rattiṃ manasi karoti. ^b^Dutiyapade^eb^ti ‘‘yathā rattiṃ tathā divā’’ti imasmiṃ ^a^V2.0273^ea^ vākye. ^b^Esa nayo^eb^ti iminā yathā rattiyaṃ candālokādi āloko diṭṭho, evameva rattiṃ diṭṭhākāreneva divā taṃ ālokaṃ manasi karoti citte ṭhapetīti imamatthaṃ atidisati. ^b^Iti vivaṭena cetasā^eb^ti evaṃ apihitena cittena, thinamiddhāpidhānena apihitacittenāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Apariyonaddhenā^eb^ti samantato anaddhena asañchāditena. ^b^Kiñcāpī^eb^tiādinā attanā vuttamevatthaṃ samattheti. ^b^Ālokasadisaṃ kataṃ^eb^ ‘‘yathā divā tathā ratti’’ntiādinā.

[03]^b^Sattaṭṭhānikassā^eb^ti ‘‘abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī hotī’’tiādinā (dī. ni. 1.214; 2.376; ma. ni. 1.109) vuttassa sattaṭṭhānikassa satisampajaññassa atthāya. ^b^Pariggahitavatthārammaṇatāyā^eb^ti vatthuno ārammaṇassa ca yāthāvato viditabhāvena. Yathā hi sappaṃ pariyesantena tassa āsaye vidite sopi vidito gahito eva ca hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā, evaṃ vedanāya āsayabhūte vatthumhi ārammaṇe ca vidite ādikammikassapi vedanā viditā gahitā eva hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā. Pageva pariññātavatthukassa khīṇāsavassa. Tassa hi uppādakkhaṇepi ṭhitikkhaṇepi bhaṅgakkhaṇepi vedanā viditā pākaṭā honti ‘‘tā vedanā evaṃ uppajjitvā’’tiādinā. Na kevalañca vedanā eva, idha vuttā saññādayopi avuttā cetanādayopi viditāva uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca nirujjhanti ca. Nidassanamattañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ vedanāsaññāvitakkaggahaṇaṃ. Tena anavasesato sabbadhammānampi uppādādito viditabhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03]Apica vedanāya uppādo vidito hoti, upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti, atthaṅgamo vidito hoti. Kathaṃ vedanāya uppādo vidito hoti ^a^M2.0301^ea^? Avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo, taṇhāsamudayā kammasamudayo, phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayoti nibbattilakkhaṇaṃ passantopi vedanākkhandhassa samudayaṃ passati. Evaṃ vedanāya uppādo vidito hoti. Kathaṃ vedanāya upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti? Aniccato manasikaroto khayatupaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti, dukkhato manasikaroto bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti, anattato manasikaroto suññatupaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti. Evaṃ vedanāya upaṭṭhānaṃ viditaṃ hoti. Iti khayato bhayato suññato jānāti. Kathaṃ vedanāya atthaṅgamo vidito hoti? Avijjānirodhā vedanānirodho…pe… evaṃ vedanāya atthaṅgamo vidito hoti. Imināpi nayenettha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Iti rūpa^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^saddo anavasesato rūpassa sarūpanidassanatthoti tassa ^b^idaṃ rūpa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0274^ea^ etena sādhāraṇato sarūpanidassanamāha, ^b^ettakaṃ rūpa^eb^nti etena anavasesato, ^b^na ito paraṃ rūpaṃ atthī^eb^ti tabbinimuttassa aññassa abhāvaṃ. ^b^Iti vedanā^eb^tiādīsupi ayaṃ vedanā, ettakā vedanā, ito paraṃ vedanā natthi. Ayaṃ saññā…pe… ime saṅkhārā…pe… idaṃ viññāṇaṃ, ettakaṃ viññāṇaṃ, ito paraṃ viññāṇaṃ natthīti evamattho daṭṭhabboti āha ^b^‘‘vedanādīsupi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Ñāṇena jānitvā^eb^ paroparāni. ^b^Paroparānī^eb^ti parāni ca oparāni ca. ^b^Uttamādhamānī^eb^ti parattabhāvasakattabhāvādīni uttamādhamāni. ^b^Calita^eb^nti taṇhādiṭṭhivipphanditaṃ. ^b^Anīgho^eb^ti rāgādīigharahito. ^b^Atāri so^eb^ti so evarūpo arahā jātijaraṃ atari.
[06]Samādhibhāvanāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^42-44^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiye ^b^etesaṃ pañhāna^eb^nti ekaṃsabyākaraṇādīnaṃ catunnaṃ pañhānaṃ. ^b^Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne byākaraṇaṃ jānātī^eb^ti ‘‘cakkhuṃ anicca’’nti puṭṭhe ‘‘anicca’’nti ekaṃseneva byākātabbaṃ. ‘‘Aniccā nāma cakkhu’’nti puṭṭhe pana ‘‘na kevalaṃ cakkhumeva, sotampi anicca’’nti evaṃ vibhajitvā byākātabbaṃ. ‘‘Yathā ^a^M2.0302^ea^ cakkhuṃ tathā sotaṃ, yathā sotaṃ tathā cakkhu’’nti puṭṭhe ‘‘kenaṭṭhena pucchasī’’ti paṭipucchitvā ‘‘dassanaṭṭhena pucchāmī’’ti vutte ‘‘na hī’’ti byākātabbaṃ. ‘‘Aniccaṭṭhena pucchāmī’’ti vutte ‘‘āmā’’ti byākātabbaṃ. ‘‘Taṃ jīvaṃ taṃ sarīra’’ntiādīni puṭṭhena pana ‘‘abyākatametaṃ bhagavatā’’ti ṭhapetabbo, esa pañho na byākātabboti evaṃ jānātīti attho. ^b^Atthasamāgamenā^eb^ti atthassa paṭilābhena laddhabbena. Samiti saṅgati samodhānanti samayo, paṭilābho. Samayo eva ^b^abhisamayo,^eb^ abhimukhabhāvena vā samayo ^b^abhisamayo^eb^ti evamettha padattho veditabbo. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Tatiyacatutthāni uttānatthāneva.
[06]Pañhabyākaraṇasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^45-46^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^a^V2.0275^ea^ (saṃ. ni. ṭī. 1.1.107) ^b^ekokāse^eb^ti cakkavāḷassa pariyantasaññite ekasmiṃ okāse. ^b^Bhumma^eb^nti ‘‘yatthā’’ti idaṃ bhummavacanaṃ. Sāmaññato vuttampi ‘‘so lokassa anto’’ti vacanato visiṭṭhavisayameva hoti. ‘‘Na jāyati, na mīyatī’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘na cavati, na upapajjatī’’ti kasmā vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘idaṃ aparāparaṃ…pe… gahita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Padagamanenā^eb^ti padasā gamanena. ^b^Satthā saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati^eb^ upari sabbāni pakāsetukāmo. Saṅkhāralokassa hi anto nibbānaṃ.

[03]Daḷhaṃ thiraṃ dhanu etassāti daḷhadhanvā, so eva ‘‘daḷhadhammā’’ti vutto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘daḷhadhanū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uttamappamāṇaṃ^eb^ nāma sahassathāmadhanu. Dhanuggaṇhanasippacittakatāya dhanuggaho, na dhanuggahaṇamattenāti āha ^b^‘‘dhanuggahoti dhanuācariyo’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Dhanuggaho’’ti vatvā ‘‘sikkhito’’ti vutte dhanusikkhāya sikkhitoti viññāyati. Sikkhā ca ettakena kālena sikkhantassa ukkaṃsagatā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Usabhappamāṇe^eb^ti vīsati yaṭṭhiyo usabhaṃ, tasmiṃ usabhappamāṇe padese. ^b^Vālagga^eb^nti vālakoṭiṃ. ^b^Katahattho^eb^ti paricitahattho. ^b^Katasarakkhepo^eb^ti thiralakkhe ca calalakkhe ca paresaṃ dassanavasena ^a^M2.0303^ea^ sarakkhepassa katāpī. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dassitasippo’’^eb^ti, ‘‘katayoggo’’ti keci. Asanti etenāti ^b^asanaṃ,^eb^ kaṇḍo. ^b^Tālacchādi^eb^nti tālacchāyaṃ. Sā pana ratanamattā vidatthicaturaṅgulā.

[03]^b^Puratthimā samuddā^eb^ti ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe puratthimā samuddā. Samuddasīsena puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ vadati. ^b^Pacchimasamuddo^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Nippapañcata^eb^nti adantakāritaṃ. ^b^Sampatte^eb^ti tādisena javena gacchantena sampatte. ^b^Anotatte^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘sampatte’’ti padaṃ ānetvā sambandho, tathā ‘‘nāgalatādantakaṭṭha’’nti etthāpi. ^b^Tadā^eb^ti yadā so lokantagavesako ahosi, tadā. ^b^Dīghāyukakālo^eb^ti anekavassasahassāyukakālo. ^b^Cakkavāḷalokassā^eb^ti sāmaññavasena ekavacanaṃ, cakkavāḷalokānanti attho. Imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbattipubbaparicayasiddhāya nikantiyā.
[03]^b^Sasaññimhi samanake^eb^ti na rūpadhammamattake, atha kho pañcakkhandhasamudāyeti dasseti. ^b^Samitapāpo^eb^ti samucchinnasaṃkilesadhammo. Chaṭṭhaṃ uttānameva.
[06]Rohitassasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^47^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^a^V2.0276^ea^^b^suvidūravidūra^eb^-saddānaṃ samānatthānaṃyeva ekattha gahaṇaṃ idha niddeso dūrāsannabhāvassa apekkhāsiddhattā idhādhippetassa dūrabhāvassa kenaci pariyāyena anāsannabhāvadassanatthaṃ katanti āha ^b^‘‘kenaci pariyāyena anāsannāni hutvā’’^eb^tiādi. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Suvidūrasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aṭṭhame vākkaraṇacāturiyato vacanaguṇahetūnaṃ pūriyā porī, poriyaṃ bhavāti porī, tāya ^b^poriyā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇavācāyā’’^eb^ti, akkharapadaparipuṇṇāya vācāyāti attho. ^b^Apalibuddhāyā^eb^ti pittādīhi ^a^M2.0304^ea^ na vibaddhāya ananubundhitāya. ^b^Anelagalāyā^eb^ti anelāya agalāya niddosāya agaḷitapadabyañjanāya ca. Therassa hi kathayato padaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā na parihāyati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anelagalāyāti niddosāya ceva agaḷitāya cā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^niddosāyā^eb^ti atthato ca byañjanato ca vigatadosāya. ^b^Apatitapadabyañjanāyā^eb^ti avirahitapadabyañjanāya. Atha vā ^b^anelagalāyā^eb^ti na elaṃ dosaṃ galatīti anelagalā. Avicchinnavācāya anelagalāya yathā dandhamanussā mukhena kheḷaṃ gaḷantena vācaṃ bhāsanti, na evarūpāya. Atha kho niddosāya visadavācāyāti attho. Vivaṭṭappakāsinī vācā na kadāci vivaṭṭamuttāti katvā āha ^b^‘‘vivaṭṭapariyāpannāyā’’^eb^ti, vivaṭṭaṃ amuñcitvā pavattāyāti attho. Vivaṭṭappakāsinī hi vācā vivaṭṭaṃ paricchijja āpādentī pavattati. Navalokuttaradhammo sabbadhammehi samussitaṭṭhena abbhuggataṭṭhena ca dhajo nāmāti āha ^b^‘‘abbhuggataṭṭhenā’’^eb^tiādi. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
[06]Visākhasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^49^eb^^b^.^eb^ Navame aniccādīni vatthūni niccantiādinā viparītato asantīti vipallāsā ^a^V2.0277^ea^, saññāya vipallāso ^b^saññāvipallāso^eb^. Itaresupi tīsu eseva nayo. Evamete catunnaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasena cattāro, tesu vatthūsu saññādīnaṃ vasena dvādasa honti. Tesu aṭṭha sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti. ^b^Asubhe subha^eb^nti saññācittavipallāsā sakadāgāmimaggena tanukā honti, anāgāmimaggena pahīyanti. ^b^Dukkhe sukha^eb^nti saññācittavipallāsā arahattamaggena pahīyantīti veditabbā. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Vipallāsasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^50^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dasame ^a^M2.0305^ea^^b^upakkiliṭṭhabhāvakaraṇenā^eb^ti malīnabhāvakaraṇena. ^b^Pañcavidhāya surāya catubbidhassa ca merayassā^eb^ti ettha pūvasurā, piṭṭhasurā, odanasurā, kiṇṇapakkhittā, sambhārasaṃyuttāti pañca surā. Pupphāsavo, phalāsavo, madhvāsavo, guḷāsavoti cattāro āsavā, catubbidhaṃ merayaṃ nāma. Tattha pūve bhājane pakkhipitvā tajjaṃ udakaṃ datvā madditvā katā ^b^pūvasurā^eb^. Evaṃ sesasurāpi. ^b^Kiṇṇā^eb^ti pana tassā surāya bījaṃ vuccati. Ye surā ‘‘modakā’’tipi vuccanti, te pakkhipitvā katā ^b^kiṇṇapakkhittā^eb^. Dhātakiāsavādinānāsambhārehi saṃyojitā ^b^sambhārasaṃyuttā.^eb^Madhukatālanāḷikerādipuppharaso ciraparivāsito ^b^pupphāsavo^eb^. Panasādiphalaraso ^b^phalāsavo^eb^. Muddikāraso ^b^madhvāsavo^eb^. Ucchuraso ^b^guḷāsavo^eb^.
[06]Upakkilesasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Rohitassavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03]^b^51^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyassa ^a^M2.0306^ea^^a^V2.0278^ea^ paṭhame ^b^puññābhisandā^eb^ti vā puññanadiyo. Avicchedena niccaṃ pavattiyamānāni hi puññāni abhisandanaṭṭhena ‘‘puññābhisandā’’ti vuttā. ^b^Aparimita^eb^nti āḷhakagaṇanāya aparimitaṃ, yojanavasena panassa parimāṇaṃ atthi. Tathā hi heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā upari ākāsena parato cakkavāḷapabbatena majjhe tattha tattha ṭhitehi dīpapabbatapariyantehi paricchinnattā yojanato sakkā pamāṇaṃ kātuṃ. ^b^Bheravārammaṇehī^eb^ti saviññāṇakāviññāṇakehi bheravārammaṇehi. Tathā hi taṃ mahāsarīramacchakumbhīlayakkharakkhasamahānāgadānavādīnaṃ saviññāṇakānaṃ vaḷavāmukhapātālādīnaṃ aviññāṇakānañca bheravārammaṇānaṃ vasena ‘‘bahubherava’’nti vuccati. Sesamettha uttānameva.
